1b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa/ 'phags pa 
1b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag med 
1b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis nyid bde gshegs mi rtog ye shes chos dbyings sku brnyes 
1b4(rgyud 'grel): pa// kun gyi rang bzhin zhi ba 'di la gsal zhing bla med lam 
2a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig brnyes pa// gnas gsum mnyam nyid de la mtshan med yid kyi rab tu 
2a2(rgyud 'grel): dad pas mos// ston pa 'jig rten sgron mar gyur pa kun gyis mtshungs par rab bsngags pa// 
2a3(rgyud 'grel): chos la chos kyi snying por gyur pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu snying po nyid// bde gshegs ma lus 
2a4(rgyud 'grel): yum du b+ha bas rgyal bkun gyil ma ga cag/ tshul khrims la sags pa la byi la ma snodab+h+yo/ 
2a5(rgyud 'grel): pa rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur pa// rnam dag byang chub sems kyi ngang tshul bsgoms dang yon tan 
2a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ ldan nam nas mas kyad mi badzin pa / del rmugs 
2b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu gyur par chos kyi sku zhes rgyal bas gsungs// shes byed dam par gyur pa shes rab spyan zhes kyang ni de la bya// rdo rje rtse mo mchog nyid mi rtog ye shes de yang de nyid do// ji snyed 'phags pa'i rnam grol chos 
2b2(rgyud 'grel): su brnyad pa de dag thams cad kyang // byang chub sems nyid rdzogs pas de yi yon tan de dag de las byung // 'phags pa'i rigs chen 'chi med byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang // de med 
2b3(rgyud 'grel): mi 'byung de phyir de ni rnam grol mchog gi lam nyid do// des na kun du rdo rje sems dpa' ci 'drar bsgom par zla bar 'gyur// pha zhing shes dka' drang song chen po'i lam 'di mi rtog rtog las 'das/ 
2b4(rgyud 'grel): brtag par dka' zhing bstan par dka' la brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral// tshig gis mi phebs gzhan dang byis pa kun gyi spyod yul ma yin yang // ston pa nges pa'i lung dang bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gdam 
2b5(rgyud 'grel): ngag de nyid don 'dir blta// mngon sum la sogs rgyu yi dngos po 'jig cing grub pa'i mtha' spyod pa// de nyid rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs dpyod yul tshad mar bzhag nas blo yis 'jig byed de// thog mtha' 
2b6(rgyud 'grel): med phyir dpyod mtha' med de snying po med na tshad mar gang // de phyir 'jig rten rtags pa'i tha snyad rnal 'byor lam 'dir mi dgos so// dngos po mtha' yi rgyu ni lo rgyus dag las lam 'dir brtag par bya// skye bo 
2b7(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi sems la mngon snang phyi nang grags pa'i chos 'di ni// 'dzin pa drug gi ji ltar mthong zhing rtag pa de ltar ma yin 'khrul// rang gi rtog pas myos shing gzung ba de bzhin bden gyur na// de dag dngos po 
2b8(rgyud 'grel): med rtogs dgra bcom 'dra bar gyur pa yi rigs// de dag dus dgras 'joms dang sdug bsngal nyen las des 'khrul mngon par 'gyur// gzhan du skye mched sgo nas rig pa de dag tshad mar gyur na ni// de nyid 
3a1(rgyud 'grel): tshad mar gyur pas 'phags pa'i lam de su la dgos mi 'gyur// lam de rnam grol lam du bstan cing dbang po'i shes pas mi thar te// sdug bsngal 'ga' yang mi 'jil rnam rig
3a2(rgyud 'grel): shes te nyon mongs 'byung ba'i gnas// de phyir skye bos mthong ba de dag 'khrul par mngon zhen rgyal bas gsungs// des ni de las 'di dag 'khrul pa'i dbang gis ji ltar snang bar 'gyur zhe na/ 
3a3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu rtog can yan lag ma yin kun du rtog pas rtsol med nyams// blo gros phyin ci log tu gyur cing ma rig rkyen gyi dbang song bas// sems dang sems las byung ba de nyid lus gsum don du snang ba yin// 
3a4(rgyud 'grel): 'du byed sna tshogs dag gis bag chags bsags las gang goms mthu rtas tshe// sems nyid yul dang lus 'drar snang ba rus pas gang ba bzhin du snang // bag chags bsags pa'i rgyun la 
3a5(rgyud 'grel): dmigs skyes yid la brtags pa'i bdag med pa// 'du byed mthu yis bisgrubs shing phra ba ma mthong de las rnam rig skye// rgyun dang bcas pa'i sems kyi mthu ni ma rtogs rtog pa'i rjes 'brang nas// 
3a6(rgyud 'grel): de las zag bcas rang bzhin rtogs pas bdag dang chos rnams rgyas par byed// ldan par 'byung ba shin tu phra bar rgyu ba de ni ma mthong las// bdag tu lta la sogs pa mu stegs lta ba sna tshogs skye zhing thar 
3a7(rgyud 'grel): pa rtog/ sems 'di las rnams mtha' yas gnas gyur bag chags mtha' med nges pa med// bag chags rtas shing sad par byed pa'i rkyen yang rnam pa sna tshogs te// rkyen 'gas bag chags 'ga' 
3a8(rgyud 'grel): zhig smin nas mi yi rgyud kyi lus snang ba// rkyen gzhan dag gis bag chags gzhan sad byas tshe 'gyur ba'i mthu mthong nas// dbang phyug la sogs byed par 'dod de nyes pa lam de ma zhi grol mi 'gyur/ 
3b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor lam slad the tshom rgyun yang rgyun 'di phra ba ma rtogs skyes// bdag tu btags pas bsgribs te 'phags pa'i rigs dang rnam par bral// chos su btags pas sdug bsngal sna tshogs 
3b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung zhing ngan song srid par 'gyur// rnam shes de yang 'du byed rgyun la mtshan ma tha dad 'dzin pas na// las kyi khyad par dag gis brgyad du snang gi rig la tha dad med// de phyir sems kyi skad cig 
3b3(rgyud 'grel): dang po de la lus dang kun gnas// de la bsam pa zhe na phyir phyi ma de 'byung de la snang // rang sems rgyun las 'phags pa skye bo'i chos ni gzhan yod ma yin// rgyud drug rigs las de yang sna tshogs de/ 
3b4(rgyud 'grel): dang rang gi ting 'dzin to// sems rgyud de la phyogs kyang cung zad med pas gcig la brten med do// de la phyogs med phyir na mtha' yas zhing rnams bdag gi lus// bdag gi lus ni mtha' yas 
3b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing dang skye bo'i lus su rab snang yang // sems dang bag chags gcig min tha dad ma yin brtags par rab tu dga'// 'di kun rten cing 'brel 'byung tshul te skye dang 'gag par 'gyur zhes pa// 
3b6(rgyud 'grel): tshigs pa'i sa bon bzhin du med las med pa mi 'byung rgyu 'bras med// dngos por zhen cing rgyu dang 'bras bur rtog pa'i sems nyid ni// rgyu dang rkyen du snang ste de gnyis med phyir skye dang 'jig pa 
3b7(rgyud 'grel): med// skye 'jig med phyir bdag gzhan med de 'cha 'pho med phyir brtag chad med// des na 'khrul 'khor med cing mya ngan 'das pa med pa nyid du mngon// gnas kyi skad cig nam yang mi 'bral de/ 
3b8(rgyud 'grel): tshe mnyam gyor de med med// yang dag ma yin rtog pas bskyed phyir bag chags yod pa ma yin dang // spyod yul med phyir kun gzhi med cing rnam rig de yang med pa bzhin// phyogs rnams 
4a1(rgyud 'grel): med cing dmigs dang gnas med rnam par rig pa ji ltar skye// de phyir sems 'di yod med mtha' las 'das shing gcig dang du ma bral// bde gshegs byang chub med phyir de yi/ 
4a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzu 'phrul rgyu 'dra 'khrul la snang // de bzhin dag pa'i ye shes de dag shin tu dge ba'i rgyun nyid dang // chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni de dag dmigs shing skye bar btags pa yang // rdo rje'i gnas med 
4a3(rgyud 'grel): phyir na mnyam gnas rang bzhini 'dra 'gyur dang // chos dbyings rdo rje rtse mo de dag phyogs nyid med pas skad cig min// dag pa'i dge rtsa gzugs brnyan med pas 'jig rten ye shes yod min/ 
4a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// de phyir byang chub ma chub mtshan nyid med par gcig pas blang dor med// don de'i tshul gyis don dam rnam grangs skye 'gag med dang mnyam nyid dang // gnyis med bsam 'das stong nyid 
4a5(rgyud 'grel): chos dbyings brjod dang tha snyad bral la sogs// bstan pa de kun tha snyad yin te don dam med cing kun sgrib med// don dam tshul gyis lam nyid 'di 'dra zhes pa de nyid kun sgrib yin// the tshom yod 
4a6(rgyud 'grel): med chos ni gang la'ang spong zhing gnas par mi byed do// sgom pa dang ni chos dbyings med phyir som nyi med la dam par blta ba la'ang med// de ltar dngos po mtha' rnams btags dang rang bzhin sgyu ma'ang/ 
4a7(rgyud 'grel): med 'gyur phyir// yod la ltos pa'i med pa'ang med de med pa'ang med// mtha' rnams med phyir dbus med dbus la'ang gnas pa mi byed la// gang la 'jig rten dbang phyug pad+ma kun kyang mi spong 'drang/ 
4a8(rgyud 'grel): mnyam gnas// chos la 'khrul par mthong ba de nyid 'khrul pa yin par rab rtogs te// drug gis bstan pa bdud kyi las kyang mi 'dor ngan du mi rtog go/ shes rab thabs kyi spyod la mi gnas 
4b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir na bdud kyi 'dra bar spyod// rang gi shes pa dam par byas te kun las rgyal te de bsnyems nas// 'dod chags zhe sdang skyes nas rtsod 'byung gti mug yin te don mi mthong // ji srid yid kyi g.yo ba de/ 
4b2(rgyud 'grel): srid bdud kyi yul te phra ba'i lam// g.yo dang mi g.yo tha snyad mi gnas gnas pa la'ang gnas par mi byed do// snang med dbu mi'i lam de byang chub sems zhes bde gshegs gsung // gzugs dang 
4b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma smon par 'dzin pa rab tu spangs nas ni// rnam thar gsum po bsgom pa'ang bdud kyi las te gzugs nyid stong pa'o// 'khor ba'i lam gsum spong zhing mya ngan las 'das lam sgom pa'ang bdud nyid de/ 
4b4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid rang bzhin ma zhi rang bzhin rtsal spangs gar mi gnas// 'phags pa kun gyi yul dang gnas kyang 'das sogs lam nyid gzhan na med// ljang dang mi ldang ched du mi spong sems rten mi 'cha' mngon du 
4b5(rgyud 'grel): min// 'jam dpal ma yin rdul tsam g.yo ba de yin der mi gnas// bsgom pa'i sa mi rnyes phyir bsgoms pas rnyed phrad mi 'gyur te// sems kyi spyod yul shes pa de dag chos rnams kyi ni chos nyid yin// 
4b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam bral gang la mchog dang tha ma med par lam mchog 'di bsgom mo// 'du byed ma skyes chos kun 'byung med bzhin du chos rnams mya ngan 'das// dngos med de tshe kun kyang chos kyi dbyings zhes dgra bcom rab 
4b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor yin// nam mkha' dmigs ming tsam dge dang mi dger 'byed med skye ba'ang med// rtsol ba yid la mi byed gang la'ang sems med shes dang mi shes bral// dran dang 'byed med gang la'ang 'ga' dang 
4b8(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs med mi gnas mi dmigs shing // mnyam nas gnyis su brtags med brjod bral bya dang mi bya med de sogs bri med// ched du rtsol bar yid la mi byed cis kyang mi 'khrugs mnyam shes 
5a1(rgyud 'grel): dang // gang la'ang chags dang yul gyis myos skrag med de mi 'bral mi gnas shing // mi 'phrogs mnyam shes bzhi po phyogs dang pha rol phyin rnams der shes te// sems kyi dbyings su 
5a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pas lam 'di gzhan du bsgoms pas 'od gsal mi 'gyur ro// brda' can yang dag len pa'ang byang chub chen por yin zhes ston pas rab gsungs phyir// de la 'di ni byang chub sems nyid bskyed 
5a3(rgyud 'grel): cing bsgoms pa'i gnas yin te// ting 'dzin gsum po bstan par byas nas rtags kyi phyag rgya gsum bcings nas// chos kyi phyag rgya chen por sems nyid skyed de snying po brjod cing bsgom pa'i gnas// 
5a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms pas lam kun ma nor bsgoms pa yin// kun tu bzang mo'i spyod pas mi zin dge ba'i chos ni gang yang rung // kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'ang bdud kyi las te zad cing mthar
5a5(rgyud 'grel): thug 'gyur// de dang ldan pa'i las ni bdud kyi las kyang byang chub spyod par gsungs// don 'dir mos pa de yang byang chub chen po yin zhes rgyal bas rab tu sngags// gnas 'dir bskyed pa tsam
5a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis 'jig rten gsum po bla mar bcas pa yi// mchod nas nyan tho so bdud kyi sde rnams zil gyis gnon zhes sangs rgyas gsung // thabs chen byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba'i spyod pa 'di nyid do// 
5a7(rgyud 'grel): 'di med rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad theg pa gsum ston mi srid do// skad cig tsam du dad pa'i shugs bskyed de yang myur du 'jam dpal gzhon nur 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gsang bar zhugs shing thag chen 
5a8(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig mchog kyang bsrungs pa yin// tshul khrims sdom pa kun kyang srungs shing sbyin gnas dam par rab tu bsngags// de phyir byang chub sems kyi bsod nams de la gzugs yod na// nam mkha' bar 
5b1(rgyud 'grel): sna de yang sdod du chungs zhes rgyal bas mtshungs par gsungs// skyebasgru ba sna tshogs dag las skyes shing skye 'gyur skye ba'i rgyun gyis dbang song ba// rtogs mtha' mi shes rtog pas bslus shing rtog 
5b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyun 'grangs 'khrul pa'i rtog las phyir ldog mar sgyur ba// d+hU ma'i spyi shes dag cing sgra ma'i glang po 'dra bar rnams rmongs pa'i sgyum rnams// rmi lam gyis grang bzhin du rmi yis bden pa nyams cad 
5b3(rgyud 'grel): lam dbang du song ba'i rmi lam pa// lam 'di spong zhing mtha' dang lam gzhan lam du bltas nas ma nor lam zhes ston pa de// de dag rdol gser bzhin thugs rjer rung zhing thugs rje'i thugs rjes kye ma 'phros 
5b4(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// shin tu masbyangs dus kyis man pa'i skye ba sgrub rgya thamal// gsung ba dri ming rtags dka' dgal smra bzhidi stod nga nus pazhin min// rang gi so mos stobs bzhin 'jug pa la sogs sa 
5b5(rgyud 'grel): tshigs dag/ mi shes chu bos g.yengs shing gsung gi nyid khu bdud rtsi rnal 'byor bral// de phyir rgyal bas gsungs po'i thugs kyi gsang ba 'di// kun du rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs kyi spyod yul thun mong 
5b6(rgyud 'grel): ma yin yang // goms pa'i mthu yis mi 'gal tshul du tshad ma ngag las rab bsgrubs te// 'gro ba'i don du mi gnyis lam mchog 'di ni rab bgyis pas// skye bos skye gnas thams cad du yang skad 
5b7(rgyud 'grel): cig tra// mi mthun phyogs kyis mi nyams rgyal ba kun gyis thugs 'di rab rgyas shog/ rdzogs so// // 'dzem dpal ba shes gnyen gyis mdzad do// / ya gapangs pa nga 
5b8(rgyud 'grel): ga sa du/ # / da/ phags pa 'jam dpal kyi mtshan 
6a1(rgyud 'grel): dag par brjod pa'i cho ga mdo dang bsres pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes sku can gtsug gi nor bu mtshan// sangs rgyas gzugs kyi tshul 
6a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas kun la khyab// lam mchog dam pa ston pa sman pa'i mchog/ sdug bsngal bdud 'dral 'jab mgon phyag 'tshal te// mtshan brjod bdud mdzod shin tu rtogs dka' ba// bdag blo man pas
6a3(rgyud 'grel): dgrol bar mi nus kyang // dad pas phyogs bzung thigs pas nor bu gcig/ lung dang man ngag dag la brten pa bshad// theg pa rnams kyi gzhir 'gyur ba// dus gsum rnams kyi lam mchog 
6a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul dang ni// slob dpon rnams kyi dgongs pa yis// theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis// dpag bsam shing chen 'dir phyogs tsam// ye shes las can 'jam 
6a5(rgyud 'grel): dpal gcig pur grub// mdo dang bsres pa'i cho ga rim pa ste// de la dang po sgrub pa po rigs dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir yin// gzhan yang dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin ston ces pa mtshan 
6a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang ldan pa dang // dbang thob par ston to// gzhan yang gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs zhes pa dang / bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur// ji skad smras pa de bzhin byung // ces pas 
6a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i snod du rung bar bstan/ yon tan las ri dang cha klung dang / nags tshang tshi ngan 'dug kyang rung / zhes pa dang gnas rig pa dang ldan pa'i yid dga' ba ston to// bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la/ zhes 
6a8(rgyud 'grel): sa bskab dus gza' dang rgyas dang / nyi ma shes pa la bye ba 'jim pa bstan to// dpal ldan 'a byeng ba phranas mtshogs// zhes pas bsgrub papa rdzas sa don dam rab tu gnas par bya ba dang / maN+Dal 
6b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum dang me tog dang / dri'i byug pa dang mchod bya'i khyad par mang po dang / blo brtan pa dang yo byad dang / tshogs par bya ba'i rim pa bstan to// yon tan las ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i rgyal po 
6b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa dang / gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal zhes pas mtshams kyi rim pa/ hUM mtshan ma las khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed mdo nag pa zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa/ thod dbyug 
6b3(rgyud 'grel): dang sdigs mdzub byed pa/ sbrul dang thod pas brgyan pa bskyed la/ ya mAn+ta ka hUM zhes pa dang / mig tu ma dang Ta bkod de/ 'od zer gyi rdo rje'i ra ba dang / dra ba bya bar bstan to// snying rje chen po'i 
6b4(rgyud 'grel): blo yi mchog ces pa dang / phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa/ zhes pas/ sems can gyi don du bdag gis 'jam dpal thob par bya'o zhes sems bskyed par ston to// gnyis med 
6b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med par ston ces pa/ a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ ces pas thogs pa med pa'i byang chub kyi sems thabs dang shes rab kyi brdar gyur pa'i snying kar ye shes sems dpa' bsam
6b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba ston to// bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog/ ces pa dang / mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gis gnas// rtag tu rim gro bya bab thos// bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'i mchog/ phyag byar/ 
6b7(rgyud 'grel): 'os pa bla ma'i bdag ces pa 'di ston to// bdag gi snying kar a dang hUMbasams te/ de las 'od 'phros pas bla ma dang / dkon mchog gsum dang / rje bdu na 'jam dpal dang / dkyil 'khor gyi 
6b8(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams spyan drangs nas/ bdag gis bltas te/ lus kyi bkod pa yan lag gsum bskor ba byas te phyag byas la bstod do// bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog/ ces pa dang / dpag bsam shing chen/ 
7a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa ste/ zhes pas mchod pa'i khyad par nam mkha' ltar mnyam par bsgrubs la/ snying kha'i lha mos dbul lo zhes ston to// sbyin bdag chen po'i gtso bo ste// tshul khrims
7a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po 'chang ba'i mchog/ bzod chen 'chang ba ston pa po// brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yi// zhes pa 'dis ston te/ sngags dang phyag rgya dang ldan pas/ bdag gi snying ka nas lha mo bzhi spros te/ 
7a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa rnams gsum du mchod par bya'o// de bas na dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che// dga' chen rol mo chen po ste// bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs zhes pas ston to// bsam 
7a4(rgyud 'grel): gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas/ zhes bya ba dang / smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste/ zhes bya ba dang / byang chub yan lag me tog spos zhes bya bas/ phyi'i lha mo bzhi ste snying kha nas gong gi tshul du
7a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas gnas su 'bul lo// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/ zhes pa nas/ dga' ba chen po mgu ba che zhes pa'i bar gyis/ gsang ba bzhi mchog tu gsang ba
7a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhis bstan to// oM rdo rje sems dpa' brdzus pa na/ rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pas/ rdo rje las kun byed pa'o// zhes bya ba 'di'i rkang pa dang / gsar ba'i mchod pa'i dus 
7a7(rgyud 'grel): su sgeg mo la sogs pa dang / rim pa bzhin du rkang pa bzhi dang glu blang bar bya'o// gzhan yang mchog tu gsang ba'i mchod pa dang / chags pa la sogs pas dbul lo// rgyas par ma phye'o// 
7a8(rgyud 'grel): zhes bstan to// de nas 'dud nyi shus bstod de/ yang na ni thams cad kyang bstod par shes par bya'o// de nas sdom pa bzung ba'i mthar yang de nyid kyis shes par bya'o// byams pa dang snying 
7b1(rgyud 'grel): rje ni shin tu gsal bar ston pas/ tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms zhes so// rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad/ yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid// yang dag mtha' de yi ge med// chos dbyings 
7b2(rgyud 'grel): dam pa zad min bdag/ ces pas de'i don sgom pa ni// rang bzhin dag pa'i sngags brjod do// phyi dang nang gi dngos po stong par bsgom zhes ston to// stong nyid dam pa 'dod chags blo// srid 
7b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa ste/ zhes pas pad ma'i steng na dngos gzhi las langs te/ dang po dam tshig sems dpa' sgom pa dang / chos kyi 'byung nas/ de'i tham 'od zer lngas bskor ba'i 
7b4(rgyud 'grel): nang du// bar ma zla ba'i steng na mu dmar skya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phreng bar 'gyur ba las/ sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar// 'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i bo gnyi ma shar ka'i dkyil 
7b5(rgyud 'grel): ltar mdzes// sen mo'i 'od ni shin tu domar// cod pan bzang po thon ka'i rtse// skra mchog mthon ka chen po can// zur phud lnga pa me tog thod// rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan// sdug gu 
7b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum na mdzes// shes rab ral gri mda' gzu thogs// rdo rje dkyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas// dpal ldan sgeg dang bsregs par ldan// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 
7b7(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba// nyon mongs g.yul du gcig dpa' ba// zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis// rje btsun gyi sku sprul pa'i cha lugs bstan pa yin no// phyag rgya bzhi yi don bstan pa zhes bya bas/ 
7b8(rgyud 'grel): yum bzhi'i phyag rgya sgru ba phro ba du dang bcas pas byin gyis brlab par bstan to// phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyod// ces pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo dang lha mo rnams 
8a1(rgyud 'grel): / thugs kar spros zhes pa'o// de nas mdun du pad ma dang zla ba la// ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ dbang bsrung ba dang mchod pa dang / bstod pa gong bzhin du byas te/ ye shes 
8a2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' bltas la dgug cing rang gi lus la bsgoms zhes pas gnyis su med par bya'o// rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal// sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan can// zhes pas snying ka'i 
8a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyis bskal te/ bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bas rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ldan zhes bstan to// sbal pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang / zhes pas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la// sngags 
8a4(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du sangs rgyas thams cad sbal la zhes ston to// de'i don ni 'oganas 'chad do// bdag rigs gzhan rigs thams cad pas// shes dang shes bya'i 
8a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag po mchog/ ce sa pa thams cad sems kyi sprul par shes par bya'o// de ltar rdzogs pa dang / gsang sngags zlos pa dang / mtshan klog par byas te/ de ltar yon tan brjod pa las kyang / 
8a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa gang la la/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' thams cad su gnyis su med pa'i don dam pa'i ming yang dag par brjod pa'i
8a7(rgyud 'grel): ming ni/ gtsug gi nor bu'ang thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / ma nyams shing lhag chad med par tshigs su bcad pa'i tshig dang yi ga bu 'di dag nyid kyi nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du 'chang 
8a8(rgyud 'grel): ba'am/ klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dgal yang dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang / ming gi don gang yang rung ba rong nas kyang 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i skul 
8b1(rgyud 'grel): dmigs te zhes bya ba dang / sems rtse gcig tu bsgom pa de la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang yon tan las/ nyin re bzhin du dus gsum du mnyam par yi dam du lan gsum 'don 
8b2(rgyud 'grel): tam/ glegs bam du byas pa la klog cing brjod la/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan la dmigs shing / gzugs dang gnyis su mthun par bsam gtan 
8b3(rgyud 'grel): du byed pa ni/ 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir ring po mi thogs par de nyid du sprul pa'i gzugs kyi lus mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin te/ mtshan nyid kyi cho ga rdzogs shing / dmigs pa yun 
8b4(rgyud 'grel): ring du gnas pa des/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la/ many+dzu shrI h+na oM wA gi shwa ri muM/ maN+Dal tsakra hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rnam par sprul la/ phyag 
8b5(rgyud 'grel): sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa la sogs pas bdag gi lus de dang mnyam par sprul te/ mtshan gyi don re re nas bstod na/ yon tan gyi rnam 'di ltar smos pas bdag gzhan dpag tu med par 'byung bar 
8b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// mdor na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring por mi thogs par dam pas baM sngags pa thob par 'gyur ro// dam pa brgyud pa'i bla ma bdud rtsi 'thung // 'gro ba sdug bsngal nad kyis gzir 'gyur 
8b7(rgyud 'grel): la// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstod tshig 'di// sman pa'i rgyal po bzhin du bdag gis bshad// 'phrod pa'i sman bzhin kun la phan 'gyur nas// mi rtog ye shes 'chi med thob par 
8b8(rgyud 'grel): shog/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo'i don mdor bsdus pa'i chog/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ spu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud le'u waM 
9a1(rgyud 'grel): drug stong pa las/ rdo rje glu gar blangs pa'i le'u'i sgrub thabs mdo dang bsres pa rdzogs so// @#// gas kyi ka' 'bres don 'chung sgomam9 wA# 
9a2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje dang ni shes rab gnyis// sangs rgyas kun ltar gnyis med pa// dam pa lam ston lta bu yi// sku 
9a3(rgyud 'grel): yi rnam par 'char mdzad pa// 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// slob mas legs par rtogs phyir dang // bdag nyid kyis kyang dran bya'i phyir// gsang ldan dka' 'grel 'dir brtsam bya// 
9a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas dkyus nyid la 'jug par bya ste// gang 'di la sogs pa'i tshig rkang pa bzhis mchod par brjod pa ston te/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo nyid du bzhugs 
9a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yin la/ de la slob dpon nyid lus ngag yid gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal ba bstan pa'o// zab cing la sogs pa rkang pa bzhis bshad par dam bca' ston pa te/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan zab ci 
9a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya che ba'i mtshan rnal 'byor ci'i rgyud la brten nas/ gzhan dang bdag gi don du 'gyur ba'i phyir bshad pa'o// thig le bcu drug mi shigs dbus la sogs pa rkang pa bcu drug gis gang la zhus pa dang // 
9a7(rgyud 'grel): gang gis zhus pa dang / gang gi don du zhus pa ston pa las/ gang la zhus na sku gsum la zhus pa ston te/ thig le la sogs pa rkang pa bdun gyis chos sku bstan/ gsang sngags la sogs pa rkang pa 
9a8(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis longs su bstan la/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa rkang pa gnyis kyis sprul sku bstan/ byang chub la sogs pa rkang pa bzhis gang gis zhus pa bston cing blo zhan don phyir rim pa gsungs/ zhes pa 
9b1(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa gcig gis gang gi don du zhus pa bstan pa'o// de ltar slad kyi don bstan nas gzhung la 'jug par bya ste/ gang gis gang du thabs ji ltar bya ba dang gsum du gnas pa las/ de la dang por rdo rje 
9b2(rgyud 'grel): 'chang chen por// slob dpon cha lugs gnas byas te/ zhes pa rkang pa gnyis kyis gang zag gang gis bya ba ston te/ slob dpon rig pa'i gnas lnga la sbyangs pa/ de nyid bcu shes shing 'jigs 
9b3(rgyud 'grel): pa med pas cha rkyen lnga dang ldan par bya ste/ phyi nang gi khrus dang / phyi nang gi bsrung ba dang / phyi nang gi gos bgo ba dang / phyi nang gi byug pa dang / gnas dang stan sngags chus bsangs la 'dug pa'o// 
9b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan dang ni rjes 'thun par la sogs pa'i rkang pa drug gis gnas dang bsnyen pa ston pa la/ gnas ni rkang pa lnga yis ston te/ zla yis phye ba gnyis te/ bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa'i gnas so// 
9b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i sgras ni sgrub pa'i gnas bsdu'o// der chag chag skyar nul bya zhing me tog gis nyams dga' bar bya'o// grogs bzang btsal la snyen pa brtsam zhes pa rkang pa gcig gis bsnyen pa bya bar dam 
9b6(rgyud 'grel): bca' ba bstan pa'o// bdag dang sa gzhi yongs sung zhing la sogs pa rkang pa bzhis tshogs gsog pa'i bar chod bsrung ba bstan te/ rdo rje 'chang hUM mdzad du bsgyur la// g.yas dang g.yon gser gyi 
9b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa khro zhing rngam pa'i thugs khar ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM sngon po bsams la de las 'od byung bas rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang ra ba dang gur dang bla res dang dra bar gyur par bsam mo// 
9b8(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa la dga' ba rnams kyis ni/ spu 'phrul dra ba'i rjesu 'thang ba'am/ rdo rje rtse mo dag gi rje mu 'bring ba las shes par bya'o// 'dir ni tha ma'i man ngag bsdus pa'o// de nas shin du rtser ldan pas/ sbyin sreg 
10a1(rgyud 'grel): gis ni mnyes par bya zhes pa rkang pa gnyis kyis tshogs gsog pa'i yo byad sprul pa ston te/ de la spyir sbyang zhing bsreg pa dang / so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya byin gyis brlab bo// spyir sbyang zhing bsreg
10a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin nam/ rdo rje rtse mo yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus bsang gtor bya ba ni spyir sbyang ba'o// rdo rje me'i sngags dang phyag rgya mi gtsang ba la sogs pa bsregs pa ni sreg pa'o// so so'i sngags dang phyag 
10a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas byin gyis brlab pa ni/ til dang nas dang ku sha dang / 'bras yos dang dri bzang po dang / me tog dkar po dang ldan pa'i mchod yon la sngon du rdo rje'i gar byas la rdo rje'i thal mo kha phye ba'i mchod yon gyi phyag rgya 
10a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa la/ oM a ra pa tsa na ya te na ma 'am/ oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ lan gsum mam bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gis byin gyis brlab bo// de bzhin du me tog dang spos dang mar me dang dri dang byug pa dang lha bshos 
10a5(rgyud 'grel): dang gtor ma la sogs pa rnams mi'i las 'das nas/ lha'i mchod rdzas khyad par can du bsam mo// de bzhin du sbyin sreg la yang bza' ba zas kyi mchod pa zhes bya ste/ gzhung bzhin du bsham zhing byin 
10a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab bo// sngon du bsnyen pa rab 'bad de/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa rkang pa bco lngas rten gyi zhing sprul par ston te/ de yang sngon du bsnyen pa zhes pa rkang pa bzhi rten gyi zhing na mkha' la sprul par dam bca' 
10a7(rgyud 'grel): bar ston la/ lag pa'i 'du byed ces pa rkang pa bcu gcig gis rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid kyi lus ngag yid kyi sbyor bas zhing spyan drangs pa ston te/ de yang bdag gis g.yas dang g.yon gyi sor mo la oM AH 
10a8(rgyud 'grel): hUM trAM hrIHlnga bkod la/ de nas mdzub mo gnyis mthe chung gnyis so sor mdud la de bkan la/ oM badz+ra tsakra hUM zhes brjod cing byon par bsams mo// gang byon zhe na rigs lnga 'am gcig gam drug gam 
10b1(rgyud 'grel): rigs gsum mdun gyi na mkha' la byon pa'o// gang gis byon zhe na/ lus ngag yid kyi sbyor bas so// de ltar mkha' la zhes pa rkang pa gnyis kyis bdag dang zhing du 'brel par bya ba ston te/ mdun gyi dkyil 
10b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi lha de rnams yang bem po lta bu ma yin te/ rig pa can spyan rtsa rig rig pa snyan cha khrol khrol par bsam pa'o// dga' ba'i mchod pa glu yis bstod ces pa tshigs bcad sum cu rtsa lngas cho ga dag pa yan 
10b3(rgyud 'grel): lag bcu'i sgo nas bsod nams kyi tshogs gsag par bya ba ston te/ de yang dag pas mchod ces pa rkang pa lngas phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams thams cad la 
10b4(rgyud 'grel): rjes su ri rang ba dang / mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdag dbul ba dang / dngos grub blang ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang dgu ste/ de yang rtsa ba'i 
10b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kyi rjes su 'bribrang ba dang sku 'phrul dra ba'i rjes su 'breng ba las shes par bya ste/ tshigs bcad sngags dang phyag rgya yis me tog la sogs pa rnam pa lnga phul/ oM badz+ra lA s+ya hUM/ oM badz+ra mA le trAM/ oM badz+ra
10b6(rgyud 'grel): gI tI tI/ oM badz+ra nid+hI a/ oM badz+ra sarba su sa gra haM/ badz+ra rat+na ma nut+tA ra/ badz+ra d+ha mA ka ya ne/ badz+ra ka rA ka rod+ha be/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe hUM/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe trAM/ oM badz+ra A lo ke hrIH/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he aM/ sgeg ma 
10b7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs mchod pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod la/ oM sarbata thA ga tA Adz+nyA nA~M nin+yata na pU dza s+pha ra Da ka ma badzi a/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta Adz+nyA nAMn+ti d+yata na pU dza s+pha ra Na kar+m+ma gri dzi/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta Adz+nyA nA 
10b8(rgyud 'grel): nin+na tA rA rA ga Na pU dza swa ra Na ka ma bAn hU~MH/ oM sarbata thA ka ta Ar+thA nA ni drA ta ni sA d+hu kar pU dza s+khad Na ka ma duSh+Ti a/ oM na maH sarba ta thA ga ti ka yA b+he She ki rat+ne bo badz+ra ma ne a~M/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga Na 
11a1(rgyud 'grel): sUr+ye b+h+yo bar+d+ha ti dza ni dz+wa la hri/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA sha pa ri pU ra Na tsin+d+ra ma ni d+ha dz+nyA the b+h+yo badz+ra d+ha dzA gr-i dzaM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pri ti pra mo ru ka ra b+h+yo badz+ra hA s+ya ha/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA nu raH 
11a2(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra d+harma ta sa ma ti/ b+hi su no mi mahA d+ha ma shrI d+hi/ oM sarba ta thA ka ta pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA ne d+ha ra~M sun ma mahA g+hoShArbak+tsi d+ha/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta tsakA k+Sha ra pe ri brta d+hi sarba surbAn+tan ya~M sU mo me sarba maN+Da le hUM/ oM saH 
11a3(rgyud 'grel): tathA ga ta san+na b+ha Sha bud+d+ha saM g+hI hai/ b+hi yaM sU no mi badz+ra badz+re baM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa me g+ha s+pha ra Na bu dza karma ka ra ka ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pra sawa ra Na pU dzA kArme ki ri ki raM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta A 
11a4(rgyud 'grel): ke dz+wa la swa ra~M Na pU dza karma bar bar/ oM sarba ta thA ga d+ha sa mu tra s+pha ra Na pU dza kam ku ru ku ru/ zhes bya ba sems dpa' bcu drug dang 'dra ba'i reg ma las kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyis mchod par bya'o// 
11a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i phyag rgya ni 'di rnams te/ rdo rje bsdams pa skur bzhag ste bcings la/ gnyis su byas pa'i khu tshur gnyis// bsgyings bcas gsor la gnyi ka yis// lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang // mda' 'phar 
11a6(rgyud 'grel): ba yi tshul dang ni// legs so zhes pa snying khang bzhag/ dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis// snying khar nyi ma bstan par bya// g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs// de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya// g.yas pa 
11a7(rgyud 'grel): yis ni g.yon pa dbye// snying khar g.yon pa ral gri bdud// mgal mo'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang // rdo rje gnyi ka kha nas dpung // rdo rje gar bskor bkrol ba yi// thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor bzhag/ go cha mthe chung 
11a8(rgyud 'grel): mche ba dang // khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o// de nas phyogs thams cad nas dkyil 'khor la yan lag lngas phyag btsal bar bsam zhing 'dis phyag bya ba ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya la kri d+ha brapran men badz+ra dan+t+ra na ka 
11b1(rgyud 'grel): ro mi/ de nas phyag bzhi bya ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs nas rdo rje thal mo rkyang ba lus thams cad pha ba ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza ba s+thA nA ya At+ma nAM nir+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa d+hi tiSh+Tha sA mAM/ zhes bya 
11b2(rgyud 'grel): ba 'dis phyag bya'o// de nas lho phyogs nas de bzhin du gnas pa las rdo rje thal mo snying khar sbyar te/ dpral ba sa la reg par byas la/ oM sarba ta thA ga te pU dzA be She ka ya At+ma nAM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta 
11b3(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra rat+na b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ zhes pa 'dis phyag bya'o// de nas nub phyogs nas ji skad bshad pa bzhin rdo rje thal mo spyi bor bzhag ste kha sa la reg pa dang / oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra brti nA ya At+mat+mA nAM nir+yA ta yA mi/ 
11b4(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma pra brda ya mAM/ zhes bya ba 'dis phyag bya'o// de nas byang phyogs nas de bzhin du gnas pa las rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab ste/ snying khar sbyar la spyi bo sa la reg par byas te/ oM 
11b5(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karma Ne At+mA nAM nin+na ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma ku ru maM/ zhes bya ba 'dis phyag bya'o// de nas me tog gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gar yang 'jig rten gyi 
11b6(rgyud 'grel): khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi me tog gi bye brag yid las byung ba 'am/ chu las skyes pa 'am/ thar las skyes pa gang dag yod pa de dag rnams 'di 
11b7(rgyud 'grel): lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / 
11b8(rgyud 'grel): snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang / rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye tAM/ bdud pa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di 
12a1(rgyud 'grel): skad ces brjod par bya'o// gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi bdug pa'i bye brag lhan cig pa 'am/ yang dag par sbyar ba'am/ yongs su 
12a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang / 
12a3(rgyud 'grel): bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ mar 
12a4(rgyud 'grel): me'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi snang ba'i bye brag yid las byung ba 'am/ 
12a5(rgyud 'grel): rin po che'i 'od dam mar me'i snang ba la sogs pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang 
12a6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas pa thams cad dang / snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ke pU dza me g+ha sa 
12a7(rgyud 'grel): mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ dri'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi dri'i 
12a8(rgyud 'grel): bye brag lhan cig skyes pa'am/ yang dag par sbyar ba'am yongs su gyur pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i 
12b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par
12b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha bA dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas bzhad pa'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi 
12b3(rgyud 'grel): khams 'di'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi rgod pa dang sgeg pa dang dga' ba dang rtse 'jo'i bde ba'i bye brag gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ 
12b4(rgyud 'grel): ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang 
12b5(rgyud 'grel): snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ha s+ye lA s+ye ra ti kri Ta sau khyA nut+ta ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ bzhad pa'i 
12b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya de nyid thal mo bskor ba 'di spyi bo bzhag la/ yang thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba bcings nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 
12b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ dpag bsam gyi shing ngam gos kyi shing gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya 
12b8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par 
13a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o// oM sarba ta thA ga tA nut+ta ra bo d+hu laM ka ra bas+t+ra pU dza me g+ha sa mudra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sgeg mo'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ 
13a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad yo byad thams cad kyi yang dag par 'byor cing phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'dod pa tsam la ra ka lus par gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA badz+rod+b+ha ba dA na pA ra mi 
13a3(rgyud 'grel): tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje phreng ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' thams 
13a4(rgyud 'grel): cad dang yang dag par bral bar gyur cig/ dge ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA nut+ta ra ma hA bo d+hi ha ra shI la pA ra mi ta 
13a5(rgyud 'grel): pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje glu mkhan ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad kyis lus la yang dag par brgyan 
13a6(rgyud 'grel): par byas pa dang / rtag tu phan tshun 'jigs pa med pa dang / zhes 'gras pa med par bzhugs shing mig dang yid mngon par dga' ba dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA/ 
13a7(rgyud 'grel): nut+ta ra ma hA d+harmA wa bo d+hi k+ShAn+ti bA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra NA sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje gar mkhan ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 
13a8(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas nyid du yongs su gzhol zhing 'khor ba yongs su mi spong ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta saM sa rA pa ri 
13b1(rgyud 'grel): d+ha kA nut+ta ra ma hA bIr+ya pU ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am/ gang yang 
13b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ rin po che'i ri bo 'am/ rgya mtsho'i rin po che'i tshogs gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i 
13b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang phyag rgya dang
13b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bo d+h+yaM ga rat+na le ka ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs pas 
13b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bkram pa/ brgya stong la sogs pa'i grangs snyed dam/ 'byor pa ci yod pa ltar dbul bar bya ba dang / ro brgya pa'i lhag pa'i zhal zas dang / swasti ka la sogs pa'i bza' ba rnam pa sna 
13b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs 'bum mam brgya stong snyed dbul bar bya ste/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ Ad+ya nut+pan+na twAta zhes brjod pa dbul bar bya'o// rol mo bcu phrag stong ngam rol mo brgya phrag stong ngam/ rol mo bcu/ 
13b7(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM hriHmngon par zlas la dbul bar bya'o// rnam pa bcu ni 'di lta ste/ gling bu dang / pi wang dang / rdza rnga dang / rdza rnga chung ngu dang / cha lang dang rnga bo che dang / mr-i taM ga dang / rnga ring dang / rnga skad nyeg dang / 
13b8(rgyud 'grel): ta mi la zhes bya'o// shin tu brtags pa'i rta dang / glang po che dang ba lang gi khyu rnams kyang / oM badz+ra s+pha ra Na khaM zhes bya bas mngon par bzlas la dbul bar bgyi'o// chos thams cad ni dngos po 
14a1(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par lhag par mos pa byas la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ya pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ 
14a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs te/ rdo rje thal mo snying khar sbyar nas sdig pa thams cad bshags par bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems 
14a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dgasang sngags dang / rig sngags 
14a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi lha thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming rdo rje 'di zhes bya ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang rin po che dang / 
14a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha thams cad kyi spyan sngar sdig pa thams cad bla na med par so sor bshags pas so sor bshags par 
14a6(rgyud 'grel): bgyi'o// phyogs btsun 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos yang dag par song ba dang // 
14a7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / sems can thams cad kyi tshogs thams cad kyi bsod nams thams cad la rgya cher rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 
14a8(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bskor bar mi mdzad pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i phyir bskul bar bgyi'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar bzhed pa gang yin pa de dag 
14b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol 'tshal lo// de nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid dbul gyis/ bdag dus thams 
14b2(rgyud 'grel): cad dang rnam pa thams cad du so sor bzhes su gsol// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub bdag la stsal du gsol// bdag gi dge ba'i las 
14b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'di dag gis// 'jig rten du ni myur du sangs rgyas shog/ 'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston bgyid cing // sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir las dgrol// zhes bla na med pa yang dag/ 
14b4(rgyud 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la// de nas bstod pa 'khrugs sdeb par bya ste// tshigs bcad glu yis bstod par bya// byang chub sems ni rab 'byung ba'i// zhes bya ba la sogs pa 
14b5(rgyud 'grel): tshigs bcad sum cu rtsa gnyis dang rkang pa gcig gis bstod pa ston pa ni/ tshigs bcad glu yis bstod par bya// byang chub sems ni rang 'byung ba'i// 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// 
14b6(rgyud 'grel): don chen yi ge dam pa yin// mchog sprin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad cha// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste// rdo rje chags pa 
14b7(rgyud 'grel): khyod la 'dud// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// gdong drug mig drug lag drug po// mche gtsigs gdong brgya kun 'dul ba// sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud// yang dag bdag med de bzhin 
14b8(rgyud 'grel): stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// med pa las byung khyod la 'dud// 'dod pa'i don grub ngan song sbyong // mgon po nyon mongs dra ba 'joms// sa gzhi tshangs gnas da 
15a1(rgyud 'grel): pas gnon// sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas byang chub rtog bya ba// thil le chen po yi ge med// longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal// sangs rgyas rol ston khyod / 
15a2(rgyud 'grel): la 'dud// me long ye shes ngo bo nyid// a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ khong nas byung ba skye ba med// sems ma rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud// mnyam nyid ye shes ngo bo nyid// a ni 'byung ba 'gog 
15a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ste// tshig du brjod pa rnam spangs pa// rin chen 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// so sor kun rtog ngo bo nyid// a ni brjod pa'i rgyu yin te// brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog/ chos kyi rdo rje 'dzum khyod 'dud// 
15a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba nan tan ngo bo nyid// a ni tshig 'bru gsal bar byed// tshig kun gsal bar byed pa yin// rdo rje dra ba khyod la 'dud// stong pa rang bzhin 'dod chags che// sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 
15a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dud// phyi nyid ma grub bde ba che// sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud// gnyi ga med par dga' ba che// sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud// stong pa'i don ldan mgu ba che// sangs rgyas 
15a6(rgyud 'grel): dgyes pa khyod la 'dud// gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste// sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud// kha dog che la gzi brjid ldan// med pa las byung khyod la 'dud// ming chen mtshan bzang 
15a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya che ba// sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// bzhad cing dkyil 'khor yangs khyab pa// sangs rgyas bzhad pa khyod la 'dud// chos kyi shes rab mtshon byang ba// sangs rgyas 
15a8(rgyud 'grel): gsung ba khyod la 'dud// nyon mongs dra ba gcod pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// grags pa rdo rje rgyu yi bdag/ nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud// sdang ba 
15b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po gsal ba che// ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud// mkhas shing 'phrul 'chang rdo rje las// sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud// sgyu 'phrul chen po go cha sra// sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud// 
15b2(rgyud 'grel): sgyu phrul bdag nyid gnod sbyin gtso// thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud// sgyu 'phrul khu tshur bsten zhing bsdud// ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud// sbyin padag chen po'i gtso bo ste// rdo rje sgeg ma 
15b3(rgyud 'grel): khyod la 'dud// tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog/ rdo rje dpal 'phreng khyed la 'dud// bzod chen 'ching bston pa po// rdo rje dbyangs mkhan khyod la 'dud// brtson 'grus chen po brdul ba 'i 
15b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gang mkhan khyod la 'dud// bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas// rdo rje me tog khyod la 'dud// shes rab chen po lus 'tshang ba// rdo rje bdug pa khrod la 'dud// smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste/ 
15b5(rgyud 'grel): mar me gsal la 'dud// stobs po che la thabs che ba// rdo rje dag byed khyod la 'dud// rdo rje lcags kyu 'dren pa che// rdo rje 'gugs byed khyod la 'dud// rdo rje zhags pa rnam par rgyal// rdo rje 'dren byed 
15b6(rgyud 'grel): khyod la 'dud// rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa che// rdo rje sdom byed khyod la 'dud// rdo rje 'bebs pa rnam rgyal zhags// rdo rje 'bebs pa khyod la 'dud// byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med// snying rje 
15b7(rgyud 'grel): chen po blo yi mchog/ shes rab chen po blo chen ldan// mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba// ye shes cha grub sems dpa'i tshogs// stong pa nyid kyi sgor gnas pa// bag la nyal la byams sems can 
15b8(rgyud 'grel): shes rab snying rjer ldan la 'dud// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs dang ldan// shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste// rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa'o// 
16a1(rgyud 'grel): stobs chen rdzu 'phrul bzhir ldan pa'i// goms shugs ye shes bzhir ldan pa// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing stobs kyis gnon// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa khyod la 'dud// 
16a2(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms// mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'dzin// drag po chen po mun pa 'joms// 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa'o// phung po lnga dag lha chen 'dul// mi shes ri 'joms sku 
16a3(rgyud 'grel): bababo// mya ngan kun sel drag po ste// che bas che ba khyod la 'dud// mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste// bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog/ theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi 
16a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ 'khor ba mya ngan skyob pa'i mchog/ theg pa'i tshul mchog lam gnas pa'i// phyag rgya'i mchog tu grub byed pa'i// pha rol sa bcu gtso la 'dud// bdud nyi shu dang spri bstod kyis 
16a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang bstod// de ltar bstod pa byed pa de// 'khor lo 'dud pa'i gtso mchog 'grub// zhes pa rkang pa gnyis kyis bstod pa byas pa'i phan yon ston te/ de ltar bstod pas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong 
16a6(rgyud 'grel): gi dngos grub thams cad dang mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro// dgyes nas bdag la lha rnams kyis// snyan pa'i tshig gis bstod par bsam// zhes bya ba rkang pa gnyis kyis/ 
16a7(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams kyis bdag la bstod par ston to// lha rnams thams cad kyi zhal nas rigs kyi bu ba dag gzhan gyi don du lha rnams lce bstod pa legs so// legs so zhes gsungs par bsam mo// drin 
16a8(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis slar bstod pa// zhes pa rkang pa gcig gis slar lha rnams la bdag gis drin la lan gyi tshul gyis bstod pa thams cad dam/ 'dud nyi shus bstod pa'o// de dag ni mchog gi rgyal po sbyor ba dang 
16b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin to// zhes rkang pa gcig gis sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa'o// de nas rim pa 'di ldan pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshig bcad nyi shu 
16b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad rkang pa gsum gyis yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ston te/ phyag bya zhing smon pa byang chub mchog gi sems bskyed sdom pa bzung ba dang / 'jug pa byang chub mchog gi sems bskyed pa/ ye/ 
16b3(rgyud 'grel): shes lnga bsgom pa ston te/ go sla ba'i phyir 'dir ma spros so// de nas de la mngon 'byung gzugs// zhes pa nas/ de dag ni gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin to// zhes bya ba'i bar gyi sa gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin ston te/ 
16b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang mchod rten dang chos 'byung dang rgya bra ma dang / gzhal yas khang dang gdan rnams bskyed pa ston pa'o// de yang de ni yi ge rdzogs pa las zhes bya bas chos 'byung nang du yi ge a kha dog sna tshogs pa'am 
16b5(rgyud 'grel): kha dog dkar pos sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par 'grel to// de yang slob dpon la la dag rgya gram khong du 'dod la/ 'dir sa gzhi'i tshul du brtag par bya'o// de nas rkyen gyis slong ba ni/ zhes 
16b6(rgyud 'grel): pa nas dang po'i sangs rgyas sgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes pa'i bar gyis gzhi'i sangs rgyas dang / dang po'i sangs rgyas bskyed pa bstan pa'o// de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal lnga pa 
16b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ni// shar la sogs pa'i zhal bzhi ni sngon po dang / ser po dang dmar po dang / ljang gu rnams so// steng gi zhal rnams ni lha zhal dkar po'am/ rta zhal dkar po la rdog ma sngon po can no// dang / 
16b8(rgyud 'grel): po'i sangs rgyas thugs ka ru pra zhes pa nas de dag ni rigs kyi dbang gis 'khor lo'i rim pa bstan pa yin no// zhes bya ba'i bar gyis shes rab kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa rnams ston te/ rigs kyi dbang 
17a1(rgyud 'grel): gis 'khor lo bdun 'gyur du shes par bya'o// da ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i ngo bo gsang sngags kyi sgo nas de dag gi rim pa bskyed par bya ste/ zhes pa na sa de dag ni dkyil 
17a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin to// zhes pa'i bar gyis lha bsgom zhing dbyung ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog skyed pa bstan pa ste/ dkyus ma nyid gsal ba'i phyir 'dir ma dgrol lo// 
17a3(rgyud 'grel): 'on kyang sngags don rnam par gzigs pa las dkyi la 'khor drag tu gsungs pa dang / gsang ldan 'di nyid las sngon du shes rab kyi 'khor lo bdun la gyur du gsungs pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lhag 
17a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang bshad par bya ste/ mtshan brjod pa'i gsung rab kyi mtshan brjod pas/ dkyil 'khor ba rnams rdzogs par bskyed pa'am/ yang na rdo rje 'khor lo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas cig car du sprul pa'o// 
17a5(rgyud 'grel): de yang thabs thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis dang / thabs khyad par gyi dkyil 'khor lnga dang bdun du shes par bya'o// gsang ldan 'di'i dkyil 'khor ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i khongs su bsdu'o// 
17a6(rgyud 'grel): khyad par ni gzhal yas khang sgo gnyis pa'o// de nas las kyi khyad par yang bskyed pa'i zhar las byung ba ste/ sgra las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas/ 'di ru bdag gis ma bshad do// las kyi khyad par 
17a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes pas/ las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bstan pa ste/ de nas las kyi khyad par yang // bskyed pa'i zhar las byung ba ste// zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bskyed nas las 
17a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bsgom par dam bcas pa'o// sgra las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas// 'di ru bdag gis ma bshad do// zhes bya ba las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa bla mas zhes bya 
17b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don te/ bla ma'i man ngag ni bcu'i sgo nas shes par bya ste/ sgo bzhi'i dbye ba dang rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas bsdu ba dang mdun gyi nam mkha' la ye shes sems dpa' byon te/ dam tshig
17b2(rgyud 'grel): gi dkyil 'khor la phyag btsal ba dang / ched du brjod pa dang / spyi'i gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa dang / skon bkur gyi gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbar nod pa dang / ye shes bstim pa dang / phyag 
17b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gdab pa dang / lha las sbyar ba'i rim par shes par bya'o// de las de yang las mkhan rang byed la/ sgo bzhi dbye ba ni/ dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal gyi sdig mdzub kyi se gol gtog cing // 
17b4(rgyud 'grel): phreng sngags brjod pas sgo bzhi dbye bar bsam mo// yang na bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'jug par bsam ste/ khro bo hUM mdzad du bsgoms la khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ mdzub mo 
17b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis lto sprang la drag tu brdab pa ni sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgya'o// oM badz+rong+tha Ta sa ma ya pra be sha ya hUM zhes brjod pas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi dbye bar bsam mo// de ni sgo dbye ba'o// de nas rang bzhin gyi
17b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bsdu ba ni/ sgrub pa po'i snying khar a las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te/ mthe bong dang mdzub mo la zla ba'i steng du dza bsams te/ lag ngar gnyis rdo rje rgya gram gyi tshul du bsnol te/ dpung 
17b7(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis su se gol gtog cing / rdo rje bsdu ba'i snying po oM badz+ra sa mA dzaHdzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod cing / mtheb mjug gi dza la sa ye shes kyi 'od zer lcags kyu lta bur 'phros te/ rang 
17b8(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyi gnas nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig pa dang 'dra ba byon par bsams mo// de yang gzhung las rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas bdag/ lag ngar gnyis ni rdo rjer bcing 
18a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje se gol brdabs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya zhes 'byung bas so// byon te phyag 'tshal ba bstan pa ni// de nas ye shes kyi dkyil
18a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyis// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wak+ShI t+ta/ pra Na men badz+ra ban+da naM ka ro me zhes 
18a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod cing dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la phyag btsal bar bsam mo// de nas ched du brjod pa ni/ e ma'o kun tu bzang po yi// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i mchog/ de bzhin gshegs
18a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'khor lo yis// dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes// zhes ched du brjed par bsam mo// de nas spyi'i gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa ni// rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor nas spyan drangs pa'i lha 
18a5(rgyud 'grel): lnga bcu rtsa gsum po thams cad dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen po'i zhugs khar zhugs nas/ spyi'i gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen po lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bsam/ 
18a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thugs kha na sa ye shes lha tshogs thon te/ nam mkha' la gnas so// de nas sgon bkur ba'i gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa ni/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad ni// rgya chen gdod 
18a7(rgyud 'grel): nas skyes pa min// rdul phran ji snyed thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur zhes brjod nas// shar phyogs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi lha tshogs ni mi bskyod pa'i thugs khar zhugs te/ mi 
18a8(rgyud 'grel): bskyod pa byin gyis brlabs nas/ mi bskyod pa'i thugs kha nas slar thon te/ rang rang gi dam tshig gi lha byin gyis brlabs par bsam mo// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang byang phyogs 
18b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang shes par bya'o// de nas dbang nod pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ste/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis dbang bskur bar bsam pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha 
18b2(rgyud 'grel): la sgrub pa pos dbang nod pa'o// dam tshig la ye shes kyis dbang bskur bar bsam pa ni/ rigs lnga la rin po che'i cod pan dang der spyangs kyis dbang bskur ba'o// de nas rigs kyi sems 
18b3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bcu drug mchod pa brgyad yum bzhi sgo ba dang sum cu rtsa gnyis la sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang ngar spangs kyis dbang bskur bsam/ bskal pa bzang po'i sems dpa' rnams la rin po 
18b4(rgyud 'grel): che'i cod pan dang dar spungs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo// de nas sgrub pa pos dbang nod pa ni lugs gnyis te/ ye shes pa rnams dam tshig pa rnams kyi thugs kha nas slar thon te/ gdan 
18b5(rgyud 'grel): re re la snang ba gnyis gnyis kyi tshul du bzhugs pa la/ sgrub pa pos rigs pa'i dbang lnga'am drug nos nas/ dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod de slar thim par bsams pa'am/ yang na dam tshig gi dkyil 
18b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chu dang 'o ma ltar gcig tu 'dres nas bzhugs pa la sgrub pa pos dbang nos par bsam mo// ye shes pa slar thon te nam mkha' la bzhugs par 
18b7(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo// de yang dbang rtags ni sgrub pa po de bzhin gshegs pa'i zlos pa po yin na rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam/ sems dpa'i zlos pa po yin na de bzhin 
18b8(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bsam mo// de nas sgrub pa po byin gyis brlab pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zlos pa po yin na yum rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug 
19a1(rgyud 'grel): mas gnas bzhi byin gyis brlab par bsam mo// sems dpa'i zlos pa po yin na sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa yum bzhis gnas bzhi byin gyis brlab par bsam mo// 
19a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas ye shes dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dgyes par bya ba ni/ sgo bzhi'i sngags dang phyag rgyas gzhal yas khang gi nang du spyan drangs pa ste/ de yang rdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag
19a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas so so'i sgo nas nang du bkug par bsam mo// rdo rje zhags pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya so so'i sgo nas bcug par bsam/ rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo nas bcing bar bsam 
19a4(rgyud 'grel): rdorje 'bebs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas so so'i sgo sgo nas mnyes par bsam mo// de nas phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa ni gnyis te/ rgyas pa dang bsdus pa'o// rgyas pa ni sku 'phrul dra ba dang rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 
19a5(rgyud 'grel): su 'brengs pa las shes par bya'o// bsdus pa ni de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab pa/ sgrub pa po'i snying khar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la/ gtso bo'i sngags rings kyi 'jug la/ dri sh+ya dza 
19a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ a haM many+dzu shrI/ zhes brjod pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab par bsam mo// chos kyi phyag rgyas gdab pa ni dkyil 
19a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi lha rnams ljags kyi steng du hUM dkar po las yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa re chu rmugs su yod par bsam/ de'i lte ba la lha rnams rang rang gi sku bskyed pa'i yig 'bru bkod 
19a8(rgyud 'grel): la/ chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab par bsam mo// las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab pa ni/ sgrub pa po'i snying khar sna tshogs rdo rje bsam la/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ rdo rje gar dgu/ 
19b1(rgyud 'grel): sngon du 'gro ba'i tshul gyis phyag 'tshan med par lha rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'i khyer thabs bsgom pa ni las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab bo// phyag mtshan med pa lha rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'i khyer 
19b2(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi phyag rgya bcings pa ni// de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcings pa 'byung ste/ rdo rje khu chung dam bcings te// mnyam par bzhag pas gnyis su bya// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas gnyis bcings te/ 
19b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas bcings pa rab tu bshad// g.yon pa'i rdo rje 'dzub pa ni// g.yas pa'i nang du sgreng bar bya// byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya che// sang rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o// mi g.yo ba yis 
19b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// rin chen gyi ni mchog sbyin pa'o// tshe dpag med kyi ting 'dzin mchog/ ge don mi za bar mi 'jigs sbyin// de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams// mdor bsdus rab tu bshad paraH/ 
19b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams// rdo rje las rnams byed pa skye// sgyings bcas gsor ba gnyi ka yin// ljags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang // mnga' 'phangs pa yi tshul dang ni// legs 
19b6(rgyud 'grel): so zhes pa snying khar bzhag/ dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis// snying khar nyi ma bstan par bya// g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs// de bzhin kha phyogs skor bar bya// g.yas pa yis ni g.yon 
19b7(rgyud 'grel): par dbye// snying khar g.yon pa ral gri mdud// mgal mo'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang // rdo rje gnya ka kha nas dbyung // rdo rje gar gyis bskor ba yi// thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor bzhag 
19b8(rgyud 'grel): go cha mthe chung mche ba dang // khu chung gnyis na mnan pa'o// rdo rje sgyings pa'i tshul gyis su// bsam pa g.yos pas gdud pa bya// phreng ba bcings pas kha nas dpung // rdorje 
20a1(rgyud 'grel): gar ni bskor ba yin// rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni// bdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyin// sangs rgyas kun la mched pa yin// phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa po// mdzub mos lugs kyu
20a2(rgyud 'grel): bcings pa ni// mthe chung las de lcags kyu che// khrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis mdud// rgyab gnyis rgyang ni bsnyams te mnan// sgo gnyis pa dang gsum pa la sogs pa lnga'i las kyi 
20a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bcings pa ni// so so'i gtso bo bzhin du thabs re sgo re 'am// phyogs bzhir bcing ba'o// de rnams ni 'dir mang du spro mi dgos pa'i phyir mang du ma spros pa'o// de nas phyag rgya chen pos rgyas 
20a4(rgyud 'grel): gdab pa ni// sgrub pa po'i snying khar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i snying po// oM hUM hrIHzhes yid la zlos shing // rdo rje 
20a5(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur gnyis rdo rje gar ma byas par// rang rang gi phyag mtshan phyag na bsnams par bsgom pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i rgyas btab par bsgom pa'o// de nas lha las la sbyar ba ni// gzhung las/ 
20a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas las kyi rgyal mchog ni// skalas 'phel te rgyas bshad pas// 'dir ni bdag gis ma bshad do// zhes 'byung bas ska las 'phel te bshad pan// gsang ldanan pa sgo dang po'i lhal 
20a7(rgyud 'grel): la bzhag pa ni/ lha'i dag pa dang mthun par las la bzhag ste/ sngags don rnam par gzigs pa'i lnga'i dag dang mthun no// sgo gnyis pa'i gti mug sel ba ni rnam par snang mdzad de/ 
20a8(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi gti mug sbyongs shig pa'o// de bzhin du zhe sdang dang / 'dod chags dang ser sna dang // zag dgi sbyongs shig pas/ 
20b1(rgyud 'grel): yang na sngon gyi lha thams cad kyi spro bsdu dran par byas pa ni las la sbyar ba'o// las kyi khyad par gyi ting nge 'dzin to zhes pa ni/ mtshams sbyang bar bya'o// de nas spos kyi chu dag la/ sngags 'das pa 
20b2(rgyud 'grel): yis bsad byas te// phung pos bsdu ba'i mchod pa lngas// rim bzhin byin brlabs mdun bzhag nas// 'di dag rim pa'i go rims kyis// se gol rim pas brda ba byas pas// rim bzhin 
20b3(rgyud 'grel): bsdu ba'i phyag rgya ni// dzaHhUM baM hoHldan byas te// mdun na mngon sum bzhin mthong nas// sa ma ya dzaHzhes brjod bya zhing // 'khor lo tshogs mchog de dag la// mnyam med la sogs bstod 
20b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de nas gtso bo sngags rings la// dri sh+ya zhes kyang brjod bya zhing // a hUM zhes dang ldan par ni// bzhi yis rgyas gdab don mchog grub// de nas mchod pa'i bye brag gis// mchod 
20b5(rgyud 'grel): nas phyag bzhi bya ba ni// dang po'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i// gnas su bya ba'i rim pa'o// de dag ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos kyi ting nge 'dzin to// zhes bya bas yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
20b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa te// de dag yang spyi don dgu'i sgo nas shes par bya ste// de nas spos kyi chu dag la// sngags zlas pa yis bsang bya ste// phung pos bsdus ma'i mchod pa lngas// rim bzhin byin brlabs 
20b7(rgyud 'grel): mdun bzhag nas// zhes bya bas/ mchod pa byin gyis brlabs pa ston te// spyir sbyang shing bsreg pa dang // so so'i sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te// sngon bzhin no// 'di dag rim pa'i go rims 
20b8(rgyud 'grel): kyis// se gol rim pa brdab byas pas// rim bzhin bsdu ba'i phyag rgya ni// dzaHhU~M ba hoHldan byas te// mdun na mngon sum bzhin mthong nas// zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems 
21a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bsdu ba ston te/ de yang rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas spyan drangs la mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon par bsam mo// sa ma ya dzaHzhes 
21a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod bya zhing // 'khor lo tshig sa mchog de dag la// mnyam med la sogs bstod par bya// zhes pas bstod pa ston te// sngags sngon du 'gro bas/ de nas bstod pa ni mnyam med mi g.yo'am 
21a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dud nyi shus bstod pa bya'o// de nas dgug pa dang bcing ba dang mnyes par bya ba ni// sgo bzhi'i sngags dang phyag rgyas gzhal yas khang gi nang du spyan drangs pa la sogs pa ste sngon bzhin no// de nas 
21a4(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo'i sngags rings la// dri sh+ya zhes kyang brjod bya zhing // a hUM zhes dang ldan par ni/ bzhi yis rgyas gang ba don mchog sgrub ces bya bas lha thams cad ni phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa ston te/ de yang byag 
21a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gdab pa ni// las mchog gi skabs bzhin shes par bya'o// de nas mchod pa'i bye brag gis mchod nas zhes bya bas mchod pa dbul ba ston te/ de yang mchod pa dbul ba ni thun mong 
21a6(rgyud 'grel): gi mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang / phyinang gi lha mo brgyad kyi mchod pa dang / bslab mchod bcu drug dang / mchod pa gzhan yang ci 'byor tshad du 'bul lo// phyag bzhi bya ba ni dang po sangs rgyas 
21a7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i/ gnas su bya ba'i rim pa'o// zhes bya bas phyag btsal bar ston te/ de yang phyag bzhi btsal ba nI/ shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rdo rje rigs kyi phyag btsal ba dang / lho phyogs kyi sgo nas 
21a8(rgyud 'grel): rin chen rigs kyi phyag btsal ba dang / nub phyogs kyi sgo nas pad+ma rigs kyi phyag btsal ba dang / byang phyogs kyi sgonas las kyi rigs kyi phyag btsal ba ste/ lus kyi bca' thabs dang 
21b1(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang phyogs dang lngas shes par bya ste/ sngon bzhin no// de'i 'og tu bla ma'i ga ma ngag gi nyams pa gsum dang bsnyen pa ni bsgom pa dang / 
21b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan brjod pa'i gsung rab gdon pa dang sngags bzlas pa rnams ston pa ni/ de yang mnyam pa rnam pa gsum gyis mnyam par bsres la/ bsgom bzlas bya ba ni/ oM badz+ra At+ma ko&haM/ zhes brjod 
21b3(rgyud 'grel): pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dang bdag sku gsung thugs rdo rje mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du/ oM sa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha he zhes brjod pas lha thams cad dang bdag rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par maH 
21b4(rgyud 'grel): pas mnyam pa nyid du bsgom/ oM sarba sa mo haM zhes brjod pas lha thams cad dang bdag med par mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du sgom mo// de ltar mnyam pa nyid gsum gyis mnyam par bsres la/ lha thams cad 
21b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi rang bzhin bdag yin no par bsams la bsgom pa dang / mtshan dang sngags kyis bzlas pa byed na yang lha thams cad kyi rang bzhin bdag yin no bar bsams la/ bdag gis mtshan dang sngags kyis bzlas pa byas 
21b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dus su lha thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang bzlas pa'i sgra 'byung bar bsam/ de ltar byas nas rnam pa lngar 'gyur te/ bsgom pa'i bsnyen pa la dus kyi bsnyen pa dang / mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa gnyis so// 
21b7(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa'i bsnyen pa la/ dus kyi bsnyen pa dang / mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa dang / grangs kyi bsnyen pa dang gsum mo// de ltar bsnyen pa rnam pa lnga'o// de la sngags rnams 'di yin te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA 
21b8(rgyud 'grel): yo gi shwa ra hUM/ oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ oM badz+ra ran+ta hUM/ oM badz+ra d+harma hU~M/ oM badz+ra karma hUM/ oM badz+ra badz+ri Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra rat+na badz+ri Ni hU~M/ oM badz+ra d+harma badz+ri Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra karma badz+ri na hUM/ oM badz+ra lA s+ye hUM/ 
22a1(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra mA le hUM/ oM badz+ra gI tI hUM/ oM badz+ra nid+hI hUM/ oM badz+ra d+hU b+he hUM/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM/ oM badz+ra A lo ke b+h+rUM/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he hUM/ oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ oM badz+ra rA dza dzA/ 
22a2(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra rA ga ho/ oM badz+ra sA d+hu sa/ oM badz+ra rat+na oM/ oM badz+ra te dza oM/ oM badz+ra ke tuSh+TAM/ oM badz+ra b+hU swA ha/ oM badz+ra d+harmA thi/ oM badz+ra ShIk+Sh+Na NAM/ oM badz+ra hi thA maM/ oM badz+ra b+hai Sha raM/ oM badz+ra karma kaM/ 
22a3(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra rak+Sha haM/ oM badz+ra ya k+Sha hUM/ oM badz+ra san+d+hi baM/ oM badz+ra aM ku sha dzaH/ oM badz+ra pA sha hUM/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta baM/ oM badz+ra a be sha aM/ khyad par gyi snying po'i sngags so// oM badz+ra pradz+nyA dz+nyAn 
22a4(rgyud 'grel): muna? ye te na maHoM duHkhats+tshe ra ya te na maH/ oM badz+ra ti k+ShA ya te na maHoM tsA gI shwa ra ya te na maH/ oM dz+nyAn kA ya ya te na maHoM a pa ra tsa nA ya twe na maHthun mo nga gi sngags te/ go bzlog par shes pa 
22a5(rgyud 'grel): byAbya'o// oM sarba d+har+m+ma b+haH sr-ib+hA wa bi shud+d+ha badz+ra a A aM iHpra kr-it+ta pa ri shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmA ya ru ta/ sarbi ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya/ many+dzu shrI ba ri shud+d+hi ta mA pa ta ye ti/ a A/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ 
22a6(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga wAM/ dz+nyA na mArti wA gI shwa ra/ ma hA pa tsa/ sarba d+harmA ga ga na/ a ma lA su pa ri shu d+he/ d+harma d+ha tudz+nyAM ne gar+b+ha aHzhes bya ba ni sa thams cad kyi spyi'i sku'i sngags dang rtsa ba'i sngags dang phreng sngags so// bsnyen pa/ 
22a7(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'o// // de nas bsgrub pa la 'jug pa ni// de nas rang dga'i gnas nyid du// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// zhes bya bas bsgrub pa'i gnas bsgrub pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi 
22a8(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bya ba'i spyir mdor bstan te/ de yang gnas ni nyams dga' zhing yid 'jug pa/ rgyal po dang theg pa dman pa la sogs pas dben par bya bar gsungs so// sa de gzhung bzhin sbyar bya dang // 
22b1(rgyud 'grel): gzungs dang ldan pa gzhing bzhin du// bya ba'i bye brag gzhan na'o// zhes bya bas sa'i cho ga rgyas par bston to// de yang bla mas gsang ba spyi dang rtsa rgyud chen po la sogs par sa'i cho ga spyi don brgyad kyi 
22b2(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya ba ni/ tshes gcig nas bco lnga'i bar du gza' skar bzang po la zhugs te// slob dpon slob ma'i spyod lam bya ba ni// za gcig gis bskur ba dang dkar gsum bza' ba la sogs pa'i 
22b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod lam bya'o// grong khyer chen po 'am gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha kha la sogs pa'i shar ram byang phyogs su bri bar bya'o// de nas ji tsam byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa bcar la sa'i lto 'phye brtag par 
22b4(rgyud 'grel): byaso la/ lto nas sa bkod de sa'i ro lnga spangs pa dang ldan par bya'o// sa'i ro lnga ni sa'i rog seg ma dang / mi'i ro rus pa dang skra shad kyi dum bu dang / rdza'i ro gyo dum dang / shing gi ro ma gal dum la sogs dang / 
22b5(rgyud 'grel): tsaci'i ro phub ma la sogs pa med par bya'o// rgyal pos ni dkyil 'khor khru brgya lnga bcu pa la bya'o// blon po'amathon po chen pos ni khru lnga bcu'am de'i phyed la bya'o// sgrub pa pos ni khru bcu gnyis sam drug la 
22b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// sa brtag pa ni nyis 'gyur tshun du brtag go/ de nas yul gyi rgyal po dang blon po la sogs pa la slar bar bya'o// sa'i lha mo la slang ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la spang ba dang / sa bdag la 
22b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa la slang ba'o// de nas yid kyis sa'i lha mo gser gyi mdog can lag na gser gyi bum pa thogs pa zhig sa'i 'og nas sku phye tsam 'thon par bsams la/ spos chus brlan par byas pa'i lag pas 
22b8(rgyud 'grel): sa la lan gsum rdabs la/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang // sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// skyob pa shAkya se ng+ge yis// ji ltar bdud 
23a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi sde bcom ltar// de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni// rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri// zhes lan gsum brjod nas/ lha'i lha mo'i zhal nas khyod ci bde bde bar bris shig 
23a2(rgyud 'grel): zer nas sa'i nang du thim par ba sam mo// yang na dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su maN+Dal khru gang gu bzhi pa zhig byas la/ der mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang gtor ma cha gcig bshams la/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa
23a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa lnga phul te/ spos kyi snod thogs te pu sa mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ dgongs shig bdag la sangs rgyas dag/ sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa dang // sems can rnams la sman slad du 
23a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad chen po yi// dkyil 'khor dam pa 'bri bar 'tshal// rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis// bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol// de skad ces lan gsum brjod pas// dkon mchog gsum 
23a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis gnang ba byin par bsam mo// yang gtor ma a kA ro la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la// dpung pa bzang po'i rgyud las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pas gtor ma byin la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la 
23a6(rgyud 'grel): gtsugs te spos thogs te/ phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i lha klu dang // gnod sbyin dri za lha ma yin// yang dag rdzu 'phrul cher ldan pa'i// 'byung la gnas pa'i 'byung po kun// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis// 
23a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang // sems can rnams la phan don du// dam po'i dkyil 'khor cher byung ba// ji ltar bsam pa bzhin brin// khyed kyis bar chad ma byed par// dge ba'i grogs po nyid du
23a8(rgyud 'grel): mdzod// da ltar bdag gis khyod la ni// bzod par gsol gyis ma slu bar// rmi lam la sogs mtshan ma yi// legs nyis bltas rnams bstan du gsol// lan gsum gsol ba btab pas/ sa bdag 
23b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas dkyil 'khor gyis shig par gnang ba byin par bsam mo// de nas chag chag dang skyar nul legs par bya ste/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags kyis yungs kar gtor zhing bgegs skrad nas/ oM hUM hrIH 
23b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'am/ oM badz+ra satwa hUM zhes bya ba lan gsum mam// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya'o// de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis/ bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya'o// yang na dang por sa'i bra brtag par/ 
23b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid kyi pas mo nub tsam lte ba nub tsam brkos la/ de yang gong gi sa'i lha mo nam mkha' la oM badz+ro pa ta ya zhes brjod la brdeg/ de nas dong gi 
23b4(rgyud 'grel): nang du chus bgang ste/ me tog yang bcug la/ oM hUM hrIHSham oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ zlos shing shar phyogs su gom pa mi drag mi ngal ba brgya phyin te/ tshur log nas chu de ma skam na dngos grub yod par ston/ chu/ 
23b5(rgyud 'grel): skams na gzhan du spro bar bshad/ de nas rdza so ma btang ba zhig tu rin po che sna lnga 'bru lnga dang sman dang snying po dang spos dang lnga blug la/ dong gi nang du gzhug go/ de nas rkos pa'i sa de rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags 
23b6(rgyud 'grel): btab pa'i spos chus bral bral du sbrus la nang dgang bar bya'o// lhag par gyur na dngos grub mchog yod par bstan// chad na gzhan du spro/ de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i spos chus chag chag gang ba/ 
23b7(rgyud 'grel): 'thas par bcags la me long gi rgyab bzhin du byas pa ni sa las dang bya bas spyad pa'o// rdo rje gnod sbyin nam rdo rje rtse mos bzlas pa'i spos chus gsang gtor bya ba dang / zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal 
23b8(rgyud 'grel): ba dang yungs kar gyi gtor ma ni sngags kyis spyad pa'o// ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyar ba ni// slob dpon dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la rdo rje chen po nas gzhal yas khar la thug pa'i bar du bsgoms 
24a1(rgyud 'grel): la sgo bzhi rta babs dang bcas pa'i nang dus chud par sgom par bya'o// sa sbyang ba'o// de nas slob dpon lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas sa phyogs 'di nyid du bdag rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 
24a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor chen po bri bar bya'o// zhes bsam pa sngon du btang ba ni/ sems kyi dbang gis gzung ba'o// de nas slob dpon gyis rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas/ ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan 
24a3(rgyud 'grel): par byas laM/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste/ oM badz+ra tik+Sha duHkhats+tshe da pradz+nyA dz+nyA na muni/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ wa gi shwa ra/ a ra pa tsan/ ya te na ma/ zhes zlos shing 'dug pa yan chad ni/ slob dpon gyi 
24a4(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin no// de nas bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog rigs bzhi'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa bzhis/ shar phyogs kyi sgo nas/ 'dud nyi shus bstod de/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis// bdag cag gis ni bstod 
24a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzad// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// zhes bya ba ni bgegs tshar gcad par gsol ba gdab/ 
24a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de la mig byin gyis brlab pa ni// g.yas su ma las nyi ma g.yon du Ta las zla ba/ de gnyis kyi steng du hUM gis mig 'bras tshul du byas pa ni mig brlab pa'o// rkang mthil gnyis su a las sna tshogs rdo rje 
24a7(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pa ni rkang pa brlab pa'o// bdag nyid rang gi rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid// bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che// stobs chen rdo rje can bdag nyid// bdag pa rdo rje chen por bdag/ byin gyis brlab pa mi 
24a8(rgyud 'grel): 'dor ro// rdo rje ltabs tshar gtsad pa'i// mig g.yon gyi za ba'i dkyil 'khor g.yon phyogs su bskor bas/ bgegs thams cad gsal gdab par bsam// g.yas kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yas 
24b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su bskor bas bgegs thams cad bsreg par bsam mo// de ni rdo rje lta bas tshar gcod do// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas byang shar mtshams su byis pa gzhon nu bzhin du mchongs te phyin la// kha lho phyogs su 
24b2(rgyud 'grel): bltas la/ dril bu dkur brten la rdo rje lan gsum gsor zhing tshig 'di skad ces brjod de// rdo rje slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya ba/ slob ma che ge mo zhes bya ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / 
24b3(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir sa phyogs 'dir rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ngas 'bri yis/ lha dang lha ma yin dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang yi 
24b4(rgyud 'grel): dgas dang / sha za dang 'byung po dang brjed byed dang na mkha' 'gro ma dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / rig sngags 'char grub pa dang rgan po dang rgan mo g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa de dag dengs 
24b5(rgyud 'grel): shig/ 'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thos nas myur ba nyid du dengs shig/ gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag/ nga'i ye shes kyi rdo rjes mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par bya'o// zhes lan gsum brjod do// de nas rkang pa'i sor mos 
24b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse gcig pa sa la 'bri zhing / hUM hUM zhes brjod kyi dkyil 'khor bskor ba ni rdo rje 'gros kyis tshar gcad pa'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhir rkang stabs bdun dang / lag stabs bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bya ba ni rdo rje snar 
24b7(rgyud 'grel): stabs kyis thams cad thal kar gcig pu 'am/ yang na de bas mar yang rung // shar phyogs su gzugs par bya// pog por kham pa las byas pa// som btang ba dkar po bcu// byas nas phyogs dang mtshams sun// 
24b8(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa de bzhin bdun du bkod// pog por dag dum 'byor na// kham pa'i phor bu'i nang nas dbul// de dag kyang ni ma 'byor na// gcig gcig sgor ni bzhag nas dbul// me tog phreng bas brgyan pa yi// 
25a1(rgyud 'grel): babs dag kyang phyogs bzhir bya// nas dang gro dang 'bru rnams kyis/ myu gu legs par skye bar dgod// dril bu gdugs dang rnga yab dang // srad bu dag kyang phyogs bzhir ni// rta babs
25a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs las phyi rol du// mdzes par bya phyir mkhas pas gdags// 'bras yos 'bru dang bcas pa yi// me tog sil ma rab du dgram// dkyil 'khor dag gi phyi rol du// phyi ma'i ri mo sdug gu bri// 'jig rten 'di
25a3(rgyud 'grel): na grags pa yi// bkra shis la sogs gang yin rnams// dkyil 'khor dag gi phyi rol tu// phyogs bzhi dag tu mkhas pas dgod// yi ge brgya pa zlas pa'i chus// dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams nas// phyi dang/
