25a4(rgyud 'grel): nang du bcas la gsang gtor bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir// rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya kha'i dbus su gzhag la// oM badz+ra tsakra hUM zhes bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas phyi dro'i dus su gru dang
25a5(rgyud 'grel): rol mo'i mchod pa rnams dang me tog dang / spos la sogs pa rnams kyis dang po'i 'khor lo ji snyed pa dang / ci 'dod pa de bzhin du mchod cing brtag par bya'o// de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig sems dpa'i sku
25a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs lugs ma la sogs pa dkar po sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod la// rang gi snying pos bzhugs su gsol te/ yang na phreng sngags sam/ yang na sangs rgyas kyi snying po oM hUM hriHsa bzhugs su gsol la/ de 
25a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du lha gzhan gyi yang sku bzhugs pa'am/ mtshan ma rnams brtags la/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po 'bru gsum brjod cing 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la dkyil 'khor brar la/ de nas ting nge 'dzin rnam pa
25a8(rgyud 'grel): gsum sngon bzhin bsgoms la// de nas nam mkha'i lha bsre bar bya ste/ yi ge phyin ci log pas kha sbyar gyi sbyor ba gsal lo// bar snang la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bkug pa 
25b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bkug la/ bcug ste/ bcings nas dbang du byas te/ phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa byas la/ byin gyis rlob cing mnyes par byas nas bzhag par bya ste/ de nas mchod pa rgya chen po mdo klog 
25b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yan chod byas la/ spyir ma so so'i sngags kyi bsnyen pa byas la phyis 'byung ba bzhin du slob dpon rang nyid bzhugs shing dbang lha la blang ngo // de nas dkyil 'khor du gzhug cing dbang bskur bar bya bar bstan pa'i phyir
25b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyus ma nyid 'khrugs sdeb ste/ de yang de nas 'dir dbang dam par gsungs pa/ dbang skur med na 'grub pa med// yon tan ldan pa'i sngags pa yis// 'di la dbang byin yon tan 'grub// ces bya bas dbang nos 
25b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yon tan ston te/ dbang skur zhing dam tshig dang ldan na/ dngos grub rnam pa gnyis 'thob par lung gis bstan pa'o// dang por khrus byas gos gyon te/ rgyal po'i cha lugs 'dra ba dang / bud med lta bu'i tshul ldan pas/ 
25b5(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon bla mar gyur pa la// dbang rnams nod par rab tu gsungs zhes bya bas/ dbang nod pa'i phyir dbang gi sngon du spyod lam de'i sgo nas dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa ston te/ de nas bzlas pa dang bsgom pa 
25b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams byas la/ phyir byung la slob ma gzhug par bya ste// slob dpon du 'os pa'i slob ma las thams cad pa'i chus bsangs la/ rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs shing rgyan thams cad kyis
25b7(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa la/ rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i gos dmar pos bstod g.yogs dang / sman g.yogs bskon la/ oM badz+ra tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ zhes mngon par bsngags la gos dmar po las byas pa'i gtsug 
25b8(rgyud 'grel): tor dang / sgo srung bzhi'i snying po yongs su bzla ba'i gos dmar pos gdong bcings la/ yon gyi dam pa dag phul ba yongs su bzung ste/ de'i snying ka dang da pral ba dang lkog ma dang spyi bo rnams rdo rje dang rin po 
26a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje zla ba steng du de'i sa bon gyis rnam par dgod pa/ phyogs bzhinas sdor bzhir phyag 'tshal du bcug la/ de de bzhin du rdo rje la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs la/ 
26a2(rgyud 'grel): phyirang gsang ba'i mchod pa byed du nus par byin gyis brlab par bsam mo/ de nas shar phyogs kyi sgo bzhag la de bzhin du sdom pa byin no// oM sarba bu d+hi tsit+tor+b+ba tA ya mi zhes brjod do// byang chub sems ri bla med pa/ 
26a3(rgyud 'grel): dam pa bdag gis bskyed nas su// snying pos rab tu bzhag par bya// de nas sur te sa ma ya s+t+waM ho// sid+d+hi badz+ra ya thA su khe zhes bskul lo// de nas sa ma yak+Sha zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rnam par snang mdzad kyings 
26a4(rgyud 'grel): tshig phyag rgya 'ching du gnag cing // de bzhin du phreng ba 'dzin du gzug go/ de nas sa ma ya hUM zhes brjod la slob pa dang du gzhug go// de nas padi skad ces kyang bkra'o// de khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
26a5(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ ras khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa'ang tho bar/ dngos grub gzhar lnga spos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis// khyod 
26a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra zhig/ dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya la thur du bstan la/ rdo rje slob pa'i spyi bor bzhag k+She 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// 
26a7(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni khyod kyis rdo rje dam tshig yin te/ gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na grang ba 'gas par 'gyur ro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / mna'i chu'i snying bsolan cig bsngags la// slob ma 'thung du 
26a8(rgyud 'grel): gzhug go/ de la mna'i snying pa ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' deng khrod kyi/ snying la yang dgazugs mdzad kyis// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs// oM badz+rod+b+ha 'di ni khyod 
26b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig srungs na dang so grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'dis 'grub// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams// gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras// skye bo'i tshogs na 'dug
26b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'am// dad pa med pa brgad par 'gyur// de nas slob ma de la 'di skad bsgo zhig/ deng phyin chad khyad kyi phyag na rdo rje ni nga yin gyis/ ngas 'di gyis zhes bsgo ba gang yin pa de yang bya dgos so// khyed ngal brnyas par ma 
26b3(rgyud 'grel): byed cig/ me bde ba ma spangs par khyed 'chi ba'i dus byas nas dmyal bar lhung bar gyur ta re/ zhes smras la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 
26b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bab par gyur cig/ ces smos shig ces bsgo'o// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi se myur du sems dpa' rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la/ 'di skad du brjod du gzhug go/ 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste// rdo rje sems dpa' yin 
26b5(rgyud 'grel): par grags// rdo rje ye shes tha med ni// de ring nyid du dbab par shog/ oM badz+ra a be sha a zhes brjod do// de nas phyag rgya bcings pa las blang nas// de'i snying khar zhugs te// rdo rje sems pa babs par gyur
26b6(rgyud 'grel): par bsams nababs par 'gyur de// yang na e ho zhes bya ba ra ngadagi snying kha'i zlab la bkod de// se'u mi tig dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi dam tshig dang bcas pa rang gi snying po las nges pa 
26b7(rgyud 'grel): phyung ba/ badz+ra ban+d+ha tra Ta zhes bya bas de'i snying kha phye la/ der bcug ste/ rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings la sngags brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang las gyur par bsams na yang 'bab par 'gyur ro// 
26b8(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i khu tshur bcings la rdo rje sems dpa' phyen yang 'bab par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po mngon par rtog pa'i rdo rje tshig lan bdun nam brgyad brjod pas kyang 'bab par 'gyur ro// slob ma'i gtso bo'i 
27a1(rgyud 'grel): snying khar rdo rje bya// yi ge brgya pas brtan por byas nas ni// bdag lus kyi yin snod kyi sgo dbye zhing // snying la gnas pa'i rdo rje dbus su blta// sngags kyi bdag po yi ge a dmar 
27a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs// brjod pas yang dag chags par g.yo bar lta zhes pas so// de nas oM pa ram su khA sha ya su la li ta/ bi sa lan mi te ra/ na ma mi b+ha ga waM dzaHhUM baM hoHhi hi hi hi NIHpra tIts+tsha badz+ra ku sum/ 
27a3(rgyud 'grel): any+dza lin+da tha hoHzhes brjod pa'i sngags 'dis phreng ba de dkyil 'khor du dor ro// de nas dngos grub rab 'brir me tog babs pa las brtag par bya ste/ lha rnams kyi khyad par dang / gnas kyi khyad par las brtag par bya ste/ 
27a4(rgyud 'grel): gang tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan gyi// dbul me rtog pabs gyur na// de tshe gtsug tor mdzod spu dag/ 'grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// zhal du babs na 'grub par 'gyur// stong du babs na mchog rnams 
27a5(rgyud 'grel): 'grub// rked du babs na 'bring rnams 'grub// ro smad phyogs su babs na ni// dngos grub pal rnams 'grub par 'gyur// bar gyi skud la babs na ni// snying po la sogs 'grub par 'gyur// smad du 
27a6(rgyud 'grel): babs par gyur na ni// mngag gzhug la sogs 'grub par 'gyur// rim pa de dag thams cad ri// rigs bzhi rnams las shes par bya// de bzhin lha rnams gzhan la yang // dngos grub rnam pa gsum 
27a7(rgyud 'grel): du bshad// gal te lha yi gzugs dag las// me tog ring du lhung gyur na// de ni dngos grub yun ring 'gyur// nyen dngos grub myur du 'grub// gsang sngags rnams kyi mchod pa dag/ gang du 'gram pa tshun 
27a8(rgyud 'grel): chod ni// de yi sa yi de yin te// me tog der lhung de yi rigs// lha gnyis kyi ni bar dag tu// gal te me tog ba pas gyur na// gang du nye bar gyur pa ni// de ni de yi rigs su bshad// gal te la la'i me tog ni// 
27b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor mang po 'das nas babs// de la dngos grub phal 'grub cing // de ni dad pa rab tu chung // gal te me tog bor ba dag/ ra ba'i ri bo la bab na// zhi ba'i bya bas de nas sdod// nan tan bskyed de mdor 
27b2(rgyud 'grel): du gzhug/ de ste the tshom gyur na ni// mkhas pas 'das te 'dor mi gzhug/ de ni gang yang nges med pas// de ni dngos grub 'thob mi 'gyur// gnyis kyi bar du mnyam pa dang // don med phyi rol lhung na ni// zhi ba'i 
27b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg byas nas su// de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug/ snying por me tog bab na ni// rtag du don med mi 'gyur bshad// srad du dag gi cho ga bzhin// de yi nyon 'khor shes par bya// de la sogs pa'i rnam 
27b4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// me tog rnams ni bor ba las// bdag gi mdun du gang lhung ni// de la zhi ba bsam par bya// sbyin sreg gis ni zhi byas nas// de ni slar la mdor du gzhug/ lan gsum sogs te bor na yang // 
27b5(rgyud 'grel): gal te legs par ma babs na// re thag cad de slar gnyang ngo // de nas me tog babs pa las// lha yang yang dag par shes par byas nas// phreng ba blangs te/ oM pra ti gri hA swa mi maM// sa tAM ma hA pa la zhes brjod/ 
27b6(rgyud 'grel): nas// de'i mgo la bcing ngo // ye shes babs pa'i mtshan ma las// nye bar mtshon nas de la mig gis ci mthong zhes dris te// de ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal te dkar po snang ba
27b7(rgyud 'grel): mthong na ni// de la dngos grub mchog slob po// gal te ser po mthong na ni// de la don 'byung ba'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// gal te dmar po mthong na de la rjes su chags pa'i ye shes bslab bo// 'on te nag por 
27b8(rgyud 'grel): mthong na de la mngon spyod kyi ye shes kyi slab po// gal te sna tshogs par mthong na// de la dngos grub thams cad kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes rgya cher sbyar ro// de nas snying po 'dis gdor g.yogs bgrol te/ 
28a1(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra satwa ya yan+te d+ya/ tsak+Sha g+ha ta na pa rod+b+ha ta ma ti/ sarba k+Sho badz+ra tsak+Sha ma nut+ta raM/ de nas he badz+ra pA sh+ya zhes brjod do// de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzad// 
28a2(rgyud 'grel): po bstan par bya// de nas bla ma dgar gyur nas// slob ma de la 'di skad bsgo// dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos// da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed// khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skye// sngags dang rig pas byin/ 
28a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs// 'gro ba phun sum dngos grub kyang // thams cad khyod la mngon du 'gyur// dngos grub thob phyir dam tshig skyongs// gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de khe/ 
28a4(rgyud 'grel): na nyid bstan par bya ste// mi mnyam med par zur bzhi snyoms// dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi ste// bsam gtan rnams kyi rna babs bzhi// ting 'dzin khyams su shes par bya// khyams las bden pa'i rdo rje/ 
28a5(rgyud 'grel): dag/ gzugs rnams lha mos mchod pa yin// rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra ba yang // bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// gdul bya bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog/ dara' phan dril bu klogs 
28a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// me long ye shes rtag mi rtog/ byang chub yan lag me tog phreng // dra ba dra phyed rin chen mchog/ nyi ma zla ba yang dag ldan// kun 'grub mi zad bde ba ste// bde ba chen po zhes grags pa'o// de ni// 
28a7(rgyud 'grel): nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi// ka ba dkyil 'khor brgyad pa yi// dngos grub bde ba kun ster ba'i// rnam thar brgyad po de nyid yin// theg pa chen po byang chub sems// mdo sde 'khor lo bskor bas na// 
28a8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje thig gis yongs gdab cing // thams cad du yang yongs su rdzogs// gang du 'jug pa tsam gyis ni// mi tshugs pa dang mi ldog dang // bde ba chen po rab 'grub phyir// de dag dag par yang dag 'gyur/ 
28b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas phyag rgya dang snying po yang bshad par bya'o// de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa nas brtsams te/ mgon po rnam snang gi bar bstan par bya'o// // dang po sdig pa sreg byas nas// de la dbab dang dral ba bya// de dag 
28b2(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi rim pa yang // rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa ltar// 'dir ni de dag bya ba yin zhes bya bas/ dbang bskur ba'i slob ma rgyud dag par bya ba'i phyir sdig pa sreg pa ni til gyi sreg zugs sdig pa bsreg pa'i sngags dang chas/ 
28b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i brgya rtsa brgyad kyisazhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas la// de nas thal mo dam du bsdams la sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni// rdo rje thal mor bka' stsal te/ rab du bsdams phyir rdo rje bsdams// badz+rAny+dza li zhes bya ba rdo rje thal 
28b4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i sngags so// badz+ra ban+d+ha zhes brjod cing slob ma'i snying khar lan gsum dral bar bya'o// de nas ye shes dbab pa ni/ badz+ra a be sha a zhes bya bas rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa la a a zhes 
28b5(rgyud 'grel): bya a brgyas slob ma la dbab par bya'o// mchod pa'i lan dang sbyin pa dang zhes bya bas// slob mas slob dpon la mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul ba bstan pa'o// sbyin pa dang zhes bya bas dbang bskur ba'i sngon yon 
28b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du slob dpon la dbul ba bstan pa'o// rim pa dang ldan pas dbang bskur te// de nas de la chu dbang bskur// gzhan yang phyag rgya'i dbang dang ni// cod pan dar dbyangs rdo rje dang // bdag po ming la sogs pa
28b7(rgyud 'grel): dang // zhes bya bas rig pa'i dbang lnga dang // rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi dbang dang drug bskul bar bstan pa ni/ gong du me tog bab par gyur pa de'i tshe rigs dang gzugs su bskyed la/ de'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis byin gyis 
28b8(rgyud 'grel): brlabs te/ snying po 'di dang rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra b+hi ShIny+tsa/ de nas de dang rjes su mthun pa'i cod pan dang / dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur ba// rang gi mtshan 
29a1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i dbang bskur ba lag du byin te/ mtshan ma dang rjes su mthun par sngags 'dis brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo dbar// de ring khyod la bskur bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun du dbang 
29a2(rgyud 'grel): bskur phyir// rdo rje'i'adi ni khyod kyis long // rang gi mtshan mas bdag po'i dbang gi snying po 'dis sbyin par bya ste/ oM badz+ra d+hi ba d+hi sA ma b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas snying po'idis dril bu sbyin pa 
29a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ a d+ha nuSh+ma nAtA ta/ de nas snying po 'di rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur/ oM badz+ra satwa sA ma b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ badz+ra nA mA bi She ka ta/ kye rdo rje zhes gang gis ming gang brjod pa der skye 
29a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod par bya'o// 'di ni sangs thams cad kyi// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na gnas// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag du bzung // phyag na rdo rje'i brdul zhugs brtan// zhes bya bas lag du rdo rje byin la// oM sarba 
29a5(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya// tiSh+Te Sha twaM d+ha ra ya mi hi hi hi hi hUM zhes so// de nas phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du bzhag le/ spos la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la/ sngags kyis bskul ba'i tshig brgya 
29a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i sngags byin la/ phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bzlas par bya ba ni rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'o// slob mas kyang rdo rje thal mo skor ba byas la phyag bya ste/ phreng ba bcings pa la sogs thams cad bzung bar 
29a7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o// // dbang rnams rdzogs nas dbang byin pa// gsang ba'i dbang dang nges pa'i dbang // rim pa bzhin du rab du bskur// de nas bkra shis brjod bya zhing // zhes/ 
29a8(rgyud 'grel): bya bas rdorje slob dpon du dbang bsrung bston te// de yang de nas slob dpon du 'os pa'i slob mas yon bzang po phul la// gsol ba gdab par bya ste// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// ji ltar mchog chen gsol mdzad pa/ 
29b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag la bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir// nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag gsol// slob dpon rnam par snang mdzad chen po nyid du gyur pas/ shar phyogs kyi sgo'i mthar sna tshogs pad+ma bris la// slob ma rdo rje 'dzin pa 
29b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i skur zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gnas par bsams la/ rdo rje sems mal sogs pas byin gyis brlabs te/ dbang bskur bar bya'o// yang na dkyil 'khor las gru gsum tsam yongs su dor bar dbang bskur 
29b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sgo la mngon par phyogs par byas par nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi byed kyi tshad tsam la/ zur bzhi pa la sgo nub phyogs su bltas pa'i dkyil 'khor tshon sna lngas bris la/ de'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris/ 
29b4(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng du se ng+ge'i gdan zla ba'i steng du dkyil 'khor ras kyis bkab pa dang se ng+ge'i stan gyi steng du bla re bre zhing g.yas logs dar dang me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i gdugs rtse mo dkar ba dang / dmar ba la gtsug 
29b5(rgyud 'grel): tor gdugs dkar pos yongs su bzlas la/ g.yon du dar dang ras sna tshogs pas bkra ba'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan oM yongs su bzlas pa'i legs par bzhag la mchod yon phul te/ me tog la sogs pas
29b6(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par mchod nas/ rnga bo che dang rnga rings dang / dung la sogs pa'i rol mo phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab pa dang / phyi'i gar dang glu la sogs pa dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod cing bkra shis kyi glu len cing / 
29b7(rgyud 'grel): dril bu dkrol bzhin du rdo rje 'bebs pa la sogs pa'i chu rnams kyis de'i sngags gdon pa sngon du 'gro ba nyid dang / rdo rje slob dpon chen po nyid du dbang bskur bar bya ste/ oM badz+ra b+ha Shiny+tsa zhes bya ba dang 
29b8(rgyud 'grel): ji srid par rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i bar dang / dbang bskur ro// de nas de'i mgor yang 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sku gzugs de'i dam tshig gis phyag rgyas gzungs la/ oM ma hA su ka badz+ra satwa dz+dzaHhUM baM hoHsur ta/ 
30a1(rgyud 'grel): s+t+waM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas la/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i slob dpon du 'gyur ro// shes rab yan lag 'dus pa'i rdo rje las byung ba'i/ byang chub sems kyis 'jam dbyangs byang 
30a2(rgyud 'grel): chub bde dbang bskur/ rgyal mchog sras bcas rnams kyis legs gsung nges bkra shis gang / don khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi nam mkha'i khams// yongs su gang bar 
30a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsgom// phyi rol dri sogs dam tshig gis// sprin ltar brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom// yang na rdo rje dbyings kye ri// ting nge 'dzin gyi rdo rje bsgol// dam tshig mchog gis bum pa yang // 'dzin par 
30a4(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas bsgom par bya// rdo rje slob dpon bka' drin gyis// de tshi la dbang bsrung ba// rdzogs sangs rdo rje lnga po rnams// rang nyid gsol bar mdzad par 'gyur// de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis 
30a5(rgyud 'grel): bzung nas// dbang bskur bya ste/ oM dzaHhUM baM hoHma hA su ka badz+ra sar+b+ba bi She ka na tra ma b+hi ShIny+tsA mi/ sarba badz+ra d+hi pa d+he traM dri D+ho me b+ha ga/ sid+d+ha na ma ste b+ha ga waM/ ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra su ra ta s+t+waM/ ma hA badz+ra satwa oM b+hur+b+hu ba swA hA/ 
30a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'dis/ lag pa gnyis su rdo rje byin la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de/ sngags brjod par bya'o// me tog ma'i gzugs kyis/ me tog gis gtor la/ deng tshun 
30a7(rgyud 'grel): tshad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bzhes pas/ mchod na khyed mchod pa yan lag rdzogs shing skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan pa byas pa'i skur mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes 
30a8(rgyud 'grel): brjod do// de nas bdug pa ma'i gzugs kyis bdug pas bdugs la 'di skad ces brjod do// gang gis sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khyed la 'dug par 'tshal bar 
30b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// de nas mar me ma'i gzugs su mar me nye bar bstan la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ deng nas brtsams te rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan la yang dag par 'bar bas/ 
30b2(rgyud 'grel): ma rog pas khebs pa'i sems can rnams la ye shes kyi snang bas snang ba byed par 'gyur ro// de nas byug pa ma'i gzugs can gyi byug pas byugs la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ deng tshun chad khyod sangs rgyas dang byang/ 
30b3(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'jig rten thams cad du yang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab la sogs pa'i dri'i rkyen ster bar 'gyur ro// de nas ho zhes bya bas gzhu byin nas/ de bzhin/ 
30b4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod de/ phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi 'phen du gzhug cing steng dang 'og tu yang re re 'phen du gzhug go/ de nas sha d+ha b+ha ny+dza ga byin la/ 'dis dngos grub
30b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang nye bar spyod pa thams cad sprul pa nye bar longs spyod cing / gzhan dag la yang byin cig/ de nas chos kyi 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis kyi dbus su bzhag cing / dung yang leg pa g.yas par byin te chos kyi 'khor 
30b6(rgyud 'grel): lo dang smra ba gnyis kyi chos kyi yi ge dang / lhan cig byin la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ deng nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo skor cig/ de ring phan chad 'jig rten la// skyob pa 
30b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi 'khor lo bskor// chos kyi drang ni tha med pas kun du ma lus gang bar gyis// som nyid yid gnyis mi bya zhing // dog pa med pa'i sems kyis su// gsang sngags spyod pa tshul gyis mchog/ 'dzag rten 'di 
30b8(rgyud 'grel): la rab tu sgrogs// de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la// phan 'dogs drin du bzo zhes bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang // kun du khyod la srung bar byed// de nas/ 'jig rten kun la phan bya'i phyir// 'jig rten 
31a1(rgyud 'grel): khams ni thams cad du// ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba'i// rdo rje 'khor lo bskor bar gyis// zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig/ rdo rje rigs kyi bdag po'i 
31a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do// mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// zhes brjod la/ rgyal 
31a3(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig/ rin po che'i rigs kyi bdag po rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do// de nas/ mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 
31a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// pad+ma'i 'khor lo rab du bskor // zhes brjod la rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig/ pad+ma'i kyi rigs bdag po yis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do// de nas mdor na
31a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba rnams tshogs pa'i// las kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// zhes brjod la rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig/ las kyi rigs kyi bdag 
31a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor cig ces brjod do// de nas mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// chos kyi 'khor lo rab du bskor// zhes brjod la 
31a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor cig ces brjod par bya'o// de nas slob mas rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms la de bzhin du bzhag ste/ 
31a8(rgyud 'grel): gzengs bstod pas ni dngos po kun// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid de// rdo rje ming dbang bskur bas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan to// oM nga yis 'di ltar khyod lung bstan// rdo rje sems dpa' 
31b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs// dngos po mchog tu grub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton// kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ si d+d+hi sa ma ya s+t+waM b+hUr+m+ma swa/ gzengs bstod pas ni 'di yin te// 
31b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying khar bzhag la// g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin te/ 'dis phyag rgya chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i cho gas lung bstan par bya ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa thams
31b3(rgyud 'grel): cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad rang gi dbang gis slob dpon dang / mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 
31b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid kyang gzengs bstod pa'i phyag rgya chen pos mchog tu gsang ba'i dngos grub mchog 'grub pa'i byin brlabs dang / gsang sngags 'di'i stobs la dad par bya'o// zhes brjod par bya'o// mchog tu gsang
31b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ mthong ba dang ni bzhugs pa yis// srid pa kun las rnam grol bar// khyod ni de ring gnas pa yin// bde chen theg pa 'di las ni// slar khyod 'chi ba yod min te// mi tshugs pa dang mi gsod
31b6(rgyud 'grel): pas// cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// dngos po mchog tu grub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das// srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir// ston pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin// slob ma gus
31b7(rgyud 'grel): pas bla ma yi// rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas te// de nas ji skad gsungs pa kun// rjes su grub par khas blang ngo // de ltar dam bcas byas nas ni// cho ga 'di yis rang nyid kyis// rdo rje rtse mo lnga la ni// blangs
31b8(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang ni de la sbyin// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de// rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug/ khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad// phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs bstan// de nas oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badz+ra sa 
32a1(rgyud 'grel): ma ya tiSh+Ti Sha tAM d+ha ra ya mi/ badz+ra sa tAM/ hi hi hi hi hUM zhes brjod do// de nas/ 'di na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / 
32a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub rdo rje rgyal bas gsungs// zhes brjod la dril bu sbyin no// de ltar dbang bskur byas nas ni// de nas sar pa'i gos rnams bskon// me tog dri la sogs pas mchod// mchod phyir gdu bu bcang bar 
32a3(rgyud 'grel): bya// de nas tha ma bdag nyid kyis// de yi spyi bor gdugs kyang gzugs// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni// dkyil 'khor legs par bskor du gzhug/ gdugs dang bcas pa sgo phyogs su// 
32a4(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo bdud dbyug 'tshal bzhug/ slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags// gsang sngags rgyud ni 'dzin par 'gyur// mkhan pos de skad smras nas su// gdugs bzhag nas ni slob ma de// lags par legs par 
32a5(rgyud 'grel): blangs nas su// de nas 'di skad bsgo bar bya// de ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon 'gyur// gsang sngags rgyud kyang 'dzin par 'gyur// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // lha rnams kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur// 
32a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir// khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin// nan tan skyed de bri bar gyis// sgrub pa po yang rgyud la sbyor// khyod kyis chos la ser sna dang // sems can rnams la mi phan pa// nyams pa 
32a7(rgyud 'grel): chen por 'gyur kyang ni// bu khyod kyis ni mi bya'o// de nas bkra shis brjod bya zhing // zhes bya bas dbang bskur zin nas bkra shis brjod par bya ste// phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra// 'jig 
32a8(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa// sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba// bkra shis de ni skye dgu ni byed dang po'o// de yis nye bar bstan pa mchog rab mi g.yo ba// 'jig rten 
32b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa// chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa// de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o// dge 'dun dam pa chos ldan thob pa'i bkra shis phyug/ mi dang 
32b2(rgyud 'grel): lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas// tshogs kyi mchog po ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi// de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o// // rgyal ba bzhin du gying bcas pas// g.yog dang ldan/ 
32b3(rgyud 'grel): pas slob dpon la// lan gsum bskor bas tshigs su bcad kyis// bla ma de ni gzengs bstod bya// kye bdag ni rim pas dbugs byung ste// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam la bgod// sal nges par dbang 
32b4(rgyud 'grel): bskur te// shin du gzi ldan pakra shis mchog/ ces brjod pas gshegs su gsol// de nas rang yang khyim du 'gro// khyim du phyin nas 'khor dag la// slob dpon 'di ni dam tshig pas// bdag kyang 
32b5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig mchog dang ldan// 'di la rim gro phun sum tshogs// rta dang glang po nor dang 'bru// rin po che dang ci bzhed pa// khyed cag nga lam 'dri bar// slob dpon 'di la de phyir phul zhes bya bas/ bla ma la 
32b6(rgyud 'grel): yon dbul ba dang // dkyil 'khor gyi lha gshegs shing // sprul pa rang bsdu ba dang // tshon phyag cing dkyil 'khor gyi rdzas la sogs pa ji ltar bya ba'i rim pa bstan pa ni/ de nas bla ma la ni gus bcas 
32b7(rgyud 'grel): yon// rjes mthun khyod kyis sbyin par bya// des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams// phyir zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni// sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang // rang srog gis 
32b8(rgyud 'grel): brtags brten bya na// longs spyod g.yos pas smos ci dgos// gang phyir bskal pa bye bar ni// grangs med par yang rnyed dga' ba'i// sangs rgyas nyid dang rtsod ldan la// tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed// 
33a1(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu khyod kyis dam tshig srungs// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod// rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra// de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la// 
33a2(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu sbyin pa nyid du 'gyur// de byin bsod nams mchog dag gis// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// deng khyod skye ba 'bras bcas te// gang 'di legs par gnas pas na// dam tshig lha rnams kun dang // 
33a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam// rang byung du yang de skyes so// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa// kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas// khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che// rgyal po'i bdag por bstan pa yin// des ni bdud las rnam rgyal 
33a4(rgyud 'grel): te// grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs// khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas te// de nyid thob par the tshom med// de nas me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la legs par bstod de// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
33a5(rgyud 'grel): la gsol ba btab cing bzod par gsol pa la/ nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ gyen du bkrol te snying po 'di brjod par bya'o// oM kr-i to pa satwAr+tha// sid+d+ha ma d+hi dra ma thA nu ga ta/ gats+tshaH 
33a6(rgyud 'grel): bud+d+ha bi shi yaM/ sun rag ma na ya tu/ badz+ra satwa mu de/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams ni/ dzaHhUM ba hoHzhes bya bas rang gi lus la nye bar bsdu bar bya'o// de nas snying kha nas byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen
33a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyag rgyas rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na 'dug pas dbang bskur la/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis phreng ba bcings la/ go cha bcing ba snying po 'dis bya ste/ oM badz+ra rat+na b+hi Shiny+tsa/ sarba mu Ta me dr-i TaM ku ru pa ra ka ba tse na baM/ 
33a8(rgyud 'grel): go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcing po bkro ba la thal mo sbyar te/ bdag nyid mnyam pa'i thal mos dgyes pa'i snying po 'dis bya'o// oM badz+ra duSh+pe ho/ yi ge brgya pa brjod la/ rdo rje dga' bas legs so zhes bya ba 
33b1(rgyud 'grel): byin te/ legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// theg pa chen po bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // 
33b2(rgyud 'grel): theg pa chen po mdor bsdus pa'i// mdo 'di yang ni legs par bshad// oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya/ sarba big+h+nA badz+ra d+hA rAny+dza ya hUM hUM hUM hUM phaHzhes bya bas pur bu ston la 'o mas bkru'o// a kA ro mu khaM sarba 
33b3(rgyud 'grel): d+har+m+ma NAM A d+ya nut+pan+na trata zhes 'dis/ tshon rtsi la rnam pa bsdus la 'bad pas// chu klung chen por dor bar bya'o// de nas gnas kyang ba glang gi lci bas nye bar byugs la/ bza' ba dang ni bca' ba rnams/ 
33b4(rgyud 'grel): ci dga' bar ni sbyin par bya// khyi dang bya rog la sogs la// cung zad tsam yang ma sbyin no// yo byad rdzas rnams thams cad ni// slob dpon dag gis bsdus nas ni// slob ma rnams la bgor mi rung // dkyil 
33b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun// slob dpon bdag nyid dbang bar bshad// gal te slob mas spyad na ni// dam tshig las ni nyams par 'gyur// gang zhig spyod par mi 'dod na// de yi cho ga'i go rim 'di'o// dkon
33b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum gyi yo byad du// de dag cho ga bzhin du dbul// gdugs dang rnga yab dri la sogs// sangs rgyas nyid la dbul bar bya// gdan dang bdug spos dri la sogs// dam pa'i tshes la dbul bar bya// gos dang 
33b7(rgyud 'grel): yo byad snod la sogs// dge 'dun rnams la dbul bar bya// de dag la ni slob ma yis// cung zad tsam yang mi bskur ro// dge 'dun med na dge slong sbyin// yang na dge slong ma la sbyin// gal te bdag nyid mi 'dod na// 
33b8(rgyud 'grel): dge bsnyen dag la sbyin par bya// de nas de yi phyi de nyin// nyes byas lhag ma zhi bya'i phyir// mkhas pa yi ni zhi ba yi// sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// slob mas bdag zhi bya ba'i phyir// spyan la sogs pa'i gsang sngags// 
34a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// byams pa chen po'ang sgom par bya// nyes byas thams cad zhi bya'i phyir// de nas zhi ba chen po bya// de dag ni gzhug cing dbang bskur ba'i rim pa'o// / 
34a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang sbyin sreg byed pa na// las bshad de dag gzhan la min// bdag gi las dang gzhan dag ste// shi dang gson gyi las su bstan// zhes bya bas// bdag don dang gzhan don du sbyin sreg bya ba spyir 
34a3(rgyud 'grel): mdor bstan pa'o// de yang shi dang gson gyi las su bstan// zhes bya bas gzhan don bya ba khyad par du mdor bstan pa'o// de la bdag gi las bstan pa zhes bya ba nas// de ni bdag gi don bya ba la sogs 
34a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bdag gi don bya bar sbyin sreg bstan pa'o// de yang dbu gsum las lha rnams skyed ces bya bas yig 'bru dang phyag mtshan dang lha bskyed pa ste// cho ga gsum la bu'o// de la 
34a5(rgyud 'grel): a yig byin brlabs te/ zhes bya bas lha'i byin gyis brlab pa ste/ dbu la oM mgrin par AH'am hrIHdang thugs kar hUM bsam pa la bya'o// 'di las ma gsungs gzhan dag las// rgyas par bstan de der shes bya// 
34a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas/ gzhung 'di sbyin sreg ma rgyas pas/ mtshan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sbyin sreg rgyas pa dang / rgyas pa gzhan dang gzhan bzhin 'dir bya bar gsungs pa'o// gzhan don bya ba'i rim pa yang // shi dang na
34a7(rgyud 'grel): ba gnyis yin te// zhes bya bas/ gzhan don bya bas mdor bstan pa'o// de la na ba'i las bya ba zhes bya ba nas/ na ba las thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis// gang dag bgegs la sogs pa rnams
34a8(rgyud 'grel): kyis na bal/ zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis zhi ba'i las bya la/ gang dag zhi bar ma gyur pa rnams la drag po'i sbyin sreg gis las bya zhes pa'i don to// de nas shi ba la phan gdags pa'i rim pa 'byung ste/ ro'i sngon du bya ba'i 
34b1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga dang / ro sta gon la gnas pa dang / ro'i sbyin sreg chen pos sbyang ba dang / gsum gyi dam pa ston te/ dkyus dkrugs pa'i phyir gsal bar bya ba ni/ de nas shi la phan gdags na/ dang por gnod 
34b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bgegs gsal nas// ro la phan pa'i cho ga ni// phan pa'i gnod sbyin chus btab la// dang por bkru ba'i las yin no// de nas rnam rgyal chus bkang ba'i// bum pas bkrus te bgegs bslad 
34b3(rgyud 'grel): la// de nas de la bsrung bar bya'o// a yis kun khyab spyi stengs bsam// lhag 'gyur lha ni sngon bzhin bsam// a la ye shes lnga yis gang // de nas a yi spro bsdu bya// de nas gang shi de nyid la/ 
34b4(rgyud 'grel): mig la a a zhes bkod de// de ni sngon gyi cho ga'o// zhes bya bas/ ro'i sngon du bya ba'i rim pa ni// drang por gnod pa'i bgegs bsal te// gang zhe na snang la bden pa bdang ba ni// dkon mchog gsum la phyag
34b5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' bden pa dang / bden pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabs dang / rig sngags dang gsang sngags dang snying po da daphyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rig sngags kyi lha thams cad 
34b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis tshe 'das pa 'di la gson gyi dus su rnyas byed pa/ gshin gyi dus su gcags byed pa'i bgegs dang log 'dren gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad skad cig kyang ma gnas
34b7(rgyud 'grel): par dengs shig ces byas la/ yungs kar bdeg cing / hUM bzhi pa'i sngags zlas par bya'o// de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis gyen gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus bkrus la bgegs kyis mi tshugs par bsam/ 
34b8(rgyud 'grel): de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i chus bkrus/ sgrib pa thams cad dag par bsam/ de nas ro'i spyi bo'i steng de a bsams la/ de gyur pa las kho rang gi lhag pa'i lha ru bskyed/ de nas yang snying khang a 
35a1(rgyud 'grel): bsams la de las ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phros pas ro ye shes lnga dang ldan par gyur par bsam/ de nas ro'i lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ spyi bor zla ba'i steng du 
35a2(rgyud 'grel): oM dkar po bsam/ mgrin par zla ba'i steng du hrIHdmar po bsam/ snying khar zla ba'i steng du hUM nag po bsam de nas skye mched drug la dbyangs kyi yi ger zung re dgod do// de ni rten sbyang ba'o// de nas shes pa 
35a3(rgyud 'grel): dgug pa ni/ gong gi bden pa brdar la/ tshe 'das pa'i ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod 'di nas shi ba'i dus byas nas/ ngan song gsum la sogs pa 'gro ba gang na 'dug kyang rung / skad cig gis 'dir 
35a4(rgyud 'grel): khugs par gyur cig/ de nas sngags brjod pa ni/ oM sarba bit+sa Na pA paM A ka tA ya/ hUM dzaHa ni su dri pre du dza/ zhes brjod cing snying kha nas 'od 'phros pa las khugs par bsam mo// dzaHhUM baM hoH
35a5(rgyud 'grel): brjod la yang bstim par bsam mo// de nas bgegs dang da bral ba ni// gong gi bden pa bdar la/ gong ma ltar 'dir yang bgegs bskrad do// de nas 'gro ba rigs drug nas drang ba ni/ 'gro ba rigs drug gi snying
35a6(rgyud 'grel): bos 'gro ba ris drug nas ro'i shes pa drang ba nas mya ngan 'das pa'i 'bras bu thob par bsam mo// de nas gtad par bya ba ni mchod pa'i bye brag rol dbul ba dang // me tog gi char dbab pa'o// de dag ni sngon du bya ba'i 
35a7(rgyud 'grel): rim pa'o// // de nas gnas pa'i cho ga bshad// shi ba dkyil 'khor dbus bzhag ste// zhag lnga slob dpon skang gnas te// bgegs bskrad la sogs byas nas ni// 'khor los lha rnams mdun bsam ste/ 
35a8(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal spro bskyed la sogs bya// de nas tshig 'di ched rjod bya// deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod// bdag gi gson pa'am 'bras bur bcas// lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par// gyur pa bdag ni// 
35b1(rgyud 'grel): the tshom med// byang chub sems dang sems gcig pas// mi ldog par ni bdag gyur ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni// deng bdag skye bar the tshom med// deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste// 
35b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi mchod sbyin tha na med// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas// deng bdag 'dul ba'i mchog yin no// de nas sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin dang // rgyal mchog la sogs bsgom bya ste// sgo dbye la sogs 
35b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas 'dir bshad// de nas spos thogs la// spyan drang tshig 'di brjod par bya// kye dbang bskur des ste bla na med// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// ma lus bdag la dgongs su 
35b4(rgyud 'grel): gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis// 'odi la phan gdags don ched du// gnas 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te// 'di la dbang ni stsal du gsol// de rjes gsang sngags 'di brjid bya// 
35b5(rgyud 'grel): a a sarba ta thA ga ta hrid ya ha ra ha ra/ oM d+hAd+hIHb+ha ga we/ dz+nyA na murti/ lAg+ni shwa ra ma hA ba tsa sarba d+harma// ga gan+d+ha mA la su pa ri shud+d+had+haHrmad+hA tra dz+nyA na gar+b+ha eHzhes ni brjod pa'i sngags pa zlas so// dang po 
35b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas nga rgyal dang // ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir// tshigs bcad 'di yis bstod par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod bya ba// rang le bstod de nges pa'i mchog/ 'bras bu 'byin pa'i sangs
35b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyis// shi la phan gdags don ched du// mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud// des ni gsol ba gdab byas nas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' la// mngon sum 'dra bar gang bar bsgom// 
35b8(rgyud 'grel): de nas phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dang // dang por sangs rgyas la sogs pa// nam mkha' gang bar 'di bzhes la// deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin te// de nas til gyis de la ni// bskor te sbyin sreg dbul 
36a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// shi ba lta gon la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya bas/ ro sta gon la gnas pa bstan te/ de yang de nas ro sta gon la gnas pa ni// shin du dben pa'i gnas su// 
36a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa byas la// lha rnams kyi gnas su me tog gi tshom bu bkod de// dbus su khri byas la ras bzang po yug gcig gis dkris te// de'i snying du ro bzhag la rdo rje slob dpon gyis 
36a3(rgyud 'grel): dkar gsum bza' zhing za gcig pa'i smyung ba byas la// rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phyag rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan par bsgoms nas/ de nas yang sngon bzhin ro'i bgegs pa smad la/ de'i 'og tu rdo rje 'khor lo'i 
36a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la sprul la/ phyag dang mchod pa dang bstod pa yan chod sngon bzhin byas la/ de'i 'og tu tshig 'di brjod par bya ste/ deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ de bdag 
36a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa mchog yin no// zhes pa'i bar te/ de ltar zhag lnga'i bar du nyin zhag re la thun bzhi'i sbyor bas lha la mchod pa dang rol yungs kar ram bye mas zab cing sngags ring gi bzlas pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu 
36a6(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' la bzhugs pa gshegs su gsol la/ de nas zhag lnga'i nang par slob dpon gyis ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum sngon bzhin bsgoms la/ de nas spos thogs la spyan drangs tshig 'di brjod par bya// 
36a7(rgyud 'grel): kye dbang bskur nges te bla na med// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis// 'di la phan gdags don ched du// gnas 'dir 
36a8(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gshegs te// 'di la dbang ni sul du gsol// zhes brjod la ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar bsam mo// de nas zhag drug pa la dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su zhi ba'i 
36b1(rgyud 'grel): thab bcas te// til nag pos sdig pa sbyang ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas gzugs bsnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bri bI phyir 'dud nyis bstod pa'o// de dag ni ro sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas sngon 
36b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi sbyor ba yis// cho ga rnams ni dpyad par bya// dang po'i cho ga'i rim pa nas// 'khor lo rim pa 'dir gsungs te// pha rol phyung ste gtor ma sbyin// de nas khrus byas mchod pa'i tshogs// ma lus
36b3(rgyud 'grel): par ni 'dir bshad do// de nas phyi'i rim ldan pas// sngags pa chas gos ldan pa yis// shin tu bsgyings pas brgyan byas te// zhag bdun nang par sbyin sreg bya// mi nyid shi ba'i gnas byas te// shil
36b4(rgyud 'grel): phan pa'i dkyil 'khor ldan// gzhal yas khang la de 'dra ba// 'di la gsungs te gzhan du min// 'di ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga ni// bdag gis rang gzor ma byas te// 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang // cho ga 'dus pa'i rgyud las te// 
36b5(rgyud 'grel): des na 'dir ni 'os pa yin// 'di ni shi ba'i cho ga'o// shi bal pa na gdags pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya bas/ ro sbyin sreg chen pos sbyang ba ste/ de yang de nas zhag bdun pa la rol dkyil 'khor chen por 
36b6(rgyud 'grel): sreg khang gcig pa dang / rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dgod pa dang / rgyan dgod pa dang / mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs pa gzhung bzhin du bkug la/ de nas ro sreg khang du drangs te/ sreg khang 
36b7(rgyud 'grel): la lan gsum bskor la shar phyogs nas nang du gzhug/ de nas slob dpon gyi sa dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin nas gzung ste/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yan chad bsgoms la/ 
37a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa rdzogs par byas te// de nas rung g.yab kyi me sbar la me'i spra brtag ste/ dam tshig gi me lha bskyed pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi me lha spyan drang ba dang / 
37a2(rgyud 'grel): mdun gyi nam mkha' la bstod pa dang / dgug gzhug bcing ba dang phyag rgyas gdab pa dang / byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang / sreg rdzas phul ba yan chod byas 
37a3(rgyud 'grel): ba ni me lha'i mchod pa'o// de nas me lha'i thugs khar yi ge b+h+rUM las po brang rim pa gsum dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang bsgoms la thab tu me tog re dong zhing / gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor
37a4(rgyud 'grel): nas me lha'i thugs kar re mos sam dus gcig tu spyan drangs te/ sreg rdzas rnams dbul bar bya'o// de nas mjug gi cho ga ni/ bzod par gsol ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang / phyag rgya
37a5(rgyud 'grel): dgrol zhing ye shes gshegs pa dang / skyed pa snying khar bsdu ba dang phur bu gdon zhing phyogs skyong gso ba dang / mchod rdzas la sogs pa bsdu ba dang / sman pa dang rdul tshon phyags la/ gdugs dang 
37a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan la sogs pas spyan drangs la/ chu bo chen por dor bar bya'o// de nas ba'i rnam pa lngas skyang nul byas la thig le la sogs pa mi mthong bar byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi thog tu spyan gzigs 
37a7(rgyud 'grel): da sder bzang la sogs pa bzhag nas bkra shis brjod la/ slob ma mgu bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor du phul ba'i yo byad rnams ni slob dpon bkyer bar bya'o// de dag ni ngan song nas drang ba'i cho ga'o// 
37a8(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi lam la dgod pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / dbang bskur ba'o// de nas byi de nang par ram zhag gsum na yang rung ste/ rus pa lo mas dkrus la dkyil 
37b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bkod pa'i rgyud chen po'am bye ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs rgyud chen po nas byung ba bzhin du tsha tsha bta ba la/ tsha tsha dang po btab pa dang ming byang la/ yid kyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / 
37b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur bar bya ba 'am/ yang na slob ma gson po ji ltar 'jug pa ltar dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / rig pa'i dbang bskur ba dang / slob dpon du dbang bskur ba dang / rjes su 
37b3(rgyud 'grel): gnang ba dbang bskur ba'o// de nas de la lam bstan bya// tshegs bdag dge ba'i don la sbyar zhes bya bas shi ba'i lam bstan par bya ste/ slob dpon gyis me tog gcig gyen tu 'phangs/ 
37b4(rgyud 'grel): te/ song cig song tsog rigs kyi bu// tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam// mthong ba'i lam dang sgom pa'i lam// byang chub bar chad med pa'i lam// mdor na lam ni de rnams su// zhugs
37b5(rgyud 'grel): nas byang chub 'thob gyur cig/ ces bya'o// de nas shi bi'i don du sbyin gtong rgya chen po bya ste/ tsha tsha gshegs su gzhug go/ ro sbyin sreg chen po sa sbyang ba'o// de yang lung las rdo rje 
37b6(rgyud 'grel): dril bu lag par sbyin// mgo la dbu rgyan bson par bya// rdo rje sdom pa rnams byin te// bum pa'i dab bskur rnams byin la// mig sogs rdo rje gti mug sogs// rdo rje ga sum ni gnas 
37b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum dgod// rdo rje thab khung rab sbyor gyis// 'du byed rab tu bya bar bstan// nyi ma gsum ni lon pa na// rus pa'i phreng ba bsdus byas la// dri dang 'o mas bran nas ni// de yis 
37b8(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten du bya ba'o// zhes gsungs so// de mthar de nyid rtag bsgom dang zhes pa nas/ rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gong thams cad kyi rim par bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin
38a1(rgyud 'grel): ston to// spyir tshe ga'i rim thams cad zin nas thun mtshams sam/ thun la mi 'jug kyang rung ste// ye shes pa gshegs shing / de nas gzhal yas khang lha la bsdu ba dang / 
38a2(rgyud 'grel): lha thams cad gtso bo la bsdus la yig 'bru bsgom mo// yig 'bru ni thams cad kyi ngo bo a ste/ a stong pa nyid las skad cig mas lhar dran par byas nas dge ba'i las rnams byang bar snyan pa'o// 
38a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas 'khor lo snyan par bya zhes bya ba nas/ shes rab 'khor lor grags pa yin zhes bya ba'i bar gyis shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom bstan pa ste/ dkyus nyid gsal ba'i phyir ma dkrol lo// de yang shin 
38a4(rgyud 'grel): du zab pa dang / bla ma la rag las pa'i man ngag ston te/ de yang dang por bdag nyid khams dang zas snyoms par 'du 'dzi spangs la gnas bsam gtan gyi tsher ma med par skyil krung bcas la/ lag pa
38a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi steng du g.yas bzhag la phang bar bkan te/ skal ba'i steng du skal ba bzhag la/ mig sna gong du phab la sor 'byar la ma reg par byas la lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas rtsa'i 'khor lo bzhi ye dang 
38a6(rgyud 'grel): chas su lus la yod pa dkyus bzhin gsal btab la/ de nas dang por lte ba'i 'khor lo la sems rtse gcig tu gtad la bsgom/ de gsal nas de bzhin du snying dang mgrin pa dang / mtshogs ma rnams rim 
38a7(rgyud 'grel): gyis gsal bar bsgoms la/ de nas rkang pa dang mdoms mor rlung dang me bsams te/ rlung gi me spang te rtsa g.yas na mar zhugs/ lte bi'i 'khor lo bde ba'i thig ler zhu/ de bzhin du me rlung gis phul 
38a8(rgyud 'grel): te snying kha dang mgrin pa dang mtshogs ma rnams rims kyi sa bzhu nas/ lus thams cad bde ba'i thig les gang bar bsam zhing / blo bsam gtan gyi bde ba la gnas par bya ste/ me ni gnas der langs so// 
38b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o// de nas spyi bo'i ta ma las mes zhu bas thig le'i bde brtsa ba g.yon na mar babs nas/ dang por mtshogs ma'i 'khor lo gsos te/ sngon bzhin du 'khor lo nyid du gyur pang bsam mo// 
38b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du mgrin pa dang snying kha dang lte ba'i 'khor lo rnams rims kyis gsal bar bsam mo// de ltar yang nas yang du rtse gcig gi sems kyis goms pas zhi gnas kyi bde ba skye bar 'gyur ba ni 
38b3(rgyud 'grel): man ngag go// 'di ltar rtag tu gang bsgoms pa zhes pa nas/ de dag ni shes rab kyi 'khor lo'i bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gyis/ shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa'i phan yon bstan 
38b4(rgyud 'grel): te/ dkyus nyid gsal bas 'dir ma bkrol lo// sangs rgyas kun dang thabs gcig pa'i/ zhes pa nas/ mi dpya dang mtshungs sems dang ldan par shog/ ces bya ba'i bar gyis/ slob dpon 
38b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis ji ltar brtsams pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bsngo ba bstan pa ste/ skabs de nyid phyir ma bkrol lo// 'di bsdus dge rtsa gang yod des/ 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi zhal mthong shig/ gsang ba'i 
38b6(rgyud 'grel): dka' 'grel bshad pa don bsdus sgron ma rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po de wA ka ra tsan+d+ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba glog skyes bskur ba'o// / @#// gsang ldan gyi tho yig smr-i ti sadz+nyA na gnyis ma 
38b7(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhug so// @#/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// rigs kun bdag po 'jam dpal dang // bla ma de la phyag 'tshal lo// mchog dang thun mong sgrub 'dod pa// gang 
38b8(rgyud 'grel): zag rnams la phan pa'i phyir// bla ma rim pa brgyud pa yis// tshe ga'i rim pa brjod par bya// dkyil 'khor bdun gyi cho ga la// bsnyen pas dang sta gon dang // dkyil 'khor zhag gi tshe ga'o// 
39a1(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa'i las su bya ba la// dang po las dang sbyor ba gsum// mchod bstod bsnyen pa bya ba'o// dang po'i las su bya ba la// nye reg 'thor 'thung stong par bsgom// skur gyur
39a2(rgyud 'grel): lce dang lag pa brlab// bsrung dang tshogs bsag phyag lnga bya// sdom bzung lus bsreg skur ldang ngo // srung la bdag dang gnas srung ste// bdag nyid srung ba bya ba yang // bskyed brlab dbang dang go bsgag 
39a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas srung ba yi rim pa la// bsnun dang bsreg dang bcing ba bya// khro bo rdo rje'i rab bsgom// tshigs bsag pa yi rim pa yang // sbyin sreg bya zhing mchod pa brlab// rten sprul bstod de gsal por bsgom/ 
39a4(rgyud 'grel): dga' bar gyur pas bstod pa bya// phyag mchod sdig bshags yi rang bya// bskul dang gsol gdab dge bsngo// skyabs 'grol ma bsnyen sems skyed do// bstod bya gnang sbyin bslar bstod bya// skyong 
39a5(rgyud 'grel): ba gsum la dang po dang // rgyal mchog dang ni las dag go/ dang po'i sbyor ba bya ba la// ye shes bzhi dang gtso bo bskyed// ye shes me long mnyam nyid dang // so so chos dbyings nan tan no// gzhal 
39a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mchod rten dang // chos 'byung rgya gram bsgom pa dang // gzhal yas gdan dang bcas pa'o// gtso bo bskyed pa dag la yang // cho ga rnam pa gsum las su// gzhi yi sangs rgyas bskyed pa dang // 
39a7(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i sangs rgyas 'khor lo dang // ye shes sems dang zla ba a'o// dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgom pa yang // dang por yig 'bru bskyed pa dang // de las phyag mtshan sku pra mo// thig ler gyur 
39a8(rgyud 'grel): te sku rnams bskyed// las kyi rgyal po mchog la ni// sgo dbye bsdub spad yon dbul bstod// bstim la bsrad de sgo yang bcad// rgyas gdab dbang bskur las la sbyar// mchod cing bstod pa bya 
39b1(rgyud 'grel): ba yang // dang po'i sangs rgyas bye byas la// mchod brlab sgo dbye snyan gsan dbab// spyan drangs bskrad la yon dbul bstod// nang du dgug gzhug bya ba dang // bskrad cing sgo bcad go yang sgo// rgyas gdab 
39b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang dang ldan par bya// mchod dang bstod pa rgyas par bya'o// bsnyon pa bya ba'i rim pa yang // phyag byas thugs bzhugs las sngags brjod// sngags dgod brtan byas zla ba bya// thun mtshams dag zhu rang 
39b3(rgyud 'grel): bya la// mchod bstod phyag rgya dge ba bsngo// bzod gsol lha bsdus spyod lam bya// thun la babs na na bzhugs skad// sgo bcad lha dgod mchod pa brlab// mchod bstod phyag bya yon chab dbul// thugs 
39b4(rgyud 'grel): kar zhugs te gong ltar bya// thun gsum dag la de dang 'bar// thun bzhi pa yi tha ma ru// gor ltar byas la don gsol gdab// smon lam ga dpal ye shes gshegs// dkyil 'khor bsdus te rang la bsrung // 
39b5(rgyud 'grel): brgya pa bzlas te spyod lam bya'o// de ni bsnyen pa rgyas pa'o// bsnyen pa bsdus pa bya ba yang // gtso bo yan chad sgom byas la// sbyor ba rnam gnyis bzhag pa ste// phyi mgong ltar bya ba yin// grangs dang 
39b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa yang // bzlas dang bsgom pa'i khyad par ro// de ltar bya ba'i rjes dag la// phran tshegs pa ni ci rigs gdagos// de rnams sngon du bsnyen pa'o// de nas ma'i cho ga ste// brtag dang 
39b7(rgyud 'grel): bsrang dang sbyang ba dang // gzung dang rdo rje'i sgrub pa'o// brtag pa phyogs dang mtshan nyid dang // gnas dang lto 'phye'i brtag pa'o// slang ba snang dang mi snang ste// mi snang ba la bslang ba yang // maN+Dal 
39b8(rgyud 'grel): byas la dri tshom dgod// bdag nyid lhar bskyed lha tshogs sprul// de la mchod stod gtor ma sbyin// lha mo bskyed la spyan drangs te// bskrad bstim rgyas gdab dbang bskur bya// mchod dang gtor 'bul 
40a1(rgyud 'grel): sa slang bya// ye shes gshegs pa dam tshig bstim// sbyang ba las dang bya ba dang // sngags dang phyag rgyas spang byas te// pra brtag bum zhugs 'thas par bcag/ rdo rje sgrub par bya 
40a2(rgyud 'grel): ba ni// slob dpon rgyan gyis brgyan byas la// skegs bu'i dbus su gnas byas te// dang por nye reg bya ba nas// bzlas la thag pa yan chod bya// mchod cing bstod la gsol ba gdab// dkyil
40a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bteg la rang yang babs// gnas gsum brlabs la spro ba bskyed// phyag byas spos thog spyan yang drang // bka' bsgo bskor te bsrung ba bya// b+h+rUM ma ma khaM las dkyil 'khor bskyed// khro ba 
40a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba bstim byas la// pur bus gdab pa'i las bya'o// sta gon bya ba'i ra mi pa ni// lha dang bum pa sbyin sreg dang // lha mo dang ni slob ma'o// lha yi sta gon bya ba la// gnas su dri dang me tog dgod// 
40a5(rgyud 'grel): de las lhar skyed bstim la mchod// bum pa mtshan nyid ldan bya la// mtshan bya mgul btsangs kha rgyan te// bsrad bdug bsangs la bcud brug go/ bum pa bam las bskyed byas la// nang du lha bskyed spun / 
40a6(rgyud 'grel): yang drang // bstim la rgyas gdab dbang ldan bya// mchod cing bstod la bzlas par bya'o// sbyin sreg shar du thob byas la// shing gcer me sbar me lha bskyed// de la mchod la thugs khar ni// sum 
40a7(rgyud 'grel): rtsegs bskyed la spyan drangs bstim// mchod cing bstod la sreg rdzas dbul// spyan ma gnod sbyin dag la yang // sbyin sreg rim bzhin dbul bar bya// sa yi lha mo'i sta gon ni// gong ltar byas te mi gshegs so// 
40a8(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob ma'i sta gon ni// phyi rol gtor ma byin byas la// khrus byas gos gon me tog thogs// phyag byas gsol gdab sna gtor bskul// sdig bshags yi rang skyabs su 'gro// sems bskyed 
40b1(rgyud 'grel): lam gnas rdo rje lta bu bya// lhar bskyed byin brlabs de la mchod// so shing ku sha srang skud gdags// gzengs bstod nyal gzhug spro ba bskyed// lhal mchod cing bstod pa bya// phyag byas gsol 
40b2(rgyud 'grel): ba lan gsum gdab// dge ba bsngo zhing bzod gsol bya// gsol ba gdab cing smon lam gdab// sangs rgyas dang por mtshan 'don gnas// dkyil 'khor zhag gi cho ga la// thig dang tshon dang sgrub pa dang // 
40b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug cing dbang bskur bya ba'o// thig la las dang ye shes te// ye shes snal ma sa ra ba la// byin brlabs bsgril te snod bcug mchod// bzlas te rim pas gdab par bya// gdab pa dang po gnam thig ste// 
40b4(rgyud 'grel): denas sa thig gdab pa'o// tshon ni byin brlabs bzlas te dgye// pan tsa ka phyogs tshon dang // mtshan ma'i bye brag bri bar bya// bsgrub pa bya ba'i rim pa yang // dkyil 'khor brgyan te mdo gdon bzhag 
40b5(rgyud 'grel): khrus byas gzhan la shar sgor gnas// bsrung dang gsang gtor dkyil 'khor bslang // sgo phye bum dgod lhar bskyed de// nam mkha'i lha tshogs phab la bsre// bdag nyid dang po'i lhar bskyed de// sngags
40b6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas par spro tshur 'du bya// lha rnams stong bsgoms slar la bskyed// de nas sgo dbye la sogs pa// sngon du bstan pa bzhin du bya// phyi rol dag tu byung byas la// 'jig rten pa la gtor ma byin// slar la nang du 
40b7(rgyud 'grel): zhugs byas la// sbyin sreg dag gis tshim par bya// de nas slob ma 'jug par yang // lha la gsol gdab gnang bar bsam// slob mas khrus byas me tog thogs// yol bas bcad la phyi rol dgug/ 
40b8(rgyud 'grel): slob ma phyag byas gsol ba gdab// gdong dang stod dang smad g.yogs te// nang bkug phyag bya sdig pa bshags// yi rang bskul dang gsol ba gdab// slob dpon 'dod phyir yang gsol gdab/ 
41a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas dam tshig dag ni dbog/ dam tshig 'dzin par khas len gzhug/ sems bskyed pa dang lhar bskyed brlab// dam tshig bsgrag cing de la mchod// las kyi bum pas dbar yang 
41a2(rgyud 'grel): bskur// sgo bzhir bcug la slar yang ni// shar sgor bzhag la mna' yang skrag/ man ba chu blud la ye shes dbab// mchod cing smad gzhug phreng ba dor// mgo la bcings te snang ba brtag/ mi dbye ba dang 
41a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bstan// da bar bskur ba yi rim pa dang // sgrub pa bo dang slob dpon ni// sgrub pa po ru dbang bskur na// rang gi lhar bskyed de la mchod// dang po rig pa'i dbang bskur te// bkra shis brjod 
41a4(rgyud 'grel): cing chu dbang bskur// dbu rgyan dang ni rdo rje sbyin// dril bu dang ni ming yang gdags// gsar ba'i ye shes sngags kyang sbyin// phyag rgya bzhi brlab brtul zhugs sbyin// slob dpon dag tu dbang bskur na// 
41a5(rgyud 'grel): shar sgo sna tshogs pad+ma bri// slob ma sangs rgyas dang por skyed// rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur bar bya// dam tshig gsum dang gsang ba dang // gsang rgyal dang ni nges pa'i dbang // rim pa bzhin du bskur bar 
41a6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// dam tshig gsum la rdo rje dang // dril bu dang ni phyag rgya'o// gsang ba'i dbang la dkyil 'khor dang // lha dang slob dpon las rnams so// gsang rgyal dag gi dbang bskur ba// de bzhin rigs dang 
41a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang // rin po che dang pad ma dang // las kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'o// nges pa'i dbang la gzhan don dang // rang don nges pa'i dbang bskur ro// gzhan don nges pa'i dbang bskur na// bye brag dag dang sde/ 
41a8(rgyud 'grel): dag go/ bye brag la yang 'di lta ste// de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje dang // rin chen rigs dang pad ma dang // las kyi rigs kyi nges pa'o// rang don nges pa'i dbang bskur ba// gsang ba'i ye shes 
41b1(rgyud 'grel): brlab cing sngags kyang sbyin// phyag brgya bzhi brlab lung yang bstan// gzengs bstod pa dang dbugs dbyung ba'o// de mthar dbang bstan bya ba'i phyir// brtul zhugs dag gi dbang bskur ro// de ltar 
41b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur rdzogs pa dang // dkyil 'khor lha la mchod cing bstod// dge ba bsngo zhing gzod gsol bya// smon lam gdab la don gsal gdab// ye shes gshegs la dkyil 'khor bsdu// brgya pa 
41b3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas shing gzugs brnyan bkra// lhag chad bskang phyir sbyin sreg bya// mtshan brjod pa yi gsung rab bsgrag/ gsang ldan ma yi ban+di tha// dkyil 'khor bdun gyi tho yig 'di// bdag gis 
41b4(rgyud 'grel): bsdebs pa'i dge ba yis// kun gyis 'jam mgon thob par shog/ gsang ldan ma'i tho yig/ pan+di thar byas pa smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrtas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // a hUM b+h+rUM hrIH/ a br-i/ sa haM a yaM khaM a a/ 
41b5(rgyud 'grel): lha'i gtso bo bskyed do// dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgom mo// las rgyal mchog bsgom mo// 'bags pa'ang ma dpal gyi macan par dag par badzad pa'i dkyil ba mar gyichag baN+Di tashA d+ha gar bya mdzad pa/ 
41b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mas+t+ra shrI nA ma sa gI ti maN+Dal bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs 
41b7(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo// ngo bo nyid kyi sku mnga' zhing // sgyu me'i rang bzhin 'byung gnas che// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku// 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal te// dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya// dang po
41b8(rgyud 'grel): re shig slob ma ni// dad ldan dam tshig brtul zhugs srung // rtog med rgyud gcig bla ma dang // 'jam pa'i dpal la mos pa yis// khro med sngags dang rgyud la mkhas// thos ldan rgyud 'dir dbang thob pas// 
42a1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig gsum la gnas pa des// dang po 'phags pa'ajam dpal gyi lha rnams sgrub pa'i thabs las 'byung ba bzhin du bkren pa bya ste/ sngags kyi phreng ba 'bum du bzlas pa ni sngon du 
42a2(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa'o// gzhung las bsam gtan dang ni rjes mthun pa'i// ri yi phug gam chu yi 'gram// rdzing das rang dga'i gnas dag gam// lha khang mchod rten la sogs par gsungs pas na// de lta bu'i gnas 
42a3(rgyud 'grel): der song la// ci tsam 'byor pa'i tshad kyis byas la// sa yongs su brtag pa der// bdud rtse 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i chus gtor// dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa byas nas// der mchod pa dang gtor ma 
42a4(rgyud 'grel): bshams la// sa'i lha mo las blang ba ni// thob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spong pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang // sa dang pha rol du phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dpar du gyur// skyob pa shAkya seng ge 
42a5(rgyud 'grel): yis/ khaM ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa// de ltar bdag gis bdud bcom nas// bdag gis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// ces brjod nas thal mos la brdabs pas// sku phyed tsams la thon pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi don du dkyil 
42a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor byed pas bdag byin ces brjod pas/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po gyis shig ces brjod nas sal thim par bsam mo// sa brang ba'o// de nas drag po'i spyan sreg gos bgegs pa zlog la/ 
42a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid du bdag dang tho zhi ba'i phyir sbyin sreg byas la der sa sbyang bar bya ste/ 'dom gang tsam la sogs pa brkos la sa'i ro lnga gsal te/ der rin po che sna lnga dang ldan pa'i bum pa bcug la spangs sa dag

42b1(rgyud 'grel): lan bdun bzlas par bya'o// sa gzung ba'i rim pa'o// // de nas bdag nyid ji snyed pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa byas te/ bkra shis pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la/ sgrub pa'i thabs
42b2(rgyud 'grel): las 'byung ba bzhin du bdag bsrung ba nas bgegs gzhon pa la sogs pa bya ba dang / de nas rten sprul pa tshogs bsag pa nas/ ye shes par gyur pa'i bar du byas la/ der gong gi dang 'dra ba'i lha
42b3(rgyud 'grel): mo sta gon byas la/ de nas spro ba bskyed de/ deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod// bdag ni gson pa 'bras bur bcas// lha dang dam tshig mnyam pa ru// gyur par bdag ni som nyi med// byang chub sems 
42b4(rgyud 'grel): dang sems gcig las// mi ldog par ni bdag gyur to// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi rigs su ni// der bdag skye bar the tshom med// de bdag nyi ma dam pa ste// mchod sbyin 'di ni bla na med// phyogs bcu'i 
42b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pa// der bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no// de nas phyag byas spos thogs la// kye dbang ni nges te bla na med// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// ma lus bdag la/ 
42b6(rgyud 'grel): dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bri// deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te// dngos grub 'di ni srul du gsol// ces brjod la dang po'i

43a1(rgyud 'grel): 'char// dpag med rnams kyi bka' bzhin du// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// ces gsol ba btab la/ de nas langs te/ lha rnams la phyag 'tshal nas// 
43a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni rang nyid ral gri can// dang po 'i sangs rgyas bdag rang nyid// da ni sangs rgyas rgyal po ste// stobs chen ral gri can bdag nyid// de nas mig dang rkang pa byin gyis brlabs te// bsgom 
43a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dkyil 'khor steng du bteg la// byang shar mtshams nam bskor ba byas te// hUM ye shes zhi ba'i rang las ma g.yos kyang // skra yi ha lugs za byed rngam skabs can// gsung gi nga ro ba brag stong ldir ba'i//
