59a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gdab/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas byin gyis brlab/ sems pa rnams gnas bzhir yum bzhis brlab/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams rin 
59a2(rgyud 'grel): po che'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur/ sems pa rnams rigs lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ro// de nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga la sogs pas mchod/ de nas gsang ba dang 'thor 'thung 
59a3(rgyud 'grel): byas la gong ma lta bu rdzas sngags sam/ ya na spyi sngags sam/ lha'i sngags kyis dbul lo// de nas gsang ba dang 'thor 'thung byin la/ mar gyi dgang blugs phul la 'dud nyi shus bstod pa
59a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// yi ge brgya pa bzlas/ oM badz+ra muHzhes phyag rgya bkrol la bskyed pa snying khar bsdu/ spyan drangs pa gshegs su gsol te/ 'gro ba 'di dag kun gyi dpung / sems pa chen po 
59a5(rgyud 'grel): brtan mdzod la/ sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang / slar yang gshegs pa mdzad du gsol de nas gsang gtor byas la/ slar yang me thab tu bsams la/ mchod yon la sogs pa byin la/ 
59a6(rgyud 'grel): te/ oM AHhUM muHzhes brjod la/ khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings/ gyen du bkrol la gshegs su gsol/ gtor ma btang phyag btsal mchod bstod bzod par gsol/ dngos grub 
59a7(rgyud 'grel): blang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo/ phyag rgya dgrol bskor ba bya/ gshegs su gsol/ bskyed pa bsdu/ sman ma phyag/ phyogs skyong gsol/ tha ma slob ma bsrungs la dgye'o// de nas skar ma 
59b1(rgyud 'grel): bzang po la rus pa bsdus la tsha tsha 'debs par bzhag go/ bdag gis sgrub thabs legs sbyar bas// 'jam dpal mtshan mchog tho ba gyur cig/ 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod 
59b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgrub thabs gsang ba'i sgron ma/ slob dpon chen po pradz+nyA gu rus mdzad pa rdzogs so// / @#// 'phags pa 'jab dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'khor ma'i rim pa bzhugs so// 
59b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI rA ma saM gI ti tsakra kra ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa/ bcom ldan 'das 
59b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// thogs med dus mtha' nam mkha' bsod nams dpag med pa// mkha' mnyam sems can sgrol phyir thams cad mkhyen bsngos 
59b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// 'jam dbyangs mtshan ldan dus gsum bde gshegs dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa'i tshul lo// kun du gzigs par lung bstan bsam gyis mi khyab de la bdag 
59b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal// bla ma dam pa'i gzhung lugs las// man ngag rgyas par rab bstan pa// snyigs ma'i sems can blo zhan rnams// rnam rtog g.yeng bas mos pa nyung // de la dran phyir
59b7(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa 'dis// grub dang lung bstan ma tho ba kyang // sman pa phan par bzhugs pa bzhin// pa dag gis 'di ni byas pa yin// dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa yis// yid dga' ba'i gnas// 
59b8(rgyud 'grel): dag tu// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// yi ge a ni rnams bsams nas// de yi 'od kyis bla ma dang // bde gshegs sras dang bcas pa
60a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams// mdun du mngon sum lta bur dmigs// lus ngag yid kyis yang dag par// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo// rgya chen 'dod pa thams cad kyis// 
60a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun la mchod par bgyi// sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun la// bdag sdig thams cad so sor bshags// sangs rgyas byang chub sems bskyed pa'i// dge ba kun la rdza yi// 
60a3(rgyud 'grel): rang // mngon sangs rgyas nas ni ring ba'i// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la// chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni// bskor phyir bdag gis bskul bar 'tshal// yongs su mya ngan 'da'
60a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// bskal pa rab mang bzhugs par ni// sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba 'debs// gang yang bdag gis mchod pa rnam drug dang // dge ba 
60a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan byas de dag thams cad ni// bla med rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob phyir// bdag gis chos bzhin yongs su bgyi// chos la dbang bskur sangs rgyas thams cad la// byang 
60a6(rgyud 'grel): chub snying po'i bar du skyabs su mchi// e ma sems can tha med skal bya'i phyir// bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa thob gyur cig/ bdag nyid dngos po dbul lags kyi// sangs 
60a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis// ji ltar bzhed pa mdzad pa'i phyir// bdag lus so sor bzhes su gsol// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi// khyad 'phags lam ni bdag 
60a8(rgyud 'grel): gis bsten// de nas ye shes rnam lnga yi// gzugs brnyan tsam la rab dmigs la// rang bzhin gyis ni rnam dag pa// rang bzhin gyis ni byin gyis brlab// oM shUn+ya ta dz+nyA na 
60b1(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra swa b+hA wa arma ko&haM/ nam mkha' lta bur rab dmigs la// yi ge b+h+rUM las byung ba yi// stong gsum tshad dang mnyam pa yi// mchod rten bde gshegs gzhal yas khang // rim pa drug 
60b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan par bsgom// mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs par bsam// dbus kyi snying po'i pho brang du// dbus su seng+ge'i gangan nyid de// gzhan yang rim pa ji bzhin bsam// de yi dbus mi'i 
60b3(rgyud 'grel): gdan thog tu// a las bskyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das// mdog dkar ral pa'i thor gtsug can// zhi brgyan spangs byang chub mchog/ kun du zhal gyi rnam par mdzes// de thugs d+hIHlas 
60b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa yi// gdong lnga zur phud lnga pa me tog thod// g.yas pa bzhin ral gri ste// g.yon bzhi shes rab po ti bsdams// rgyar dang na bza' gzhon nu'i tshul// thugs kar a las byung ba 
60b5(rgyud 'grel): yi// 'khor lo rim pa bzhi dang ldan// ji ltar gsang sngags dgod pa ni// 'khor lo'i cho ga mthong ba yi// dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs khar bsam// lte ba a las byung ba yi// ye shes
60b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' zhal drug pa// ut+pal dbar la sdod po ni// po tis mtshan pa bsnams pa'o// gzhon nu'i brgyar ldan thugs khang ni// zla ba'i steng du a kar bsam// de las so sor 'phros pa 
60b7(rgyud 'grel): yis// rim bzhin thams cad snang byas nas// nam mkha'i mkha' mnyam sems can gyi// ma rig mun pa bsal byas nas// slar 'dus rim bzhin rang nyid kyi// yi ge'i nang du 'dus
60b8(rgyud 'grel): par lta// de nas sngags kyi 'khor lo yi// mtshan brjod rim par klag pa yang // 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// zhes pa dang po nas brtsams nas// don chen yi ge dam 
61a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bar// rang gi de nyid brjod pa yin// khong nas byung ba skye ba med// tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed// de mthar thug pa yum bzhi yin// mchod pa chen po 'dod/ 
61a2(rgyud 'grel): chags che// zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas// chags pa thams cad sel bar byed// de dag mthar ni rigs lnga ste// bde gshegs yab dang yum rnams kyang // mtshan gyi don/ 
61a3(rgyud 'grel): la rab dmigs te// mnyam par bzhag nas mtshan brjod ni// rim bzhin klog pa'i rnal 'byed pas// rang gi de nyid yi ge las// rim bzhin spro zhing bsdu ba yis// rang rang gdan 
61a4(rgyud 'grel): la dgod par bya// 'dod pa chen po bde ba che// zhes pa dang por brtsams nas ni// sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can// de yi mthar thug sems dpa' ni// bcu drug 'khor lo rab tu dgod 
61a5(rgyud 'grel): yi ge a las bskyed pa dang // sems can don byas slar 'dus te// rang gi gdan la dgod par bya// sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste// zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas// smon 
61a6(rgyud 'grel): lam ye shes rgya mtsho'i bar// phyi nang lha mo bskyed par bya// byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med// de bzhin thog chen chu la gnas par// yi ge a las bskyed pa yi// skal bzang byer mo 
61a7(rgyud 'grel): rim bzhin du// 'khor lo gsum la dgod par bya// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ni// ji srid sgom pa'i mthar thug pa// tshig bcad bcu bzhi dag gis ni// mtshan gyi don rnams bstan pa
61a8(rgyud 'grel): yin// 'od zer 'phro zhing bsdus pa dang // gzugs su gyur nas lhar gnas pa// pho brang snying po'i dkyil 'khor ro// rim gnyis chos dbyings ye shes kyi// dkyil 'khor dgod pa/ 
61b1(rgyud 'grel): bstan par bya// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che// zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che// mthar thugs oM gyis rnam par spro// gti mug spyod pa/ 
61b2(rgyud 'grel): dag byas te// slar 'dum rim pa gnyis pa las// rnam par snang mdzad tshul gyis ni// mtshan gyi don rnam grangs bzhin du// phyogs bzhi dag nas bzhugs pa yin// tshig bcad nyi 
61b3(rgyud 'grel): shu rtsa lnga ru// tshig rkang gcig gis ma tshang ba// 'di yi don la dmigs shing dgod// de nas rim pa gsum pa ru// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// tshul nas rab tu bstod pa ni// rdo rje/ 
61b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// ces pa dang por brtsams nas ni// sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog/ ces pa yi ge mthar thug par// hUM gi rnam par spro zhing bsdu// mi bskyod pa yi 
61b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dgod// tshig rkang gcig gis lhag pa yi// tshigs bcad bcu yis phyogs bzhi ru// gsang sngags bdun cu rtsa gcig spos// zhe sdang btul nas rnam par gnas// de nas 
61b6(rgyud 'grel): rim pa bzhi pa ni// yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid// ces pa dang por brtsams byas nas// ye shes me lce 'od 'bar ba gsal// de mthar thug pa spro bsdu ste// snang ba mtha' yas// 
61b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa yis// phyogs bzhi dag tu rnam par gnas// so sor kun rtog ye shes ni// hrIHyi rnam par spospro bsdu ste// 'dod chags rnam par dag byas la// tshig bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 
61b8(rgyud 'grel): kyis// mtshan don gzhung las byung ba bzhin// phyogs bzhi rnam par dgod pa'o// de nas rim pa lnga pa yi// dkyil 'khor ba dag gis bshad par bya// 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste// 
62a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas// nor bu chen po rin chen rtog/ de mthar thug pa mnyam nyid kyi// ye shes tshigs bcad nyi shu gnyis// 'od zer 'phros shing 'dus pa 
62a2(rgyud 'grel): yis// ser sna can ni rnam bcom zhing // mtshan gyi don ni grangs bzhin du// rin chen 'byung ldan tshul du gnas// dr-i gi rnam par 'phro zhing 'dra// de nas rim pa drug pa'o// dran grub 
62a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dgod pa yang // tshigs bcad bco lnga'i mtshan don ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi rtogs bya ba// zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas// 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog/ 
62a4(rgyud 'grel): de yi mthar thug mtshan rnams ni// a yi rnam par spro zhing bsdu// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi// 'gro ba phrag dog rnam sbyangs te// don grub rnam par rim bzhin dgod// de lta bu mi 
62a5(rgyud 'grel): tshul nyid kyis// 'od zer spo zhing bsdus nas su// khams gsum sems can thams cad ni// gang gi 'od zer reg gyur pa// de yi sangs rgyas rnams su 'gyur// sangs rgyas 
62a6(rgyud 'grel): kun la reg 'gyur zhing // bsdu zhing bdag dang mnyam par sbyar// dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyang // mdog dang gdan dang phyag rgya rnams// de bzhin dang po'i sangs rgyas kyang // 
62a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo la sogs rim pa yang // ji ltar grags pa bzhin du dgod// de nas dzaHhUM baM hoHyis// ye shes 'khor lo rnams bkug cing // bdag dang mnyam par sbyar byas nas// rang 
62a8(rgyud 'grel): bzhin mchod pa'i sprin tshegs bstim// bsdus pa'i sgo nas bstod pa yang // mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud// ces pa dang por brtsams byas nas// ye shes sku nyid khyod/ 
62b1(rgyud 'grel): la 'dud// ces pa'i tshig bcad bzhi bzhi yis// dkyil 'khor lnga la bsdus te bstod// de nas mtshan gyi yon tan ni// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // zhes pa dang por brtsams byas 
62b2(rgyud 'grel): nas// chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhes pa// yon tan sgo nas bstod pa yin// lag na rdorjerdo rje 'chang // zhes pa lnga yis rnams phye la// dkyil 'khor lnga yi yon tan ni// rim pa/ 
62b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du mkhas pas dbye// de yi tshigs bcas mtshan rnams ni// dkyil 'khor lnga yi yon tan grags// oM sarba d+harma zhes pa nas/ dz+nyA na gar+b+ha a yi bar// skra yi phreng ba'i 
62b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi ni// de la brtan zhing rab gnas par// sngags kyi sgonas bskod pa yin// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang// zhes pa dang pong brtsams byas nas// rdzogs pa'i sangs 
62b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyis bshad// de yi mthar bsdus pa yis// sgo nas yang dag ston pa yin// // de ltar gang zhig sgom byed cing // ngag gi 'khor lo rnam 'phros te// rnam gsum don la 
62b6(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa yis// ring por mi thogs 'dul dbang gis// yon tan gzhur sogs thams cad kyang // ma lus de yis thob par 'gyur// sa mchog bcu gnyis rab bgrod nas/ 
62b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang 'dra bar 'gyur// thun bzhi'am ni thun gsum gyi// mtshan ma brtan po byung gi bar// de ni rgyun tu klag par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor dbang bskur dang // zhi sogs
62b8(rgyud 'grel): las rnams brtsam par bya// gzhan yang shi la phan pa dang // tshe ga'i bye brag ma lus kun// cho ga chen por mthong bar bya// dkyil 'khor bsdu ba'i rim par yang // rim bzhin yi ge a 
63a1(rgyud 'grel): lasata// de nas thig la dmigs pa zar// zlangal tshul du spyon lam brtag/ dam pa'i gzhung lugs gsal momed kyi// bsdus la dga' ba'i dor byas nas/ 
63a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag 'dra brtsam par mi 'os te// khab len rdo yis lcags 'du bzhin// 'jam pa'i dbyangs la mos pa yin// rang dbang med par brtsom pa la// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis 
63a3(rgyud 'grel): bzod par mdzad// de las bdag gis dge ba gang thob des// 'gro ba rnams kyis don rtogs zhi gyur nas// bdag sogs 'jam dpal dbyangs dang 'dra gyur te// nam mkha'i 
63a4(rgyud 'grel): mtha' mnyam sems can grol bar shog/ 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa/ bla ma dam pa'i chog chen po'i gzhung rnams las/ blo zhen pa'i don du mos pa 
63a5(rgyud 'grel): tsam las 'jug pa 'di dag gi rim pa pra mo rdzogs so// / @#// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so// @#/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shI nA 
63a6(rgyud 'grel): mas gI zhin pa ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i grub thabs/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab ral gri mda'i gzhu 
63a7(rgyud 'grel): thogs// dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa// gdor lnga gtsug pud lnga dang ldan// gsang sngags rgyal po drag ldan 'dud// dang por bsngags pas// dbang thob cing dam tshig dang ldan 
63a8(rgyud 'grel): par byas te// yid dga' ba'i gnas su 'dug la// ze rangs ka kha'i sgo dge bar byas la// snyir khang bla ba'i steng du yi ge mu rnam par bsams la/ 'od zer gyis bla ma dang yang dag par 
63b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan drangs la/ phyag btsal ba dang / mchod pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul zhing / mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol te/ dge
63b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya'o// de nas byams pa dang snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o// de'i rjes la stong pa nyid bsgom te/ oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa Ata ma ko& 
63b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di'i don la dmigs pas/ chos thams cad sgyu ma skya bur bsgom mo// de nas yi ge hrIHlas pad+ma'i gdan dmar po bsam zhing / de'i steng du a las zla ba'i gdan 
63b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsams te/ dbus sA yi ge med mar skya 'od zer gyi tshogs 'bro zhing / 'du ba bsam par bya'o// de nyid thig ler gyur pa las/ ye shes sems dpa' sku mdog 
63b5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po sprin dkar dag pa lta bu rdo rje skyil byung can// phyag bzhi dang ldan pa g.yas g.yon gnyis na/ mdzes pa'i ral gri 'debs shing shes rab kyi po ti 'dzin pa'o// dri'i 'og ma 
63b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis na mda' gzhu rnams bsnams pa'o// gzhon nu'i rgyan can no// de ltar rnam par bsgoms te/ at+ma ko&haMzhes brjod la/ nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o// de'i rjes la snying kha'i 'od 
63b7(rgyud 'grel): zer gyis ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ yi ge las byung ba'i pad+ma dang / zla ba'i steng du bzhags te/ mchod pa'i tshogs kyis rnam par mchod la/ rang dang gnyis su med pa bsres par bya'o// 
63b8(rgyud 'grel): snying ka dang mgrin pa dang dpral ba dang spyi bo rnams su// rdo rje dang pad ma dang rin po che dang sna tshogs rdo rjes rgyas btab ste/ thugs kha'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' khyab pas/ de bzhin 
64a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa bskul bas lha mo'i tshogs kyis bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis dbang bskur te/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs dang bcas pas dbang bskur ro// de'i thugs/ 
64a2(rgyud 'grel): khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du hrIHyongs su gyur pa las dang po'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dkar po zhal lnga phyag brgyad pa/ zhabs gnyis skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ byis pa'i rgyan thams cad
64a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs pa'i na bza' can// g.yas bzhin mdzes pa'i ral gri/ g.yon bzhin shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i glegs bam/ de'i thugs khar shes rab kyi 'khor 
64a4(rgyud 'grel): lo rnam par bsnams te/ lce drug pa kha dog drug dang ldan pa/ mU khyud bzhi yis bskor ba// lte bar yi ge a dkar po bsams te/ de las 'od 'phros pas/ phyogs bcu'i sems can 
64a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi khams thams cad khyab par byas te/ slar 'dus te de nyid la thim pas/ rtsa ba'i sngags dgod par bya'o// oM sarba d+harmA b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha badz+ra a A i aHde'i phyi rol mu khyud la dbyangs kyi yi 
64a6(rgyud 'grel): ge bcu gnyis dgod do// de'i phyi rol 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa ste/ dang po'i rtsibs la oM badz+ra ti k+ShA ya te na maHgnyis pa la oM duHkhats+tsha da ya ti na ma/ gsum pa la oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mur+ha ye ya te 
64a7(rgyud 'grel): na ma/ bzhi pa la au dz+nyA na kA ya ya te na ma/ lnga pa la au wa gI shwa ri ya te na ma/ drug pa la au a ra pa tsa na ya te na ma/ phyi'i mu khyud dang po la ye shes sems da pa'i phreng sngags/ sarba ta thA ga ta 
64a8(rgyud 'grel): hri da ya zhes bya ba nas/ dz+nyA na gar+b+ha a zhes bya ba'i bar du dgod do// phyi'i mu khyud tha ma la yi ge ka nas ha'i bar gsal byed kyi yi ge dgod do// de ltar snying gar bsam zhing / de las 'khor lo de'i 
64b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus su a las bskyed pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' zhal drug pa ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar zhing / in+d+ra nI la'i gtsug phud can// nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od 'dra 
64b2(rgyud 'grel): bas bskor zhing / zhi ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa/ phyag gnyis kyi ut+pal dmar po dang sngon po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i glegs bam gyis mdzes pa g.yas dang g.yon na rim pa bzhin
64b3(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyi sa brgyan cing / skyil mo krung gi bzhugs par bsam mo/ de'i thugs khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i dbus su yi ge a bkod de/ de las 'od zer 'phros shing 
64b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i sngags kyi kha dog ji lta ba bzhin 'od zer 'phros te/ rang dang 'jig rten gyi khams kun khyab par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gsal bar 'gyur zhing / sems can gyi 
64b5(rgyud 'grel): khams thams cad snang bar byas te/ 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar bsdus nas/ bdag nyid la lan gsum bskor te/ snying ga'i sngags dang zla ba dang bcas pa gcig tu 'dres 
64b6(rgyud 'grel): par gyur nas/ shes rab dang ye shes kyi me 'bar ba'i tshul gyis/ bdag med pa brtan por bsgom mo// de lta bu'i tshul gyis gsang sngags kyi bzlas pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzhan
64b7(rgyud 'grel): yang sngags bzlas pa dang / mtshan yang dag par brjod pa klags pa yang rim pa des yang dang du bya'o// thun mtshams su ni ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol zhing ji ltar bskyed pa'i
64b8(rgyud 'grel): rim pa bdag nyid la bsdu bar bya'o// bdag nyid kyang mi dmigs pa la lha'i rnal 'byor du langs te/ spyod lam thams cad kyang bden pa gnyis kyi tshul gyis dkyil 'khor dang gtor 
65a1(rgyud 'grel): ma dang // sbyin sreg dang / mchod pa dang / mdo gdon pa la sogs pa mchod rten gyi las dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / lus ngag gi spyod pa thams 
65a2(rgyud 'grel): cad lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ sgyu ma'i tshul gyis sbyar bar bya'o// zas la sogs pa ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i bdud rtsi chen por sngags kyis btab la tshim par bya'o// byi'i 
65a3(rgyud 'grel): khrus don du gnyer ba'i tshe yang dbang bskur ba'i cho ga rang bzhin rnam par dag pas bkru'o// nyal ba'i tshe chos kyi dbyings la snyoms par zhugs pas nyal lo// ljang na gzugs kyi sku'i rim 
65a4(rgyud 'grel): bas sa// tshul 'di lta bur gang zhig skum pa byed pa de ni/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis de nyid ring por mi thogs par nam mkha'i dkyil na bzhugs pa mthong ngo // ye shes sems dpa' sprul pa sku'i 
65a5(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs 'di/ rgyud dang sgeg pa'i rdo rje byang chub mchog ldan dang // 'jam dpal grags pa tha ma'i man ngag rim pa 'dri// gsang ba'i mtshan ldan rdo rje las grub kyis// dam pa nyer bstan
65a6(rgyud 'grel): dan tri badz+ra las// byang chub sgyu 'phrul sbyor ba'i man ngag 'di// rnyed nas 'di la gus phyir bdag gis bris// 'di yis 'gro kun ye shes sems dpar shog/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal 
65a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// // 'bags pa 'ang ma dpa' byed kyi gyi tshig 'di bzhinang kyizhes bya barba pa dang na cub bang zags pas pad dpa bzugasas/ 
65a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyag skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu maN+Dal pra to tsanAm Nan ma/ bdag du/ 'phags pa'ajam dpam gyi dkyil 'khar gyi cha ga yid bzhin na bu zhes bya ba/ dpal 
65b1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can// khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag/ sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang // ye shes sku nyid la bdud nas/ 
65b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dbyangs kyis khyab dkyil 'khor ni// bsdus dang dbye ba'i bye bragags// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya// dang par shig rnal 'byor pas// 'gro 
65b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i'adon pa'i bsam pa yis// yid dga' ba yis phyogs su// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// sgyu ma'i lus kyi snying ga ru// rang gi sa bon bsams nas su// 'od 'phros pa yi sbyor ba dang // 
65b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khar sprul pa'i phyag rgya yis// rang gi 'khor la sprul par bya// phyag lnga bya ba'i sbyar ba dang // mchad pa rnam pa yi mtshad// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las gsungs ltar// gsum pa skabs 
65b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro la sogs bya// de rjes bstod pas mnyes bya ba// thun mong dang ni de ma yin// thun mong rnam pa gnyis yin te// dang po mdo nyid ji bzhin pa// 'chad pa'i 'dud pa nyi shu'o// thun 
65b6(rgyud 'grel): mod min par rang gi'o// nyi shu pa yi rnam pa yang // mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang // sangs rgyas sku'i lnga'i bdag nyid can// khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag/ mchog sbyin rdorje 
65b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog khyod 'dud// yang dag nyid de de bzhin nyid// stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste// zab cing rgya che'i sgra sgeg pa// yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud// stong pa nyid dga' 'dod/ 
65b8(rgyud 'grel): chags blo// srid pa'i 'dod chags la sogs spangs// srid pa'i dga' bo chen po pa// stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// gsang sngags las byung yi 
66a1(rgyud 'grel): ge med// gsang sngags don kun bskyed pa po// sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud// sems can kun la shas cher chags// nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med// sems 
66a2(rgyud 'grel): can kun gyi yid la 'jug/ sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud// 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste// ngan song thams cad rnam sbyor ba// mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas 
66a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// ha ha hi hi 'jigs par sgrogs// rdo rje gad mo cher sgrogs pa// gad mo chen po gad rgyangs can// sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud// gom pa'i stabs kyis 
66a4(rgyud 'grel): gar byed pa// dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la// nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa// sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud// tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste// brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog/ 
66a5(rgyud 'grel): tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed// sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud// tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che// smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal// smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas// sangs 
66a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bzhad pa khyod la 'dud// tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' yas// tshig bden pa dang bden par smra// bden pa bzhi po ston pa po// sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud// sangs
66a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi thug rig pa// sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// mya ngan 'das shing mya ngan 'das// 
66a8(rgyud 'grel): legs par mya ngan 'das dang nye// bde sdug sel ba thar gyur pa// med pa las byung khyod la 'dud// theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas rnam 
66b1(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad che// sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud// nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba// shes rab ye shes me'o che// 'od chen rnam
66b2(rgyud 'grel): par snang bar byed// nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud// dang po sangs rgyas rgyu med pa// ye shes mig gcig dri ma med// ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs// ye shes las byung 
66b3(rgyud 'grel): khyod la 'dud// sgyu 'phrul chen po don grub pa// sku 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga'// sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can// sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud// gom pa'i stabs kyis gar 
66b4(rgyud 'grel): byed pa// dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la// nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa// sangs rgyas rol ston khyed la 'dud// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 
66b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin// skye med chos de sna tshogs ston// thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud// ye shes snang ba lam med pa// 'gro ba'i mar mo ye shes sgron// gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba/ 
66b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud// sngags pa rdo rje dril 'chang ba// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis bstod// rab tu mos pas gus byed na// 'jam dpal rdo rje ngo bor 'gyur// ji ltar dus
66b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la// tshul khrims 
66b8(rgyud 'grel): kye ni brlab pa dang // dag pa'i chas ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byang tshul khrims gsum// bdag gis brtan por gzung bar gyi// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med/ 
67a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dag nam chag gsum// deng nas bsams te gzung bar bgyi// nam du yang nam spang // dzardza rigs mchag chen pa la// darda dril bu'i phyag r+b+ha yang // yang dag nyid du 
67a2(rgyud 'grel): gzung ba bgyi// srab dpan dag kyang gzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog chen pa la// dmachog yir du'i rabal// nyen ra je bzhin dus drug du// sbyin pa rnam pazhi rtag tu sbyin// byang chub 
67a3(rgyud 'grel): chen po las byung ba'o// pad+ma rigs mchog dag pa la// phyi dang gsar ba'i theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi// las kyi rigs mchog chen pa la// sdom pa thams cad ldan 
67a4(rgyud 'grel): par ni// yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las rnams ci nus bgyi// byang chub sems ni bla na med// dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// 
67a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi sdom pa ma lus gzung // ma rgal ba rnams sbal bar bgyi// ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs phyung zhing // sems can mya ngan 'das la 'god// de ltar 
67a6(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa 'dzin byed na// bdag nyid snod du rung bar 'gyur// de nas sa bon 'od kyis ni// dkyil 'khor rang gi sa bon gzhug/ de las ye shes me 'bar bas// rnam smin phung po bsreg 
67a7(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// skad cig gis ni sgyu 'drar 'gyur// de nas snying rje bskyed pa ni// sdug bsngal chos dang mi dmigs pas// byang chub rnam pa lnga sgom ste// gzugs brnyan gi ni ye shes la// 
67a8(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal rnams ni sdang ba ni// de las 'dan pa'i bsam pa ni// sdug bsngal la dmigs snying rje'o// bdag stong sems can chos rnams kun// stong pa nyid du rab sbyor bas// kun gyi 
67b1(rgyud 'grel): stong pa las 'jug pa// chos dmigs snying rje mnyam nyid do// de yang ma smras pa'i phyir stong par shes pa ni// so sor rtog pa shes pa las// sems can thams cad dgod bsam pa// dmigs 
67b2(rgyud 'grel): med shes rab so sor rtog/ sems can don ni rtog med pa// nam mkha' la ni 'ja' tshon bzhin// gang dang gang 'dod snang byed la// dmigs med snying rje bya grub pa'o// bdag dang gzhan sogs
67b3(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa rnams// slar zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing // gang la chags dang rnam gral ba'i// chos dbyings ye shes rnam par sgoms// de dag ni tshogs gnyis kyis yongs su ting nge 'dzin to// 
67b4(rgyud 'grel): nas nam mkha' stong pa la// hUM byung 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par hUM ni 'jigs pa bsgom byas te// 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pa las// hUM bcu 'khor
67b5(rgyud 'grel): lo'i rtsibs steras su// khro ba bcu gcig skad cig rdzogs// hUM mdzad snod mdzes gtsug tor dang // gshin rje gshed dang gzhan mi thub// rta mgrin dang ni bdud rtsi 'khyil// 'dong rgyal
67b6(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yo mgon po dang // dbyug sngon can dang stobs po che// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs gnyis par// bskyed la de nyid rnam 'phrul pa'i// bgegs bcu dgug par bka' bsgo/ 
67b7(rgyud 'grel): bas// bkug ste zhabs 'og phur bus gdab// rdo rje gsang sngags brjod bya bas// skad cig gis ni bgegs med 'gyur// hUM mdzad thugs kha'i sa bon las// 'ad 'phros phyogs 
67b8(rgyud 'grel): mtshams steng 'og tu// 'phros pas dra ba gur dang ni// ra ba gnyis dang sa gzhi dang // rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsgom par bya// phyogs mtshams dkyil 'khor bcing ba yis// phyis kyang 'jug 
68a1(rgyud 'grel): par mi 'gyur ro// de nas zhi ba'i bsam pa yis// kun tu bzang por hUM mdzad gyur// de las chos kyi 'byung gnas sam// dbus su b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang // spyi dang 
68a2(rgyud 'grel): thun mong khyad par ni// rim pa bzhin du shes par bya// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs kyis ni rnam par brgyan// dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan// gra dang sga yi mtshams rnams 
68a3(rgyud 'grel): su// zla ba phyed la gnas pa yi// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab po// de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs nas// dkyil 'khor phyi ma dang mtshungs pas/ 
68a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid thams cad shes bya ste// ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa ru// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ni// kun gyi thun mong yin par 'dod// bsdus dang sa so'i mtshan nyid ni// phyi nas 'byu 
68a5(rgyud 'grel): ba las shes bya// dbus su saM gaM taM tr-i hr-i aM las// hUM gnyis ldan pas byung ba'i gdan// mir las mtshon te shes par bya// a las zla ba'i steng du bsam// de dag ni steng du bsam// 
68a6(rgyud 'grel): de dag ni steng gi ting nge 'dzin to// de nas sa bon las skyes pa// a las rnam par snang mdzad che// mdog dkar zhal bzhi phyag gnyis pa// mnyam gzhag pa'am byang chub mchog/ rnam 
68a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyan la sogs spangs pa ni// rtag pa'i sangs rgyas bsgom pa'o// thugs kar pad+ma gnas pa las// hrI las dang po sangs rgyas na// zhal lnga byis pa'i rgyan dang ldan// phyag brgyad g.yas 
68a8(rgyud 'grel): bzhis ral gri 'dzin// g.yan bzhis shes rab po ti 'dzin// dang po sangs rgyas thun mong pa'o// sangs rgyas de'i thugs la ru// a les gyur pa'i 'khor la ni// rtsibs drag pa la 
68b1(rgyud 'grel): mu khyud bzhi// lte bar a las 'od 'phros pas// don byas 'dus pa'i sngags su gyur// lte bar a ste mu khyud gnyis// nar ma'i mu khyud la bgod pa// oM sarba d+har+m+ma b+ha wa bi shud+d+ha badz+ra 
68b2(rgyud 'grel): a A aM aHphyi rol tu ni dgod pa ni// rtsibs bcas sam rtsibs med par// dbyangs yig bcu gnyis dgod par bya// de yi phyi rim rtsibs drug la// gsang sngags rgyal po drug 
68b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa// dang po'i rtsibs la dgod par bya// oM badz+ra tikrA ya te na ma/ gnyis pa'i rtsibs la bgod bya ba// oM duHkhats+tshe da ya te na ma// gsum pa'i rtsibs la bgod bya ba// oM prad+d+haH 
68b4(rgyud 'grel): na murta ye ya te na ma/ bzhi pa la ni bsam bya ba// oM dz+nyA na kA ya ya te na ma/ lnga pa la ni bsam bya ba// oM wA gI shwa rA ya ya te nA ma// drug pa la ni bsam bya ba// a ra pa tsa ya te na mi/ 
68b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi pa la// ye shes sems dpa'i sku yi sngags// a A sarba ta thA ga ta tri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM d+hIHb+ha ga wan/ dz+nyA na murti wA gI shwa ra/ ma hA pa tsA sarba 
68b6(rgyud 'grel): d+harmA/ ga gnA~M/ a mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha a/ 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi pa la// ka sogs kA la thug par bgod// shes rab 'khor lo'i ting 'dzin to// de'i lte ba'i a 
68b7(rgyud 'grel): las ni// gnyis su med pa'i 'jam dpal dbyangs// zhal drug pa la phyag drug pa// 'khor lo'i rtsibs dang yi ge'i zhal// dkar dmar sngo dang dkar ldang dkar// phyis kyang so sor bya 
68b8(rgyud 'grel): ba yin// ut+pal snga dmar dang po gnyis// mda' dang gzhun gnyis pa gnyis// mnyam par bzhag pas gsum pa gnyis// sku ni dur ltar dkar ba'o// thugs kar zla bas 
69a1(rgyud 'grel): bon no// rnam snang chen po zhes bya ba// dang po sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// sgyu 'phrul drabs byang chub pa'o// so sor dbye ba'i sbyar ba yang // dbus su rang gi gdan 
69a2(rgyud 'grel): stengs su// hrIHhUM a a oM a las// pad+ma gar dang hAM byed dang // rnam snang rta mchog rdo rje nyid// rdo rje sems dpa'i go rims bzhin// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis te// ting 'dzin
69a3(rgyud 'grel): bdud 'dul byang chub mchog/ skyabs mdzad mchog sbyin 'gyeng bcas pas// 'on kyang khyad par yod pa'o// pad+ma rdo rje rdo rje dang // rdo rje sna tshogs rin chen dang // rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa ste// mdog 
69a4(rgyud 'grel): ni bsdus pa'i zhal gyis te// dang po sangs rgyas d+hi ka ra las// sngar gyi kun gyi thun mong gi/ 'jam dpal dag tu thams cad mchog/ de yi thugs khar shes rab kyi// 'khor lo sa bon
69a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams la bskyed// rtsibs brgyad yin te rnam snang gi/ rtsibs bcu par ni yin par 'dod// mu khyud bzhi sogs snga ma bzhin// yi ge gyur pas sngags rnams ni// rtsibs la dgod pa'i 
69a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags rnams ni// ye shes sems dpa'i ming can du// sdus pa'i sngags rnams phye ba'o// kha dog sngar bzhin shes par bya// shes rab 'khor lor bsgom par bya// lte ba rnams su sa bon
69a7(rgyud 'grel): gyis// spro bsdulas grub ye shes sems// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// dmar po la sogs kha dog drug/ rdo rje rnon po sdug bsngal gnod// shes rab ye shes ye shes sku// ngag 
69a8(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug dang pa tsa'i mtha'// ral gri kun gyi g.yas pa ste// rang mtshan g.yon na 'dzin pa'o// ye shes sems dpa' bsgoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// dngos gzhi dkyil 'khor rgyal 
69b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni// bsdus dang phye ba'i bye brag gis// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa// go rim bzhin du shes par bya// bsdus pa rnam pa gsum yin te// rnam snang gnyis dang rdo rje sems/ 
69b2(rgyud 'grel): de gsum gtso bo gang rung ngam// yang na rang bzhin gcig yin pas// gcig tu bsdus pas shes par bya// thugs bsdus pa la 'jam dpal dbyangs// so so'i la ni sngar bzhin 'dod// 
69b3(rgyud 'grel): de'i thugs la sa bon bsdams// spros pa rang rang dkyil 'khor 'byung // las byas 'dus nas dkyil 'khor du// 'og tu 'chad pa'i rim pas gnas// dbus dkar shar sngo lho ser zhing// 
69b4(rgyud 'grel): nub dmar byang gi ljang gu ru// kha dog la sogs shes// kun gyi dbus kyi mtshan ma ste// 'og kyang khro bo'i rdo rje dang // rin chen pad+ma sna tshogs mtshan// nyams dang de dang 'dra bar ram// 
69b5(rgyud 'grel): yang na 'grel par bshad pa bzhin// ming dang zhal mdog mtshan ma sogs// tha dad par ni shes par bya// gdul bya'i bsam pa'i dbang gi ste// sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin nor bu
69b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// ma sa dang rang sa rnams// rang sa thams cad thAs nas// 'dad chags nAn sags gdul byas nas// 'dus nas dkyil lakha lazhugs pa// dkyil la khang rgyal mtshas 
69b7(rgyud 'grel): yin par 'dod// rjes kyi las rgyal ting 'dzin ni// 'od zer spro bsdu 'gro ba sbyor// kun gyi phrin las mthun pas ni// khyad par dbye ba ma bshad do// sprul pa byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir// 
69b8(rgyud 'grel): rang gi gca ba'i gyur ba yis// lagang gnyis na rdo rdzab cing // sa gol gdog cing sngags brjod pas// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad ni// dza 
70a1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' la sogs bcas// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dus par 'gyur// sngar bzhin bstod pas bstod nas su// lcags kyu la sogs rnal 'byor gyis// dgug 
70a2(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pa byas nas// sgo bcad bsrung ba rdzogs pas 'grub// gtso bo dam tshig mchog bcings pa// snying khar hU~M las rdo rje bsam// dri shwA dzaHhUM ba tsaHshes// gtse ba'i sngags 
70a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis rjes 'gro ba'o// lce la pad+ma bsam bya ste// gtso bo snying po bkod byas pas// chos kyi phyag rgya gsung bsrub bo// gtso ba las kyi phyag rgya bcing // spyi bar rdo rje kun dngos bsam/ 
70a4(rgyud 'grel): las kyi phyag rgya phrin las 'grub// ye shes sems dpa'i snying kha ru// rang gi mtshan ma bsam byas nas// phyag rgya chen po bsam byas nas// phyag rgya chen po bcings pa ni// 'phrin 
70a5(rgyud 'grel): las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rigs kyi dbu rgyan bsams nas ni// mchod dang mnyam nyid la sogs bstod// de nas bzlas brjod bya ba ni// shes rab 'khor la'i sngags rnams las/ 
70a6(rgyud 'grel): 'du shA zlas pan // ya // / na smra 
70a7(rgyud 'grel): kun de bye ba la// dum bu drug tu gdon byas nas// phan yon drag tu rlung bzhin 'gyur// bsdus pa'i man ngag 'di yin te// rnam snang che dang rnam snang dang // rdo rje sems dpa' med 
70a8(rgyud 'grel): gnyis te// snying las mtshan rnams thon byas nas// sku yi grangs kyis 'jig rten du// chags can gti mug can don byas// 'dus te dbyangs nas gsal byed la// tham pas 'od 
70b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lor 'gyur// dbus kyi cha la gnas pa'o// shar sogs mi bskyod la sogs pa// rang rang mtshan gyi gnas skabs su// sngags don rigs kyi lhar 'phros te// zhe sdang can
70b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs dbang byas nas// 'dus de rang gi 'khor lo ru// sngags la 'dus te sngar bzhin no// so so rang rang mtshan gyis so// dang po'i ming gi sbyor bas so// phyi nas sngags ni nus tshad
70b3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas// gal te gtor bar 'a dod na yang // sngar bzhin mchod bzhin mchod bstod sngon 'gro bas// lhag chad nyes pa zhi ba dang // bzod pa gsol dang gsal ba dang // sngar bcings 
70b4(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig phyag rgya dgrol// oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang 'byon par mdzad par 
70b5(rgyud 'grel): rigs// sprul pa'i 'od zer der bsdus la// stong pa'i nga rgyal brtan bsgoms nas// srung ba dam pa yin par 'dod// spyod lam bzhi yi dus su yang // 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i nga rgyal 'chad// 
70b6(rgyud 'grel): yid la yang ni sbyar bar bya// snying po'i ting 'dzin sbyar ba'o// de ltar bsnyen pa byas nas ni// gang 'dod las ni rdzogs 'dod pas// dkyil 'khor la sogs las rnams bya// grong la
70b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i phyogs bdun ni// rnal 'byor pa yis spang bar bya// yon tan kun dang yongs ldan pa'i// byang shar mtshams ni yongs su bzung // sems la nus pa dang ldan na// gang du yid
70b8(rgyud 'grel): dang mthun par bya// mngon par 'dod pa'i sa phyogs su// drag dang zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis// sa ni sbyang ba 'grub par bya// gyo mo bsreg ma thal ba dang // rus pa phub ma la sogs grub// 
71a1(rgyud 'grel): bsal bas gnod pa med par 'gyur// dbus su sa ni brkos byas la// dag pa'i chu yis bkang byas la// me tog dkar po su bkar byas la// shar du gom pa brgya 
71a2(rgyud 'grel): byin nas// log ste dngos grub rtag par bya// de na sa maN+Dal sngon 'gro bas// bri ser las bung lha ro la// bslang ba gzhung dang mthun par bya// sa yi dbus su ting 'dzin gsum/ 
71a3(rgyud 'grel): snga ma bzhin du bsgom bya ste// 'on kyang khyad par dbye ba yod// rten gyi 'khor lo rdzogs byas la// dang dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod// bdag gi gson pa'i bras bu yod// lha dang 
71a4(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig mnyam 'gyur bar// gyur par bdag nyid sam nyi med// byang chub sems dang sems gcig pas// mi log par ni bdag gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su na/ 
71a5(rgyud 'grel): deng bdag skye ba the tshom med// dang bdag nyi ma dam pa ste// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas// deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no// spos snod lag tu thogs nas ni// ma lus 
71a6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs na bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol// bdag mi 'di zhes bgyi ba ni// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas// deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs/ 
71a7(rgyud 'grel): te// dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol// de nas ting 'dzin gsum pa 'i// snga ma bzhin du shes par bya// de nas gtso bo'i sbyor ldan pas// lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i// ngargyal 'dzin 
71a8(rgyud 'grel): pas sngar bzhin bstod// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che// sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang // sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor chen po bshad du gsol/ 
71b1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar bstod pa'i tshig gsan nas// phyogs rnams kun tu phyag byas nas// da ni rang nyid rdo rje can// 'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag rang gis// da ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che// stobs chen sangs
71b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun bdag nyid// bdag po rdo rje chen po'i bdag/ byin gyis brlab pa mi 'dor ro// mig dang rkang pa byin brlabs nas// dkyil 'khor steng du bdag byas la// dengs shig ces// 
71b3(rgyud 'grel): ni brjod byas la// g.yas brkyang la sogs 'dug stabs kyis// bgegs kyi tshogs ni gzhom par bya// de nas phur bu sa gdab pa yi// 'og gi bgegs ni zlog par 'gyur// de
71b4(rgyud 'grel): nas skyang nul byas nas ni// spos kyi dkyil 'khor bya ba ni// bdag po'i gnas su gru bzhi ste// lhag ma'i gnas su zlum po ru// rang rang gi ni snying po'am// sku yi gsang sngags zlos 
71b5(rgyud 'grel): pas so// de nas bum pa bya ba yang // rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa// rtsa ba nag por ri med// rang gi mtshan mas mtshan bcas pa'o// 'bras chags lcug mas kha brgyan nas// ras zung // 
71b6(rgyud 'grel): gis ni mgul ba bcings// 'bru sna rin chen sna lnga dang // snying po lnga dang ldan par bya// dri zhim chu yis rab bkang la// steng du mchod yon chu bzhag la// rang gi chos kyi sa bon las/ 
71b7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sa du rtags nas ni// bsdu dang bstod dang dgug pa dang // rgyas gdapal sogs sngar bzhin bya// de nas dam tshig phrag tu yis// gzung ste sku yi sngags bzlas la// mdza 
71b8(rgyud 'grel): yon phul la gnas su bzhag/ lag bzangs zhus pa'i rgyud gsungs pa'i// tsho gas gtor ma sbyin par bya// 'og nas 'byung ba'i cho ga yis// sbyin sreg gis ni mnyes par bya// 
72a1(rgyud 'grel): gson pa'i slob ma'ang lha gnas bya// 'khor bzhi rnams kyi nang nas ni// dkyil 'khor tsho gas rjes bzung bas// rang la bslab par shin tu ldan// theg pa che la rab 
72a2(rgyud 'grel): du mos// blo dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gzhug/ gzhan dag rjes su gzung mi bya// de nas slob mas phyag bya nye// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa ste// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol 
72a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid gsal du gsol// sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la gsal// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// 
72a4(rgyud 'grel): mgon bos bdag ni gzhug par mdzod// bu tshur theg pa chen po yi// tshul chen snod ni khyod yin te// gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog/ khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// rdzogs 
72a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs dang // de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang // da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'grol ba na phyir bzhugs pa rnams// de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi// 
72a6(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas// dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du// thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan med brnyes// skyob pa 'jam pa'i rdo rje yis// bdud sde shin nu mi bzad pa// dpung chen
72a7(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang de yis bcom// de phyir kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir// bu yi tho gros 'di gyis shig/ de nas slob mas brjod bya ba// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum 
72a8(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su mchi// sdig pa thams cadas ser bshags// bsod nams kun la rje li dang // byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed bgyi// sems can thams cad mgron dru gnyer/ 
72b1(rgyud 'grel): la phan rdzi sangs rgyas 'grub par shag/ sa ma yA a/ suraSh+Tas+thA sa ma yaH// badz+ra sarba a thA p+'ur/ b+ha kha la sogs par byin gyis brnyag// a shwanam sngags pa'i shing // mang na 
72b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis me tog bcas// byin nas kha dang so yang brud// rtse nas bcas te dor ba dang // thu ba gsum chu yang sbyin par bya// dpung pa g.yon par srung srud bcing // ku sha byin la rmi lam 
72b3(rgyud 'grel): brtag/ ngal nang par spros zhes bsgo// 'jig rten nani kun mkhyen rnams// u du la ra'i me tog bzhin// brgyal man ni ras 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyung mngon mi 'byung // gsang sngags kyi 
72b4(rgyud 'grel): ni tshul 'byung ba// dbas kyang ni dkon pa ste// gang gi mnyam med sems can den// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// gang dag spyod pa'i mchog 'di la ba// bla gros shin tu mi g.yo bas// 
72b5(rgyud 'grel): de dag kun ni 'khor ba'i rgyun// sdug bsngal kun 'brang bden pa bcas// bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyi// rnyed pa mnyam med de ring ba rnyed// gang gis sangs rgyas sras bcas pa'i// 
72b6(rgyud 'grel): bdug nyid chen po kun gyi sin// bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun// yongs su bzung nus skyob bzhin par// sad ni rab tu dor baHsa nas// theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i// lam mchog 
72b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni dpal dang ldan// khyed rnams 'di ni 'dong bas na// rang byung skal pa chen po la// 'jig rten thams cad bakhyen pa yi// de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa yin// zhes bstan

72b9(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ma sa mabs pa ma ma comamam mas pa sam mas pa ma ya ya mas mam sa ma pa nga bang ba ma ma mangs pa so mas ca nga sa sa sa pa mas sa som pa yang mas mams ma ma tha mamam ma par

73a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan dkyil 'khor thig gdab phyir// rdo rje'i thig ni bdag la gsol// btang ba bsdus te bkang ba ni// legs par bsgril te mchod cing bzlas// sgrub pa'i grogs kyis lag gtad la/ 
73a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor brtags te tshad gcal nas// phyi nas thig ni gdab par bya// nub nas shar du tshangs thig gdab// lho nas byang du 'ang de bzhin no// byang dang lho dang shar nub dang // rlung dang dbang 
73a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan phyogs bltas nas// dbang po chu dang nor gshin rje// zur thig gnyis dang gdab byas nas// ngos bzhi dkyil 'khor bzhin du 'gyur// so so'ang cha chen bcu drug du// so sor rnam 
73a5(rgyud 'grel): par phye bar bya// dbang po phyogs nas btsal bya ste// cha dang po'i mtha' gnyis nas// bzhi cha gnyis ni gdab par bya// gnyis pa mnyam po bzhi ru'o// gsum pa phyed kyi phyed ma gnyis 
73a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa dang po'i tshad dang mtshungs// cha ni bcu gsum dag tu 'gyur// gdugs dang 'khor lo pad+ma dang // rim pa bzhi dang nam mkha' brgyad// dgu dang bcu gcig bcu gsum pa// de gsum 
73a7(rgyud 'grel): lnga lngar bgo bar bya// yang phugs 'gram dang logs su 'gyur// de kun ring thung cha gnyis pa// bcu dang bcu gnyis gnyis pa ni// logs su gcig 'das gcig gis ni// bzhi cha 
73a8(rgyud 'grel): logs te de yang yin// cha phyed 'das ni byed kyi byed// nad ma sngar byas khyud du 'dod// de'i nang du cha chen lha rnams yang // cha phyed gnyis byas phyi ma la// mtha' gnyis nas ni bzhi cha 
73b1(rgyud 'grel): gdab// gdugs dang pad+ma khor la'o// gnyis pa'i nang ma bzhin du bya// skas la sogs pa lta bur 'gyur// de'i nang gi cha chen po// de yang gnyis su byas nas su// phyi ma gnyis bya 
73b2(rgyud 'grel): de yi nang // sngar byas yi thugs yin par 'dod// nang gi cha chen de yin// bzhin gnyis su byas pa las// mtha' gnyis dag tu byas pa yang // lnga char byas pas 'gram dang ni// 
73b3(rgyud 'grel): ngos sa thur te de kun yang // cha gnyis nas ni dang ba med// blad dang lags nang dag tshad// byams lpags pas nang gi tshang // phred cha gnyis kyis bani char 'gyur// phyogs gsum yang ni des shes bya// kun gyi thun mos 
73b4(rgyud 'grel): yin par 'dod// nang gi dkyil 'kho dang bya bar yang // bsdus pas gnyis te dbye ba drag/ mkhas pas sar shes byas te// bsdus pas 'dod pa brtsam par bya// sa chen rnam pa bzhin 
73b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i// dera'ang bzhi bzhir byas nas ni// tshangs pa'i thig las logasar ru// drug pa spyi'i ka bar 'gyur// bcu btsunas ni mchog rnams 'dod// chu phyed pas ni blam thig gis// 
73b6(rgyud 'grel): bskod tem byed snying bar ba'i// na byed par ni bskyed byas pas// nang gi mu khyung dag rnga'i glung // dbus dang byugs bzhi brgyad rnams ni// gnyis gnyis su ni byas pa yis// bcu 
73b7(rgyud 'grel): dag tu 'gyur ba yi// dkyil 'khor lnga po kun gyi ni// rta babs sga lasags pa yang // bye bzhin ted dang shes bya// kun gyi brang gnas lugs dang ni// rdo rje dbyings dang khams te rgyas 
73b8(rgyud 'grel): don grub gro 'dul las kyi rigs// de nyid 'dus brgyad kyi rtse// 'di du bya zhes mkhas pas 'dod// yang na thun mang min pa ste// 'khor la rtsibs brgyad lte bar bcas// ka ba brgya da / 
74a1(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs rten bcas// de phyi rim rtsibs bcu drug/ rtsibs rnams rten dang bcas par bri// zur brgyad dkyil 'khor rnams dang ni// lha'i snam bu'i phyogs bzhin du// 'khor/ 
74a2(rgyud 'grel): lo'i rtsibs dang rtsibs rten dang // lte bar bca' ba'i thig gdab bya// phyir yang rdo rje me 'od bskor// so sor phye ba'i dkyil 'khor yang // sngar bzhin rnam pa gnyis shes bya// thig gdab
74a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rim pa'o// de nas tshon gyi las bshad de// sngo ser dmar po ljang gu dang // dkar po rnam pa rim bzhin du// hUM traM hrIHa A las ni// mi bskyod ri dbang tshe dpag med// gdon 
74a4(rgyud 'grel): mi za dang rtag pa bskyed// mig gi ldan pa'i lcags kyu yis// rang bzhin gnas pa kun nas ni// 'dres pas ro gcig gyur bsams nas// bzlas pa bya ste dge brtsam// dang por rdo rje 
74a5(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon gyis// g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis// dbang ldan mtshams nas brtsams par dgye// phyi nas kun tu sleb mas so// shar phyogs su ni sngon po che// lho ni ser dang yang 
74a6(rgyud 'grel): dag ldan// nub ni pad+ma rA ga ste// byang du ljang gu yin par 'dod// dbus kyis yi cha gnyis ni// shel ltar dkar ba bla na med// sngon po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin// gnyis pa ser la dmigs pa

74b1(rgyud 'grel): dgod par bya// rdo rje dril bu yang dag 'khyud// yang na rnam snang chen po'o// lnga po kun gyi shar phyogs su// mi bskyod glang po la gnas shing // bdud 'dul rdo rje bsnams shing ba sngo//

75a1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs sogs ni// lA s+ye la sogs bshad pa bzhin// brgal bzang gzhan yang de bzhin no// sgo rnams kun gyi nang du yang // sgo srung bzhi yang lnga lnga ru// gtso ba 'khor

75a3(rgyud 'grel): te bri bar bya// de ltar phyag rgya chen po'am// yang na lag pa'i phyag rgyar bcas// yang na mtshan pa dgod pa 'am// yang na yi ge dgod pa'am// yang na gdan gyi mtshan ma'am// gal te 'byor 
75a4(rgyud 'grel): pa med na yang // phyag rgyas yongs su bsrubs te bsam// dkyil 'khor mdun du brtag pa'o// so sor phye la'ang de bzhin de// rang rang gi ni dkyil 'khor bzhin// de nas phyi dro'i thun du su//

76a1(rgyud 'grel): ces brjod du gzhug go/ de nas oM su ra ta s+t+waM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ho badz+ra sid+d+hi ya tha su khaM/ zhes pas sems ni bskyed par bya'o// de nas cha ge zhes bya ba 'di nyid ni// byang chub sems ni

76a4(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas par bzlog/ de nas 'og tu 'gro bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra da ka chu glud do// gal te gas na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi chu yis 'grub// de nas brtsams te bu khyod kyi// 'jam 
76a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs rgyal po nga yin gyi// brnyas mi bya zhing mnyam par bgyi// ye shes dag pa dpog pa dang // brtan pa'ar gzhug bzhin bya ba ste// phreng ba dor dang bcing ba dang // gdong g.yogs dgrol 
76a6(rgyud 'grel): gzengs bstod dang // lung bstan dbugs dbyu la sogs pa// cho ga mthong bas shes par bya// gson po'i las ni yongs rdzogs nas// gal te shil phan 'dogs na// ro'am rus pa gos 
76a7(rgyud 'grel): la ni// sku yi sngags kyi btab pa yi// chu mchog gis ni dkru dang gtor// de nas de la gnas pa yis// gnod pa'i bgegs rnams bsal ba ni// shin tu khros pa'i 'jam dpal du/ 
76b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid rab tu bsams nas ni// gshin rje gshed dam bdud rtsi yis// gsang sngags drag por rab bzlas pa'i// yungs kar rdo rjer bsams nas ni// de la lan gsum rab tu brab/ 
76b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas de yi bgegs bral la// snying kha'i 'dod pa'i rgyal po yis// bar do'i shos pa dgug par bya// a la sogs pa'i sa bon gyis// ye shes sems pa rab bskyed la// sems bskyed sdom
76b3(rgyud 'grel): bzung la sogs dang // dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug pa rnams// gson po'i tshul bzhin byas nas su// dbang bskur ba yang rim bzhin bya// rnam par dag pa de yi ni// lte ba snying kha lkog ma dang // 
76b4(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo rnams ni rim bzhin du// shes rab 'khor lo lhag bya ste// lte bar shes rab 'khor lo ni// mu khyud bzhi dang rtsibs bcu gnyis// mu khyud bzhi la sngags bzhin ni// sngar bzhin dgod par 
76b5(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya// rtsibs la'ang dbyangs yig bcu gnyis te// lte bar a yig bsam pa'o// snying kha mgrin pa spyi bo yang // de bzhin bsam pa byas nas ni// spro dang bsdu ba'i 'od kyis ni// 
76b6(rgyud 'grel): de'i lus kun khyab par bsam// de la sogs pa'i gzugs brten na// sbyin phrag tun dbul bar zla// de yang thabs dang dgang gzang thugs gangar rdzas// shing dang sgrub pa pa dang snad/ 
76b7(rgyud 'grel): gsang dgod dang me thang dang // bsang gtor dang ni me spar dang // ku sha dgram dang gnas pa dang // me bskyed pa dang spyan drang sogs// ba srung skud bcing dang mchod pa dang // zhabs bsil sgrub 
76b8(rgyud 'grel): dang dbang bskur dang // dam tshig sgo dang mchod yon dang // gsang gtor thor 'thung bsreg blugs dang // me bsad brtag dang dgang blugs dang // kun bsreg bsang dang lha dgod dang // bsdus 
77a1(rgyud 'grel): dang bstod dang dgug pa dang // sngon bzhin phyag rgyas dbang bskur dang // mchod dang mchod yon 'thor 'thung bsang // dgang thugs cig bshos las bskul dang // lha rnams 
77a2(rgyud 'grel): gzi byin bskyed pa dang // me lha dgang thugs mchod yon bcas// gsang gtor sogs dang gshegs gsol pa// cho ga ji ltar mthong ba yi// gang na las kyi cho ga med// de ni ci yi cho ga las//

77a4(rgyud 'grel): bzod pa gsol dang bsngo ba dang // phyag rgya dgrol ba'i rim pa bya// oM khyed kyi sems can don kun mdzad// rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // slar 
77a5(rgyud 'grel): yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol// oM badz+ra muH'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis khyab pa'i// bsdus dang rgyas pa'i cho ga na// thun mong thun mong min par sbyar// nongs na mkhas rnams bzod par

77b8(rgyud 'grel): b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha badz+ra tsakra a~M a aM aHzhes bya bas stong pa nyid du bsgom mo// de nas stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin las/ dang po a'i rang bzhin las// 'od 'phro sa hUM las rdo rje ni// khro zhal drug ldan/

81b5(rgyud 'grel): dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong pa dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de lho phyogs kyi sems dpas chos sku la bstod pa'o// med pa las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dung // 
81b6(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud// ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud// ces bya bas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang 
81b7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud// ces bya ba'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de byang phyogs kyi 
82a1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' chos skul bstod pa'o// a b+hA wa swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha badz+ra tsakra aM aHzhes bya bas bzlas pa bstan nas gtor ma gtang bar bya'o// de nas spyod lam gyis gnas par/ 
82a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// bdag gis bla ma'i gdams pa la brten nas/ rgud don dbang po rdo rje'i tshig don sbyar// mkha' 'gro'i rjes su 'brangs nas de brtsams pas// 'gro kun ye shes sems dpa' rtogs par
82a3(rgyud 'grel): sheg/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs/ u rgyan gyi slob dpon shrI a wa d+hU tI ba chen pos mdzad pa rdzogaso// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA 
82a4(rgyud 'grel): shrI mi tra dang / bdakyil tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bskur ba'o// 9/ ba dang kyid []ga zugs// / rgya ga skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shI maN+Da la bi d+hi kri ta/ ba/ 
82a5(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// khyab pa'i bdag po ye shes sku// de bzhin nyid bdag dri med pa'i// tshig la smra mkhas 
82a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa'i gsung khyab bdag sku lnga la bstod te// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi lam// su 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// dad ldan thos pa la brtson 
82a7(rgyud 'grel): dang // dbang thob snang ba sbyin po'i phyir// dben pa'i gnas kyi bar chad bsal// byams sems ldan pas bsnyen pa brtsam// slob mas thal mo sbyar byas nas// maN+Dal me tog bcas phul nas/ 
82a8(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni mi shes rang bzhin gyis// lam gyi dam pa bstan du gsol// gsol btab gnang sbyin ched du ni// rdzas rnams la sogs gnang ba sbyin// byams ldan bstan pa la 'jug bya// ga 
82b1(rgyud 'grel): bo la 'bum gzhan la waM// oM badz+ra tik+Sha duHkha ts+tshed/ prad+d+ha dz+nyA na murta ye/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ wA gi shwa ra/ a ra pa tsan NAM d+hi/ phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma btang // bsod nams bsags pas 
82b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg bya'o// sngon du bsnyen pa'i mtshan byung nas// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las brtsam bya// dang po sangs rgyas skur langs la// lha mnyes sa bslangs brtag dang // nag tshal spang ljongs nyams
82b3(rgyud 'grel): dga'i gnas// sngar byas rang yid dga' bar brtsam// dri zhim chus gtor me tog dgram// de ltar sa brtag de ru ni// mchod pa lnga yis lha mo mchod// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i 
82b4(rgyud 'grel): tshul dang khyad par gyis// sa dang pha rol byin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// skyeb pa shAkya seng+ga yis// bdud kyi sde rnams bcom pa ltar// de ltar bdag gis bdud kyi sde// pham par bya phyir 
82b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bri// lan gsum brjod pas sa la thim// de yi rtags ni shar la sogs// mtho dman rtags kyis brtag par bya// brko ba lto 'phye lto bar brko// dri yi chu yis spangs la bzhag/ 
82b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas lag mthil ltar mnyam bya// lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas// sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsam// logs dang steng yang de bzhin no// bdag ni dkyil 'khor lha mchod pas// lha rnams khyed
82b7(rgyud 'grel): ni dpang du gyur// bdag gzhan sgrib pa sbyar ba'i phyir// rin chen sna tshogs dkyil 'khor bri// de nas dbu rgyan stod g.yogs dang brgyan bgos nas rdo rje dril bu thogs nas// oM badz+ra d+hU pe AH 
82b8(rgyud 'grel): hUM// oM badz+ra puSh+paM AHhUM/ oM badz+re A la~M ka AHhUM/ oM badz+ra g+han+d+he AHhUM/ oM badz+ra nai we te AHhUM/ zhes mchod pa lngas mchod sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor la bstod pa// sgyu ma sprul pa bdag 
83a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis// 'ja' tshon lta bur so sor gsal// thabs dang shes rab sku mnga' ba'i// dkyil 'khor ldan pa phyag 'tshal bstod// khong nas 'byung ba shes rab thabs// shes rab 
83a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// nyon mongs dug rnams sel mdzad pa'i// thabs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// oM pradz+nyA maN+Da la pra b+he sha/ oM u pa maN+Da la pra b+he sha/ de nas phyogs bcu khro 
83a3(rgyud 'grel): bos bsrung // bka' bgo sdang stabs bya bar bshad// gur dang tha re la sogs pa// rak+Sha'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o// ba yi rnam pa lngas byugs te// de ni dri'i thig le dang // me tog tshom bu 
83a4(rgyud 'grel): dgram par bya// tshogs bsags stong nyid bsgoms nas ni// b+h+rUM las gzhal yas a sa lha bskyed// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa dgug gzhug bya// 'di ltar sangs rgyas skyed byed yum// khong nas 'byung 
83a5(rgyud 'grel): ba skye med bdag/ smra bsam brjod med spros bral yum// gsang ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// mchod pa chen po gti mug che// gti mug ma lus 'joms mdzad pa// ma rig sbubs 'byed 
83a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo 'dzin// rnam par snang mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod// mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che// zhe sdang ma lus 'joms mdzad cing // 'khregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 
83a7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal bstod// mchod pa chen po nga rgyal che// nga rgyal ma lus 'dus mdzad pa// yid bzhin nor bu chen por 'dzin// rin chen 'byung ldan phyag 'tshal bstod// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// 
83a8(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags ma lus 'joms mdzad pa// sprin dkar dag bzhin pad+ma bsdams// snang ba mtha' yas phyag 'tshal bstod// mchod pa chen po phrag dog che// phrag dag ma lus 'joms mdzad 
83b1(rgyud 'grel): pa// srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms// phyag 'tshal don yod grub la bstod// dang po sangs rgyas rgyu med cing // gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan// glegs bam ral gri phyag na bsnams// dang 
83b2(rgyud 'grel): po'i sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal bstod// shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs// nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo sel// dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba// shes rab 'khor lo phyag 'tshal 
83b3(rgyud 'grel): bstod// ye shes sems dpa' sems dpa' che// ye shes gnyis med gzugs 'chang ba// ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can// ye shes sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod// 'dod pa chen po 
83b4(rgyud 'grel): bde chen ldan// dga' ba don ldan mgu bar byed// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// shes rab sems dpa' bcu drug bstod// sbyin pa'i bdag nyid sgeg mo la// tshul khrims bdag nyid phreng 
83b5(rgyud 'grel): bam// bzod pa brtson 'grus glu gar ma// lha mo bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod// shes rab mar me bsam gtan dri// thabs ldan me tog smon lam ro// phyag 'tshal lha mo bzhi la bstod/ 
83b6(rgyud 'grel): sems can don la rab brtson pa'i// snying rje chen po blo mchog ldan// byams pa la sogs thabs kyi bdag/ thabs kyi sems dpa' bcu drug bstod// stobs lhan lcags kyu zhags pa ma// ye 
83b7(rgyud 'grel): shes lcags sgrog dril bu ma// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyi// sgo ma bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas sgrub pa'i las brtsams nas// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams kun// ma
83b8(rgyud 'grel): lus bdag la dgongs su gsol// sems can kun gyi dan sgrub phyir// sang ni dkyil 'khor bri bar 'tshal// thal sbyar bus gtsugs dril bu gsil// spos thogs de ltar gsol ba gad pa// 
84a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas sgrub pa byas nas ni// gsol ba btab pa sngon song nas// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mkha' la bdeg/ nyi zla bar du mkha' la bdeg/ de nas slob ma gzung bar bya// dga' chen khyod 
84a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag ston pa bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bston pa'i// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de ni stsal du gsol// byang chub sems ni bskyed pa 
84a3(rgyud 'grel): dang // dkon mchog gtso 'khor bcas pa dang // skyabs dang grong mchog 'jug par 'tshal// bu tshur lam chen 'dir zhugs pa'i// bu tshur theg chen rten yin te// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ 
84a4(rgyud 'grel): khyod la yang dag bshad par bya// lam 'di la ni brten nas ni// 'das dang ma byond lha rnams// byang chub shing gi gdan drung du// thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'bras bu thob// bdud sde dag kyang 'di yi bcom// 
84a5(rgyud 'grel): de bas 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir// bu yis lam 'di sgrub par bgyis// dkyil 'khor lnga dang dkon mchog gsum// dus ni rtag tu skyabs su mchi// dpa' bo dpa' mo slob dpon la// dus ni rtag tu skyabs/ 
84a6(rgyud 'grel): su mchi// bla med dkon mchog dkyil 'khor lha// thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag dus 'di nas gzung byas te// tshangs spyod dam tshig sdom pa gzung // phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams 
84a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'i// bla ma slob dpon yi dam lha// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dam chos rnams la bdag sdig bshags// bla ma yi dam sangs rgyas dang // dkyil 'khor chos dang dge 
84a8(rgyud 'grel): 'dun gyis// yon tan yongs su sgrog rnams la// de la bdag ni yi rang ngo // chos kyi 'khor lo bskur ba dang // bde gshegs mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs// phyogs bcu'i bla ma yi dam lha/ 
84b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gtso 'khor bcas pa dang // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// snying po byang chub mchis bar du// de ring nyid du skyabs su mchi// bdag ni ding dung gzung du gsol// sangs rgyas// / 
84b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' yis// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed ltar// de bzhin sems can phan don du// bdag gis byang chub sems bskyed do// sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol// sangs/ 
84b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// rnal 'byor sangs rgyas sdom pa bzung // rdo rje rin chen khyad par gyi// rdo rje dril bu'i sdom pa gzung // thabs dang shes rab 
84b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam pas ni// slob dpon nyid du sdom pa gzung // rin chen 'dzin pa chen po yi// yid du 'ong ba'i dam tshig la// nyen re bzhin du dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi sbyin par bya// pad+ma 'dzin pa chen po
84b5(rgyud 'grel): yis// thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa yis// dam po'i chos kyi sdom pa gzung // phrin las 'dzin pa chen po yi// tshul khrims sum ldan bya ba dang // rgya che gzhan 
84b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi don gyi phyir// bdag gis sdom pa gzung bar bya// de ltar sdom pa rab bzung nas// slob ma bsrung bar rab tu bya// 'bru gsum sngags kyis rab bsrungs nas// gnas gsum byin brlabs 
84b7(rgyud 'grel): rab brtan nas// mchod pas slob ma brtan phyir mchod// de nas maN+Dal ba go tsam// bshams nis so shing dor bya ni// ut+pal pad+ma dri zhim ni// sor ni bcu gnyis 'bus ma zos// dri dang 
84b8(rgyud 'grel): me tog shin tu bcings// shar bltas mi g.yo steng du dor// bcas zin nas ni mi g.yo der// steng ltas mchog thob phyogs su ni// so so'i phrin las mtshams su ni// dngos grub tha ma 
85a1(rgyud 'grel): 'og gi 'og/ de nas dri ma dag pa'i phyir// oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya bA gi shwa ra// ma hA pa tsa/ bi sho d+ha sarba pA paM rU pa tsit+ta ba gA pa ya na hUM/ bzlas pa'i chu yis lus ngag yid/ 
85a2(rgyud 'grel): so so dag phyir hub gsum btung // de nas rgyud ni sbyang ba'i phyir// dad dang mi lus thob pa dang // sangs rgyas 'byung ba shin du dkon// me toka u dum war bzhin// lam bzang rnyed pa de bas kyang // 
85a3(rgyud 'grel): shin tu sdig pa zad byed pa// dkyil 'khor dbang ni thob par dka'// dbang ldan nus pa thob dka'o// de nas oM aHhUM ma Ni bi shud+d+ha hUM/ sarba pA paM bi shud+d+ha hUM/ kun sha'i byin brlabs sngas su gzhug/ 
85a4(rgyud 'grel): ldang ba'i stabs kyi rmi lam gdab// oM ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ oM kA la rU pa hUM/ gnyis kyis srung ba'i skud pa bya// byin brlabs srog gnas nyid du gdags// de nas gtor ma btang byas nas// srab ma//

85a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de nas rin chen lnga las byas// bum pa kha dog dkar po ste// bad steng so so'i mtshan ma bgod// mgul mtshangs kha dog so sor bcings// 'bru dang rin chen lnga dang ni// snying po lnga dang spos lnga 
85a7(rgyud 'grel): blug/ 'bras bu can gyi kha rgyan shing // sbyangs nas de nas dgram par bya// lha grangs mthun pa'i bum pa dgram// bi shud+d+ha'i sngags kyis sbyang // b+h+rUM las rin chen bum pa bskyed// nang du so so'i lha 
85a8(rgyud 'grel): rnams bsam// dgug gzhug la sags rdzogs pa dang // mchod nas bstod cing 'dud kyi bstod// e A Sh+Ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta dzad pa/ ta bar/ a ng+ku hrI b+ha ka dz+haiM/ dAn sut-i bya bu byu/ 
85b1(rgyud 'grel): nAM/ wA gI shwa ra/ ma hA pa tsa/ sarba d+harmA/ gag na/ a ma la su pa su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na garba aH/ oM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na AHhUM/ oM duHkhats+tshe da AHhUM/ oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mur+Na ya AHhUM/ oM wA gi 
85b2(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM dz+nyA na kA ya AHhUM/ a ra pa tsa na AHhUM/ zhes pas ni rigs so so dang tha mas ni las thams cad pa byin gyis brlab bo// de ltar sgrub pa'i dus su maN+Dal byas la// me tog go rim so sor daH 
85b3(rgyud 'grel): mar me mchod pa so so'i grangs// zin nas ras kyi steng du bzhag/ de nas dkyil 'khor las byas te// dang por thig gi las bya'o// sar pa tshad dang mtshan nyid ldan// dri zhing chu dang snod du bzhag/ 
85b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid shar du 'dug nas ni// thig ni ye shes lnga ru bskyed// phyogs bcu'i ye shes lnga ru bstim// oM a ra pa tsa na ma ti kra ma hUM zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// de nas oM a tri zhes bya ba 
85b5(rgyud 'grel): sgril du'o// de nas slob mas blangs la dang po gdab pa'o// sa'i thig gdab slob dpon nub// slob ma shar 'dug tshangs thig gdab// slob ma lhor 'dug slob dpon byang // slob dpon sha

85b7(rgyud 'grel): brgyan de// nang gi phyed cha pho brang ste// tshom bu lnga ldan pada' dab bzhi// de ltar thig ni so sor gdab// ye shes skud pa mchod pa ni// ye shes gshegs la dam tshig bsdu// de nas rdul tshe// 
85b8(rgyud 'grel): ba ni// rin chen lnga'i phye ma'am// yang na 'bras kyi phye mas bri// kha dog so sor bkrem nas ni// oM hUM swa a ha gi rims su// ma dag bshig nas dag pa bskyed// ye shes lnga ni spyaH 
86a1(rgyud 'grel): / bstim// aM a ra pa tsa na sa mA ya swA/ zhes lam bdun bzlas nas ni// de nas tshon rtsi rim bzhin du// dbus nas brtsams te bri bar bya// sgo ni shar nas dbye bar bya'o// 
86a2(rgyud 'grel): dang pa 'tshan pa mchod pa ni// yid kyis mchod nas tshig 'di brjod// chos rnams rang bzhin nam dag pa// sems can yangs dag zhing 'dir bri// nyes pa'i dri ma kun bral phyir// rdul chen ye shes 
86a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga yis bris// dang po dbus su pad+ma ni// sna tshogs shin tu ze 'bru dkar// shar gyi sna tshogs ze 'bru mthing // lho'i sna tshogs ze 'bru ser// nub cu sna tshogs ze 'bru dmar// byang du sna tshogs ze 'bru 
86a4(rgyud 'grel): ldang // de yi gdung dang 'dra ba bskor// pad+ma nyi mas rab tu bskor// de ni nang gi pho brang ngo // gru chad ldang la sgo bzhi dang // rta babs ma sogs bcas pa'o// de yi phyi rol cha chen gcig/ rtsibs ban+de/ 
86a5(rgyud 'grel): drug pa'i 'khor lo'o// shar mthing lho ser nub dmar po// byang ljang gru chang ljang gu ste// sgo bzhi rta babs bzhi ldan pa'i// dkyil 'khor legs par rab dra bri// nam mkha' dang bsre thugs mtshan 
86a6(rgyud 'grel): dgod// dbus su sa bon a bris nas// phyogs bzhi gzhan gyi don bzhi no// dbus kyi pad+ma 'dab bzhi la// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma rgya gram dang // gtso bo phye nas mtshan ma so sor was// shar g+hi 
86a7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa la// rdo rje lcags kyu mda' gzhu se gol dgod// lho'i pad+ma dab ma bzhi pa la// rin chen nyi ma tog dang so phreng dgod// nub kyi pad+ma'adab ma bzhi po la// pad+ma 'khor lo ral bri 
86a8(rgyud 'grel): myi dag dang // byang gi pad+ma 'dabam bzhi pa la// rgya grim mche bag cha khu tshur dgo de// grub chad bzhi la nang ge lha mo ni// me long phreng ba'i wang phyag shing dgad// de ni nang gi mtshan me dgod pa'o// 
86b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas phyi'i mtshan ma dgod pa ni// shar du 'gu de ut+pal spos por rgyal mtshan no// lhor ni rin chen 'bar ba sbos por po ti'o// nub tu pad+ma lcags kyu ral gri dra ba'o// byang du zla ba lcags kyur la 
86b2(rgyud 'grel): gri rin chen bsgom// phyi'i lha mo'i dgod pa ni// me tog mar me dri dang bshos// lcags kyu zhags pa cags sgrog dril bu'o// ye shes gnyis med bsres la dgod// lha rnams phyogs skyong rnams 
86b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang dgod// de nas bla re ba ngan sogs// bum pa mchod rdzas la sogs dgram// de nas rol mos bum pa ni// spyan drang bskor byas dgram par bya// de nas bdag nyid shar bltas te// bde ba'i/ 
86b4(rgyud 'grel): stan la nyer 'dug nas// bgegs rnams yongs su bskrad nas ni// rten la mchod dang sdig bshags dang // byang chub tu bdag sems bskyed bya// stong nyid sngags kyis stong nyid bsgom// de nas/ 
86b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM las rdo rje bsgom// khro zhal drug ldan bum par ni// bruM las chos sku nam mkhar ldan// gru gsum nam mkhar bru bsams nas// gru bzhi sgo bzhi tshom bu bzhi// thabs dang shes rab dkyil 'khor bskyed// 
86b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas tshom bu lnga la ni// seng+ge glang chen rta dang ni// rma bya shang shang a las bskyed// pad+ma'i steng du rang sems a// de las rnam par snang mdzad ni// zhi ba mdog dkar zhal bzhi pa// phyag rgya byang chub 
86b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi sku'o// thugs khar dang po sangs rgyas so// shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi ste// de steng ye shes sems dpa'o// phyag rgya ral gri po ti ste// gzhan ni so so'i phyag mtshan no// mthang kha
86b8(rgyud 'grel): ser po dmar dang ldang // rdo rje rin chen pad+ma pa las// sa gnon mchog sbyin ting 'dzin skyabs byin te// de bzhin yum gyi mdog dang phyag mtshan so so'o// mthing kha ser po dmar po dang ljang gu ste/ 
87a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje lcags kyu mda' gzhu se gol ni// so so'i phyag mtshan legs par bsnams// sems dpa' rgyal po chags pa legs pa'o// gser mdog dmar dang ljang gu thon ka mdog 
87a2(rgyud 'grel): rin chen nyi ma gtog dang sor phreng bsdams// rin chen nyi ma tog dang bzhad pa'i dpal// so so'i rgyan ldan su ni mdzes pa'o// dmar dang ldang khu mthing ka gser bsregs mdog/ ma chags sems 
87a3(rgyud 'grel): gcod sems rgyud gsal bar smra// kha dog so so gsal zhing ma 'dris 'dzin// pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo lte bsdams so// ljang gu mthing kha gser ba sregs margad mdog/ las dang gnod sbyin go cha khu 
87a4(rgyud 'grel): tshur dang // rgya gram che ba go cha khu tshur te// bzhugs tshul zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs// sgeg dang rin chen phreng ba gru ma gar// dkar dang ser dang dmar dang ljang gu dang // me long phreng dang pi wang 
87a5(rgyud 'grel): chags shing bsnams// pad steng rgyan ldan sgeg pas bzhugs pa'o// byams pa 'jam dbyangs spos kyi glang po tog/ dmar po ljang ser mthing kha dgar ba ste// 'gu d+he ut+pal spos por rgyun mtshan 
87a6(rgyud 'grel): dang // so so'i phyag mtshan ma 'dris bsnams pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho blo gros mi bzad bzang skyong spobs pa brtsegs// ser dang gser bsregs in+d+ra nI la thon ka tshon pa'i mchog/ rin chen rin 
87a7(rgyud 'grel): chan 'bar ba spos por po ti bsnams// sems dpa'i skyil krung zla ba'i steng na ba nugs shing mdzes// mthu chen thob dang ngan song 'dren dang mya ngan dra ba can gyi 'di// dmar dang pad+ma dag dung mdog shin tu 
87a8(rgyud 'grel): dkar dang ut+pal mdog/ pad+ma lcags kyu ral gri dra ba rnams// shin tu mdzes pa'i rgyan 'dzin sku dang ldan// zla 'od gzhon nu thugs rje'i stobs dang nam mkha'i snying po nam mkha' mdzad// zla ba rtsug / 
87b1(rgyud 'grel): klu dang ni ral gri 'bar ba rin chen sgrom ni g.yas g.yon 'dzin// dkar ser dkar dang ljang gum zing kha'i mdog/ sku mdog shin tu gsal bas ma 'dres gsal// bdug pa me tog dri dang ro// mthing // 
87b2(rgyud 'grel): kha dkar dang dmar po ldang // lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// mthing ka ser dmar ljang khu'o// de ltar dam tshig lha bskyed nas// thugs kha mtshan ma rab tu gsal// pra kri ta pa ri shud+d+ha sarba 
87b3(rgyud 'grel): d+harmA/ ya tu ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya/ many+dzu shrI pa ri shud+d+ha/ mu pa ta ye ta a/ yongs su dag pa'i ye shes so// zhang nas ma lus spyan drang ngo // dkyil 'khor rim bzhin ye shes rim bzhin du spyan drang 
87b4(rgyud 'grel): stistau tri ti dz+nyA na murti ni raH bud+d+ho bud+d+hA naM/ d+ha d+hi wa rti ni zhes pas sku bzhi la phyag bya'o// de nas dzaHhUM baM hoHbsti ma zhing byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ oM hUM hrI zhes pas so// da ni dbang bskur te gsol ba 
87b5(rgyud 'grel): gdab pa ni// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tra da ya/ ha ra ha ra sarba d+harmA/ ga ga na a mA lU su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmA d+hA tudz+nyA na gar+b+ha pa a/ de ni slob dpon 'jug pa'o// slob ma 'jug pa ni// ras kyis gdong ni bkab 
87b6(rgyud 'grel): nas su// las kyi rdo rjes lam bstan nas// shar sgor slob ma 'dug stangs ni// thal sbyor gus pa'i tshul gyis 'dug/ de nas gsol ba btab byas te// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// slob dpod 
87b7(rgyud 'grel): la ni skyabs su mchi// dkyil 'khor gtso 'khor bcas la yang // bdag ni rtag tu skyabs su mchi// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// zhes brjod la 
87b8(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal dbul// de nas slob dpon gyis gsol pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i grong mchog tu// bdag gis khyod ni gzhug par bya// snying po'i dkyil 'khor 
88a1(rgyud 'grel): bstan par bya// gong gis sngags kyi dkyil 'khor lha la phyag byed du gzhug/ de nas sdom pa'i cho ga sbyin pa ni// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gsum// gsum la skyabs su 
88a2(rgyud 'grel): mchi bar bgyi// 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs yid 'ong// sdom pa rtag tu bzung bar bya// thabs ni rdo rje shes rab dril// thabs dang shes rab sdom pa bzung // de ni rdo rje rigs kyi mchog/ sdom pa de ni 
88a3(rgyud 'grel): bzung bar bya// nyen re bzhi nam dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi// sdom pa rtag tu bzung ba'o// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos 
88a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang ma lus bzung // pad+ma'i rigs mchog chen po ste// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba gzung // sdom pa thams cad ldan pa dang // mchod sbyin las kyang ci nus bya// las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi// sdom

88b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di las 'byung // de phyir 'di la nan tan gyis// dkyil 'khor lha dang sngags sgrub byos zhes byas nas// rang gi 'gu ha na ma dang yi dam lha rnams gsal bar bstan// lha rnams phung po khams su 
88b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad// de nas dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad// grub bzhi tshad med bzhi dang ni// sgo bzhi dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi// rta babs yang dag spong ba bzhi// dra ba dra ba phyed pa ni// yang dag spong dag bzhi

89a1(rgyud 'grel): / spangs pas bskur// oM la gi shwa ra traM/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'o// ye shes lnga ldan log lta 'joms// stong nyid don stong rdo rje che// bu khyod thugs la gnas

89b1(rgyud 'grel): na mur+ha ye/ saM ge tI ni a~M/ oM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na gan+thi thi/ oM dz+nyA na kA ya dun+na ha/ oM duHkhats+tshe da tsha tre hUM/ oM wa gi shA ra rat+ne hUM/ oM a ra pa tsan dz+nyA ne ka tsak+Shu bi mA la hUM/ de ltar dbang rnams rdzogs

90a7(rgyud 'grel): gar+b+ba a/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha re ti ra/ ga ga na~M/ a mA la su ba ri shud+d+ha/ rat+na d+ha du wa gai shwa ra/ dz+nyA na gar+b+ha a/ a sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ta ra ta ra/ ga~M ga na/ oM mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ \u0f7f/ 
90a8(rgyud 'grel): tAtra/ badz+ra tik+Sh+Na/ dz+nyA na gar+b+ba a/ a sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ ga ga na/ a mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ karma tA dra/ dz+nyA na kA ya dz+nyA na gar+b+ha a/ a sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ ga~M gan/ 
90b1(rgyud 'grel): a mA la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+harma d+hA dra/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mAr+ha ye/ dz+nyA na gar+b+ha a/ bum pa lngas dbang bskur te/ oM hrI kA la ru pa hUM zhes bya bas bgegs bslad la phyag rgya ni lag pa mnyam par sbyar zhing
