107a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal sgrub pa'i thabs/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de dang de yi theg pa yis// thabs kyis 'gro ba'i don byed pa// theg pa gcig gi bdag nyid can// dpal
107a8(rgyud 'grel): ldan de la phyag 'tshal 'dud// shin tu dang ba'i ro gcig pa// mi g.yo dus kyi rtog bya ba// bdag nyid chen po gang yin pa// su zhig de la phyag 'tshal 'dud// dad pa'i khyad par ma rtogs 
107b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang // chags pa'i dbang gis sems can bzhin// 'dod chags la sogs la gnas kyang // gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum gyis bdag nyid can// dkon mchog
107b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi don byed mgon// kun tu don byed bltos med par// skyob pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// de'i stobs kyis da ltar bdag/ 'jam dpal gnyis su med pa yi// rnam pa nyi shus mngon 
107b3(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa// sems can don du bshad par bya// dang por langs nas rnal 'byor ni// rang gi lha'i nga rgyal can// rnam dag cho ga bzhin byas nas// mchod pa sman ma bsdu bar bya// oM badz+ra bi ga 
107b4(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ dri ma yang ni bsal bar bya// oM sa mAn+ta pa rik+Sha gu h+ya tsa ri tsa ra tsa ra hUM/ de'i rjes la skyar nul bya// oM narma ni sha d+ha trUM/ drir bcas chu'i thig pa yis// skyob pa la yang maN+Dal bya// oM ma hA 
107b5(rgyud 'grel): maN+Da la li hUM/ sngar nyid langs pa'i gnas dag tu// 'jam pa'i stan la gnas par bya// oM a mu ka pad mo b+ha sun+d+ha ra d+ha ra ne maN+Dal hUM/ snying kha'i sa bon 'od zer gyis// sangs rgyas mthong nas 'dud 
107b6(rgyud 'grel): k+Shak+Shak+Sha nu / da/ chags na / ga na yang // dus la da sa/ 
107b7(rgyud 'grel): mchod par bya// nyes pa byas pa'i mchod pa yis// sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya// bdag gis bgyis dang bgyid stsal gang // chung ngu 'am ni tshad med pa// gang yang rjes su yi rang ba// 
107b8(rgyud 'grel): de dag skyob pas bshags par mdzod// bdag gis 'jug par bya ba yis// de dag sems can rang nyid kyis// las la 'jug pa de dag gis// byas pa rnams la legs shes gsol// sangs// 
108a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnams la skyabs su gsol// de bzhin chos kyi dkon mchog la// sangs rgyas kyi gang gdul bya ba// blon chen mgon po de la yang // sdug bsngal rgyal bar dka' ba ni// 
108a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi bdag gis bzod mi nus// des na de nyid sel bar byed// bdag ni 'jig rten mgon por shog/ sems can bla ma sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' de ci bzhin// de 
108a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin slob ma rjes mthun ma// bdag gi lam la 'jug par bya// gang yang bdag gi dge ba'i cha// dri med gnas par gyur pa ni// de yis sems can gyi don du// rgyun tu rjes su mthun par 
108a4(rgyud 'grel): shog/ oM mahA sarba pA paM kA ya wa k+Shi trA sa man su d+hAd+b+ha ra ga d+hi sha mu ha da ma dam ne biSh+Ti na yaM klet+tAM tat+te ka le kaM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sarba pA baM s+pha Da ya me swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA nAM At+ma b+ha pa~M ni ra tA ya me/ 
108a5(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta pra ti gr-i ha na sA mi swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza nA saM b+ha rA nu mut+ta ye swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta b+ha dra ma hA badz+ra sa ma yaM ma hA bo d+hi tsid+hut+pa mut+pa da ya mi swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga te shaM sa/ 
108a6(rgyud 'grel): te sarba satwA nAM sarba sad+d+ha ya saM sad+d+han+te sarba ta thA ga ta shA te shan+taM/ oM sarba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA swa b+hA wa shu n+ya h+yaM/ sems can 'di dag bde bar shog/ sdug bsngal kun yang sel bar shog/ de dge bde bas/ 
108a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid tshem// 'di dag nyon mongs brel bar shog/ rang bzhin mod dang gtsang la sogs// mtshan ma med dang yid mi 'byung // 'di dag thams cad de yi phyir// bdag gis gang las rnam par
108a8(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul// oM shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa at+ma ko&haM/ de nas rgyal ba'i bka' lung gis// zla ba gnyis su mthong bar bya// de yang bstan nas gcig 'gyur zhing // de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa/ 
108b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam nyid du// blo gros chen po bzhug par bya// oM bo d+hi tsit+tadz+rod ya mi// oM dz+nyA nA rasmai be sre dza hUM/ oM tISh+Tha sta badz+ra hUM/ oM pa ran badz+ra/ sra ha ra na badz+ra/ oM dz+nyA na pa/ 
108b2(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badz+ra/ oM badz+rAt+ma ko&haM/ oM yata sarba ta thA ga ta ta tha a haM/ de nas gzhan don byed pa'i phyir// slar yang 'di ltar bsgom par bya// khro bo'i gzugs ni 'char ba yis// 
108b3(rgyud 'grel): snying khar pad ma nyi hU~M las// khro bo bcu yis bgegs kyi gtso// lus ngag yid gsum phur bus gdab// phyi rol rdo rje rab sogs// rnam par sprul pa byas nas ni// hUM yig gnyis kyis dbus gnas 
108b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// 'og tu yi bai raM dag las// rlung dang chu dang me dag ni// dkyil 'khor de nyid rim pas bsgom// nam mkha' la b+h+rUM yig las byung ba'i// rtag pa'i yan lag las skyes pa// bdud rtsi'i rgyun 
108b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis tshigs kyis ni// gang ba'i snod kyi bdag nyid gyur// hUM gnyis dbus su baM yig las// sku'i rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// brtan zhing sra bar gyur pa yi// gser gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur// 
108b6(rgyud 'grel): ngos gnyis rnam pa'i hUM yig dang // sum las skyes pa'i lhan pa'i steng // b+h+rUM las gyur pa dpal dang ldan// gzhal yas khang brtsegs bsgom par bya// de'i dbus su sna tshogs pa'i// chu skyes/ 
108b7(rgyud 'grel): steng du seng ge'i gdan// der ni dbyangs yig dang po las// kun 'di'i 'od ldan rnam snang mdzad// bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// zhal bzhi mnyam gzhag phyag rgya can// de'i mdun du 
108b8(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod pa// rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i// glang po'i steng du zla ba la// nam mkha'i mdog can bsam par bya// lho ru rdo rje nyi ma yang // rta'i steng du zla ba la// rin chen dril bu dang ldan pa// gser gyi 
109a1(rgyud 'grel): mdog ni rnam par bsam// nub tu pad ma gar dbang yang // rma bya'i steng gi zla ba la// pad ma'i dril bu dang bcas pa// pad mar ga'i mdog can bsam// byang gi phyogs 
109a2(rgyud 'grel): su rta mchog kyang // mkha' lding bsil 'od la gnas pa'i// sna tshogs rdo rje dril bu mdzes// sna tshogs pa yi mdog can bsgom// de dag gi yang thugs khar ni// dang po sangs rgyas bsgom// 
109a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ste// dpal ldan zhal lnga phyag brgyad pa// a dza na'i sku mdog 'chang // ngo mtshar drag po sgeg pa dang // rgod dang bcas pa'i zhal snga ba// g.yas g.yon ral gri po ti dag/ bdag nyid
109a4(rgyud 'grel): chen pos bzhi bzhi bsnams// 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs kyis ni// sems can rnams ni tshim par byed// re re'i thugs khar 'khor lo ni// rtsibs bcu gnyis la dbyangs yig ldan// 
109a5(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol ka li nang na yang // oM sarba d+harma'i sngags su bcas// thams cad la yang khyad med par// de steng shes rab 'khor lo ste// phyi rol a A sogs kyis mtshan// nang gi mu khyud a li ldan// 
109a6(rgyud 'grel): khyad par gtso bo'i 'khor lo ni// rtsibs drug gsang sngags drug dang ldan// gzhan dag gi yang rang rang mtshan// oM dang ya te na mar bcas// nam brtsibs gcig la spongs nas// lhag ma 
109a7(rgyud 'grel): yi ge'i grangs bzhin brtsigs// gnyis med 'jam dpal gtso bo ni// ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya// rang rigs phyag rgya can gnyis gnyis// ut+pal dang po ti 'chang // gzhan
109a8(rgyud 'grel): dag la yang khyad med par// ral gri g.yas pa la mtshan no// g.yon pas rdo rje rin chen dang // chu skyes sna tshogs rdor dril 'chang // de yang gnyis pa lnga pa dang // dang po bzhi pa ye shes sku/ 
109b1(rgyud 'grel): kun kyang gzhon nu'i rgyan dang ldan// kun da'i kha dog gzugs 'chang ba// rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po ste// rdo rje dang ni dril bu 'chang // rgyal po ser po lcags kyu 'chang // chags pa dmar po mda' gzhu 
109b2(rgyud 'grel): can// legs pa ljang gu legs sbyin pa// mi bskyod pa yi 'khor du gnas// rin chen dril 'chang rin chen ser// nyi ma nyi bzhin g.yas nyi 'dzin// ljang gu tog ni rgyal mtshan 'dzin// g.yon pa gdan// 
109b3(rgyud 'grel): la gnyi ka yang // bzhad pa dkar po so phreng 'dzin// snga ma bzhin du g.yon pa yis// rin chen 'byung ba'i 'khor du gnas// chos dmar pad+ma'i sdong bu 'dzin// rnon po ral gri po ti dkar// 'khor
109b4(rgyud 'grel): lo ser po 'khor lo 'dzin// smra ba ljang gu ljags 'dzin pa// gnyi ga g.yon pa gdan la brten// pad+ma gar gyi 'khor du gnas// las ni ljang gu rgya gram gyis// bsrung ba ser po go cha can// gnod 
109b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin nag po mche ba 'dzin// khu tshur ser po khu tshur 'dzin// don yod grub pa'i 'khor du gnas// de ltar 'khor lo chen po ni// bsams nas rims bzhin mchod par bya// mchod pa'i rim pa 
109b6(rgyud 'grel): / shes pa s+ho// seM sa dang nini ts+tsha / rgyas ba kun kya nas pa // sngags kun gyi byas pa'i sak+Shas// ya~M ga gsum pa shes bya thA// gzha 
109b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i 'khor dang bcas// rang rang gnas su bsangs nas ni// de yi nga rgyal dang ldan pas// ci rigs par ni spyad par bya// rnal 'byor ldan pa'i dus su yang // mtshan brjod dang ni bstod pa yis// 
109b8(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba 'khor bcas bstod nas ni// dus gsum du tshe don mtshan bya// rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa'i sgrub thabs// dpal ldan so ma shrIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma 
110a1(rgyud 'grel): \u0f7f/ dA dz+nyA na dang / lo ts+tsha ba gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur// // / 'phags pa 'ang ma dpa la grub ba pa thob dpon pom sdes mdzad pa bzhugs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ad+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma sa gI ti 
110a2(rgyud 'grel): sA d+ha nA ma// bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ nyes pa thams cad sel bar byed pa'i 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 
110a3(rgyud 'grel): gang phyir dpal dang de nyid kyi phyir byang chub dang // grol dang gang phyir don rtogs bsam pa ji lta bar// skye bo kun la rtag tu skyed par byed pa yi// dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs gang yin de la phyag 'tshal bstod// 
110a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pas bstod pa dang // rgyal sras rnams kyis bkur ba dang // lha rnams 'dud pa gang yin la// rtag par kun du bdag phyag 'tshal// mthong na sdig pa zhi bar byed pa dang // reg na bde ba 
110a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed byed skyon med dang // brten la srid pa'i 'khrul spong dge ba yi// bshes gnyen zhabs la lus ngag yid kyis 'dud// zab pa'i snying po yon tan rin chen gter gyi mdzod// gang zhig bla ma mchog 
110a6(rgyud 'grel): gis yun ring rgyas btab bzhag pa yi// mtshungs med sgrub thabs de 'dir bdag gis dbye bar bya// brtson 'grus mtha' med ston pa'i rgya mtsho yi// grangs med pa de yi grangs las 'das pa yi// 
110a7(rgyud 'grel): bskal par sgrub nas rgyal bas pha rol tu// phyin nas de 'dir rab tu bshad pa'ang yin// dngos grub bkra shis kun gyi khang chen 'di// 'jam dbyangs sgrub thabs 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi no// 
110a8(rgyud 'grel): gzugs mede chos kyang gzugs dang ldan pa nyid ston pa// gang 'khrul pa kun gyi sman chen gcig pu yin// 'di yis bskyed pa'i rin chen ni// tshogs gnyis gzi brjid ldan pa// dge ba 
110b1(rgyud 'grel): bshes gnyen mig gis ni// bltas pa'i skye med chos nyid do// byang chub sems dpas yun ring du// goms pa yid la 'dod pa yi// yal ga thabs shes bya ba 'di// 'bras bu bde ba ster ba 
110b2(rgyud 'grel): yin// thabs dang shes rab ldan par ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis gi gsungs pa// bla ma bsten pa'i rim pa yis// de 'dir dngos su myong ba yin// 'khrul pa yang dag spangs pas na// rnal 'byor/ 
110b3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab pha rol 'gro// 'di 'dra'i phyag rgya chen po yi// bdud rtsi ro mchog myong bar byed// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// 'di dag rnam par dpyad pa dang // 'di'i snying po cung zad kyang // bde bar
110b4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pas ma gzigs so// snying po las kyang snying po che// shin tu phul du byung ba ste// 'di ltar che 'os sna tshogs pa'i// bde ba ster bar bshad pa'ang yin// de 'dir las dang po dag ni// ji ltar 
110b5(rgyud 'grel): yang ni nyams gyur kyang // de las ngan song med bde ba// khams gsum rgyal po gtso bor gyur// rnam kun shin tu zab pa dang // rnam kun par dag pa ster// rnam kun bdud rtsi 'dzag pa dang // rnam pa 
110b6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi don chen byed// rnam kun mngon par byang chub dang // rnam pa kun gyi bla med pa'i// rnam pa kun mkhyen ye shes ni// lhan skyes shin tu 'od gsol ba// de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i bdag/ 
110b7(rgyud 'grel): da ni yang dag gsal bar bya// bshes gnyen dam pa bsten pa las// rjes gnang thob pa rang nyid ni// shes rab bdud rtsi'i rgyun dag gis// yid kyi dri ma 'khrud pa yin// chos rnams thams 
110b8(rgyud 'grel): cad stong pa'i phyir// bdag 'dzin shes rab ldan na yang // srog las lhag pa'i sems can rnams// mthong ba'i sgrub pa po dag yin// rang gi dam bcas rjes zhugs pa// dri med dang dad pa rgyan 
111a1(rgyud 'grel): yid kyis// dga' bas phun tshogs dang por ni// mtshan ma'i skyil krungs bcas nas su// sna yi rtse mo drang po la// mig gtad nas ni yid brtan bya// lus drang ba dang dran pa dang // 
111a2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab bsam gtan phyag rgyar ldan// dang por stong pa'i bla tshis bcas// rang gi mtshan gyi yi ge gnas// snying khang po skyes pad ma dang // gus pas glu ni len pa yi// gzugs brnyan de dbus rnam par// 
111a3(rgyud 'grel): lta// ye shes dag pa'i nam mkha' la// sangs rgyas kyis gang bltas nas ni// de mthong mngon gsal dad pa yis// snying po pad+ma rgyas gnas las// yid tshim pa'i lus kyis ni// dpal las yang dag
111a4(rgyud 'grel): byung ba yi// 'jam dpal bdag nyid chen po yi// sna tshogs lha mo rnam sprul zhing // mchod pa'i sprin ni rnam spros la// sangs rgyas sras dang bla ma rnams// de yis ma lus mchod byas nas/ 
111a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag gzhan sdig pa thams cad ni// bshags pa'i me yis bsreg par bya// rje yi rang bas de nyid shes// bsod nams thams cad bdag gis 'gyur// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song bas// 
111a6(rgyud 'grel): de 'dir gang las 'jigs pa 'byung // byang chub sems ni bskyed pa las// rin chen sems 'dra sems can la'o// rgyal ba'i bdag nyid las gnas pas// rang dgar spyod dang thar pa yin// smon lam 
111a7(rgyud 'grel): dag ni yang nas yang // ston pas de dngos len par bya// rang bzhin mi dmigs pa yis ni// stong nyid rgyu dang bral ba las// mtshan ma med pa de nas ni// gsal bar smon pa spangs pa'o// de ltar bsgoms 
111a8(rgyud 'grel): pas brtan pa ni// de nyid rgya mtshor 'jug pa yin// rang bzhin gnyis med ye shes kyi// rang bzhin rnam par ltas nas ni// sngags kyi 'di ltar brtan par bya// bsod nams rgya mtsho 'phel ba yi// sangs 
111b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyis legs bzlas pas// dpag mad mthu ni 'phel bar 'gyur// oM ma hA sarba pA paM ka ye kaM bak+She ka ma na song+ku d+hA taM ra ga d+hi sha mu ta da ma d+ha/ ma nA biSh+Ti ta/ yat+saMt+taM/ tad+d+hi ka le kaM hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ 
111b2(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ sarba pA paM s+pho Ta ya me swAhA/ oM sarba pA paM pra ti d+hi na ye me swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta na mA ta ma ba ba nir+ya ta ya me/ sarba ta thA ga ta pre te gr-ih+na tra mi maM swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu N+ye dz+nyA na si ba rA ru mu ti yai swAhA/ oM 
111b3(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta b+ha dra ma hA badz+ra sa ma yaM ma hA bo d+hI tsit+to pA da mu pa ta ya me swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shaMs te sa sarba satwA nAM sa ba si d+ha ya saM pad+d+hAn+ti sarba ta thA ga ta sha a a de she na~M te/ oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+ha sarba d+harmAsa? 
111b4(rgyud 'grel): b+hA la shud+d+ho&haM/ oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa at+ma ko&haM/ oM 'jig rten 'das pa'i bde myang dang // sdug bsngal rtsab mi mnyam med// dga' ba'o ma rgya mtsho'i rlabs// thams cad btang snyoms 'od gsal 
111b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pa'i// bya ba byas pa bla med de// de nas mthong ba'i lam khyen pa'i// sangs rgyas de'i rjes bzung ba// bu yis byang chub thob par ni// gyis la sogs pa gdam 
111b6(rgyud 'grel): ngag yin// dad pa brtan pa'i shugs kyis ni// phyag 'tshal gsol ba gdab pa'ang bya// mgon po gang gi lam zhugs pa// bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wAk+Shi t+ta/ pra Na me/ 
111b7(rgyud 'grel): na badz+ra ban+d+ha nAM ka ro mi zhes phyag 'tshal ba'i sngags so// rang bzhin grub pa'i sngags 'di ni// ci dgar bzlas la blta bar gyis// phung po khams dang skye mched sogs// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs 
111b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa yi// rang sems zhes ni des gsungs so// phyag rgya dang po'i sems dag la// so sor rtog pa byed bdag yin// 'dir ni sngags 'dis mthong ba dang // de mthong 
112a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes ni gsol ba dang // bla ma de yis slar gsungs pa// zla ba'i gzugs su rnam par ltos// de 'dir snying rje'i sems kyis ni// dmigs pa med par byas nas ni// dngos dang 
112a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos med rnam rtog gi/ mun sel shin tu 'od gsal ba'o// rang gi nyams myong dga' mthong nas// rang gzhan don ni gsal ba yin// khyod kyi mthu yis mthong ngo zhes// de yis slar yang gsol ba 
112a3(rgyud 'grel): dang // de yis brtan par gyis gsungs nas// rjes su brtan pa pha rol 'gro/ oM dz+nyA na raSh+pe bi sre dza hUM// rnam pa lnga yi 'od zer ni// phyogs mtshams kun tu spro ba yis// 'dod chags sems can 
112a4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi ni// mi zad sdug bsngal bsregs nas ni// rnal 'byor pa yis de dag kun// sangs rgyas nyid bkod gcig gyur las// de yis rdo rje rtogs pa yin// oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ oM s+pha ra Na badz+ra/ oM 
112a5(rgyud 'grel): siM ha ra na badz+ra/ oM dz+nyA na badz+ra oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badz+ra/ rdo rje dbyings zhes yang dang yang / sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rje yi// rang bzhin bdag nyid dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra at+ma ko&haM/ zhes 
112a6(rgyud 'grel): ni yang dag par ni brjod par bya// brtse ldan 'gro la phan pa dag/ gyur phyir byin gyis brlab tu gsol// zhes ni gsol gdab skad cig la// de dag rab tu zhugs nas ni// de yi bdag nyid dang nyi gyur// 
112a7(rgyud 'grel): oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga ta ta tha a haM/ rdo rje rin chen sogs mnyam nyid// rnam pa kun tu 'od gsal ba// chos kyi rgyal po dpal 'byung ba'i// dang po'i sangs rgyas shes bstod do// de las sangs rgyas 
112a8(rgyud 'grel): kun bdag nyid// 'gro bsad pa'i brtul zhugs yin// dang por snod kyi 'jig rten ni// rnam par dag par bya ba ni// gang la mngon par byang chub pa// 'di rnams gus pa'i gnas yin te// de ni gzhan don 
112b1(rgyud 'grel): tha med pa'i// rgyal ba gcig pu ngo mtshar che// 'bar ba'i hUM gi rnam pa yi// bdud kyi cho 'phrul sreg par byed// 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa ru// bltas nas phyogs rnams kun tu ni// de yi rdo rje'i ra 
112b2(rgyud 'grel): babasam// yi ge hUM gi dbus gsal la// yaM baM raM sa bon gsum las byung ba yi// rlung dang chu mo'i dkyil 'khor rnams// de nyid rig pa'i lta bar bya// mkha' la b+hU yig las byung ba'i// rtag 
112b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yan lag las byung ba// bdud rtsi sprin rgyun yongs gang bas// snod ni de yi bdag nyid 'gyur// hUM gnyis dbus su b+h+rUM yig la// sku yi rdo rje yang dag byung // gnas pa mkhrang bar gyur pa las// 
112b4(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur// hUM gi yi ge ngos gnyis la// suM las byung ba'i lhun po ste// de ru b+h+rUM yig las byung ba'i// dpal ldan gzhal yas khang brtsegs bsam// bla ri dra ba dpyangs pa dang // 
112b5(rgyud 'grel): rin chen ka ba 'od zer dang // rta babs khyams dang ldan pa yin// 'khor ba thogs pa med pa nas// gdung ba chen po zhi ba'i phyir// zla ba dkar ltar mdzes pa yis// me tog phreng ba dpyangs pa'i tshogs// 
112b6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs rnams kun tu gzhan pa yin// dam chos zab mo'i sgra sgrogs pa// seng+ge'i kha na rin po che'i// phreng ba'i sprin ni nges 'byung ba'i// brgya byin mtshon cha rnams brtsegs pa'i// tshon rtsi rnam lnga sar pa yis// 
112b7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcur 'khor bar bskor ba yin// mdzes pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa'i// g.yer ga dag las yang dag par// dam pa chos kyi sgra dag ni// khyad par du ni sgrogs pa yin// stegs bur gar gyi lha 
112b8(rgyud 'grel): mi mchog/ tshogs nas glu ni yang dag len// dad ldan lha mo'i mchog rnams ni// phyi rol gnas la rnam gnas nas// 'gro dang 'ong bar byed pa dag/ lha yi me tog phreng 'dzin pa'i// mdzes pa'i 
113a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa rgyas par byed// gang yang phyogs kun spros pa las// shin tu mi zad 'khyud pa yis// dar dbyangs sor mo 'khor ba yin// nyi ma'i mdog ltar snang ba yi// dpag med/ 
113a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan sna tshogs pa'i// gar byed mchog gi phyag bzhin no// kun tu 'gro ba kun bdag nyid// thub pa chen po rnams kyis ni// gang du mdzad pa thams cad dag/ grangs med mtshungs pa 
113a3(rgyud 'grel): med pa ni// rnam dbye rin chen snang ba yis// de ni chos dbyings dkyil 'khor ro// d+hIHlas sna tshogs mchod skyes 'di// dbus su nyi ma gnas pa lta// gang gi ge sar rdul gyi phyogs// btsem gser gyi 
113a4(rgyud 'grel): mdog bzhin mdzes// phyogs brgyad dag gi 'dab ma la// a yig gnyis kyi dbus gnas pa// si las sing+ge'i de'i sgra// bdud kyi glang po 'bros par byed// de'i lte bar ri rab las// nyi ma'i dbus su// 
113a5(rgyud 'grel): me 'od kyis// sems can byang chub la bkod nas// de bzhin gshegs kun bsdu bar bya// de las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gcod// rtog pa'i dra ba 'joms pa'i 'od// stong nyid shes rtse rdo rje dang // 
113a6(rgyud 'grel): ral gri'i chu la 'khor lo snang // de las spros pa'i 'jam pa'i dpal// zla rgyas 'od kyis rig pa bsdu// gzhon nu 'od pa bla med pa// gang 'di dpal rnams spros pas bsten// mgul rgyan dang ni 
113a7(rgyud 'grel): dpung rgyan dang // rna rgyan dang ni lag gdub sogs// rgyan de rnams kyi rab tu brgyan// de ni byang chub snying po yin// de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis// 'khor ba'i 'ching ba sreg pa dang // yon tan rgya 
113a8(rgyud 'grel): chen rgyun rgyas pa'i// gzhon nu'i sku mdzes legs pa'i dpal// mtshan dang dpe byad brgyan pa yi// de ltar rab tu snang ba yi// ji ltar rab bzhin dag pa yi// yid kyi rgya mtsho'i gnas de ru// sbyin// 
113b1(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs rin chen tshogs// thugs rje'i yon tan chu bzhin no// rdo rje dkyil krung zhabs gnyis kyis// pad gsal 'khor lo'i mtshan ma las// byung ba'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i tshogs// mun/ 
113b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ma lus 'joms pa'o// rin chen mdzes pa'i ska rags la// lte ba zab pa 'phro ba dang // sku las rgyas pa sna tshogs pa'i// lha mo de ru gsal bar snang // gang gi phreng ni mthon mthong thing // 'od kyi 
113b3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs do shal ldan// byang chub yon tan phun tshegs pa'i// lha mo zur ltar khra bo bzhin// phyag gi gdub bu sor gdub bzhin// ri rgyal dpag bsam shing bzhin du// gang yang chos kyi phyag rgyar 
113b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan// mda' gzhus mtshan pa'i chos dbyings so// g.yas kyi phyag gi ral gri dang // rdo rje bsnams pas bdud sde 'joms// g.yon gyi phyag gnyis dril bu dang // rin chen po tI bsdams pa yi// 
113b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten 'das dga' zla de nyid// bdud rtsi dpa rgyas lta bu bzhin// g.yas g.yon steng zhal gser ston po// dmar po phyogs bzhir gsal ba yi// rdo rje pad phreng sangs rgyas lnga'i// rin chen 'od 
113b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bar dbul brgyan// lha mo byang chub me tog sogs// mchod pas mdog sngon gtsug phud lnga// dpral bar mnyam pa'i thig les brgyan// smin ma sdong bu ut+pal mig/ dpe med rol pa sna tshogs 
113b7(rgyud 'grel): te// zhal ni pad+ma rgyas pa bzhin// mchu ni bim pa lta bur dmar// bzhad pa mu tig ltar dkar ba// mdzes pa rnam par bsam par bya// brtse bas sems can thams cad kyi// phyin ci log ni nyer zhi 
113b8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i// chos dbyangs gnas pa'i sku de ni// de bzhin nyid la legs par bzhugs// mkha' la sprin med bdud rtsi ni// 'dzag pa pad ma rgyas pa bzhin// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa// de 'dir 
114a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas gang yin no// sngags kyang 'di ru bzlas byas te// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA wa at+ma ko&zhes so// rdo rje 'ching ba bsgrengs nas ni// ral gri rnam par 'dzin pa yin// gsum 
114a2(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid kyi tshigs dag gi/ dbu ma gnyis ni gsum pa dang // mthe bong gnyis ni brkyang ba dang // sor mo dag ni bskum pa'o// 'khor lo mgon po'i phyag rgya ni// don grub pa yis mchog yin no// 
114a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i rgyal po gsang sngags rgyal// lugs las bzlog pa bris pa yin// a d+ha gar+Na dz+nyA/ Ta d+ha maH/ rta shro rib sul mAnag ga/ rmAd+ha sarba tsa pA ta ma shA gi wa/ d+hi mun d+hA/ wA gaH/ 
114a4(rgyud 'grel): hUM au/ ta ra ha ra/ ya da thi/ ta gA thA ta rbas/ A a ti ye ta pa muta d+hi shu dri pa shrIny+tsaM/ ya ka na dz+nyA/ ta ga thA ta rba sa/ ta du yarma d+harba sa d+ha shu dr-i pa/ ti kr-i pra a aM A a/ kU ga tsar+m+ma d+ha/ d+ha shuSh+mi/ 
114a5(rgyud 'grel): ba b+hA swa/ ba b+hA a/ rmA d+ha rbas oM/ gzhan kun yi ge sum nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor pa kun spro ba'am// kun gyi thun mong yin pa'i phyir// so sor nges pa nyid kyis so// dang por phyag 'tshal tha ma
114a6(rgyud 'grel): tri// cha bzhi dbus su gnas pa dang // yi ge gsum sngags thams cad kyis// bdag po nyid du gnas pa yin// de la gor mi ji bzhin du// shar dang lho dang nub dang byang dang // me dang bden bral dang
114a7(rgyud 'grel): rlung dang dbang ldan gyi phyogs dang mtshams su 'am// phyogs bzhi'i rdo rje 'khor los sgyur ba dang // rin chen 'khor los sgyur ba dang // pad ma'i 'khor los sgyur ba dang // las kyi 'khor los sgyur ba 
114a8(rgyud 'grel): dang // phyag rgya chen po'i 'khor los sgyur ba dang // dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i 'khor los sgyur ba dang // chos kyi phyag rgya'i 'khor los sgyur ba dang // las kyi phyag rgya'i 'khor los sgyur ba dang brgyad do// 
114b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag gi gtsug tor chen po'i yi ge gcig/ shar gyi 'dab mar yang dag bri// gtsug tor gdugs ni dkar po yang // nub kyi phyogs su dgod par bya// gzi brjid pur pa lho phyogs su// gtsug tor
114b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam rgyal byang phyogs su// rnam par 'thor ba dbang ldan phyogs// me'i phyogs su gen 'byung po// gen 'byung chen po bden bral phyogs// rgyal ba rnam rgyal phyogs su bkod// g.yas kyi phyag gis 
114b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bsnams shing de las gzhan sgeg dang bcas pa rang gi mdun la reg par mdzad// seng+ge'i gdan la nyi dkyil rdo rje skyil krung ni// bcings zhugs rin chen cod pan bcom gser mdog 'dra// go rim bzhin 
114b4(rgyud 'grel): du 'di rnams kyi sngags ni// oM b+h+yAM/ oM maM maM maM maM hUM ne/ oM u dzu ra she swA hA/ oM bi dza ya swAhA/ oM kr-i sha a sha ne hUM phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ di bya di byA/ u ga tuShA/ du na du na hUM/ oM traM ban+d+ha/ 
114b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM dz+wa loSh+NI Sha dz+wa la dz+wa la ban+d+ha da me da ma/ dum du ma/ ha na ha na/ hUM/ de la 'khor lo dbang phyug sku yis ni// 'khor lo 'di dag mdzes pas snang ba yin// rang gdan mtsho skyes ji ltar 'dab ma 
114b6(rgyud 'grel): las// de yi ge sar de yang snang ba yin// hUM yig gnyis kyi dbus gnas pa'i// gaM yig dag las glang po'i gdan// hUM las byung ba sngon po'i mdog/ mi bskyod rdo rje'i zhal dag ni// bzhi dang gnyis/ 
114b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur phyag rnams dang // khro dang sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan// mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa ste// 'khor lo'i shar gyi phyogs su bsgom// g.yas dang g.yon nang steng gnas pa'i// bstan pa zla ba'i 
114b8(rgyud 'grel): zhal dang ni// ljang dang ser po rang bzhin no// g.yas kyi ral gri rdo rje dang // mda' dang lcags kyu bsnams pa yin// g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub bcas dril bu// gzhu dang zhags pa rang las kyis// 
115a1(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa'i 'od zer tshogs kyis ni// phyogs kun gyi ni gdug pa 'joms// traM yig gnyis kyis dbus gnas pa'i// paM yig dag las rta yi gdan// rin chen 'byung ldan gser gyi mdog/ 
115a2(rgyud 'grel): lho yi phyogs su bsgom par bya// g.yas dang cig shos steng gi zhal// nag deng dkar po dmar po yi// traM yig las byung 'od zer tshegs// g.yas kyi dang po dag la ni// nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsgom bya ste/ 
115a3(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod phyag brgyad las khyad yin// hrIHgnyis dbus na shin tu gsal ba yin// maM las 'byung ba rma bya'i gdan gnas pa// hrIHlas byung ba pad+ma rA ga yi// 'od kyis phyogs rnams snang bar byed pa yin// 
115a4(rgyud 'grel): nub tu tshe dpag med mgon lha// khyad par rin chen rdo rje dang // ster zhal ser po sku mdog dmar// phyag g.yon dang po pad+ma bsdams// a yig gnyis kyis dbus gnas pa'i// gaM yig las byung mkha' lding 
115a5(rgyud 'grel): gdan// a las byung ba'i don yod grub// sku mdog ljang gu byang du bsgom// phyag gnyis mi bskyod bzhin du blta// g.yas dang cig shos steng gi zhal// mche ba gtsigs shing ser ba dang // dkar dang 
115a6(rgyud 'grel): zlams// dpa' dang ma yin pa dang // na pa la mags thams kyiganas// rad 'i dkyil sa/ kyil krung gis lags pazhugs// ga nam pan snang ba / 
115a7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kun snang bar byed pa yin// 'di rnams so so'i gtso bo yi// rjes su 'brangs nas phyogs su bzhugs// rdo rje sems sogs bsgom bya ba// rang 'od nam mkhar snang ba yin// pad+ma nyi mar 
115a8(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' yi// dkyil 'khor gyis zhugs mchog gis brgyan// de la mi bskyod dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje sems dpa' dkar por lta// g.yon gyi dril bu bkur brten cing // g.yas kyi thugs/ 
115b1(rgyud 'grel): kha rdo rje gsor// rdo rje rgyal po gser gyi mdog/ lcags kyus bdud la 'debs pa yin// rdo rje chags pa sku mdog dmar// mda' gzhu mchog gi bsnams pa yin// rdo rje legs pa sku mdog ljang / 
115b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis legs pa sbyin pa'o// rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje rin chen sogs bsgoms pa'ang // rdo rje rin chen sku mdog ser// phyag gnyis dar dpyangs 'ching ba'am// rin chen drim 
115b3(rgyud 'grel): bu bsdams pa'o// rin chen nyi ma mdog ser po// snying khar nyi ma bstan pa'o// rdo rje rgyal mtshan sku mdog ljang // rin chen rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// rdo rje bzhad pa sku mdog dkar// phyag gnyis 
115b4(rgyud 'grel): so'i phreng ba 'dzin// snang ba mtha' yas dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje chos sogs bsgom par bya// rdorje chos ni sku mdag dmang // phyag g.yon pad+ma bsnams nas ni// g.yas pas 'byed par mdzad pa 
115b5(rgyud 'grel): yin// rdo rje rnon po gur gum mdog/ phyag g.yon thugs khar po ti dang // g.yas kyis shes rab ral gri bsdams// rdo rje rgyu ni gser gyi mdog/ chos kyi 'khor lo bstan pa yin// rdo rje smra ba dmar 
115b6(rgyud 'grel): la ljang // lce yi phyag rgya bsnams pa dang // g.yas kyis chos kyi dung sgrogs pa'o// yang na gdan la brten pa'o// don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje la sogs rgyal ba rnams// rdo rje las ni sku 
115b7(rgyud 'grel): mdog ldang // phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bsnams nas// de yi steng du gar mchog mdzad// rdo rje srung ba gser gyi mdog/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i go cha bsnams// rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog gnag/ phyag gnyis 
115b8(rgyud 'grel): mche ba bsdams nas ni// gdug pa rnams ni 'jigs par byed// rdo rje khu tshur dung gi mdog/ rdo rje khu tshur 'ching ba'o// 'di rnams rim bzhinas bon ni// a dza/ sau oM a tra bahr-id tshor/ 
116a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM/ dkyil 'khor bzhi po 'di dag tu// mkhas pas sems dpa' bcu drug bsgoms// 'gro ba'i dbang phyug 'di thob pas// skad cig tsam gyis 'khrul pa sel// phyogs 
116a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dag tu sems ma sogs// rgyan de dag las byung ba'i sgras// phyogs kun snang bar byed pa yin// de la rdo rje sems pa ri// 'jam dpal bzhin du shes par bya// rin chen sems ma mi bskyod 
116a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// chos ma snang ba mtha' yas bzhin// las kyi sems mngon grub bzhin// lam pe taM kun la chos kyi gter chen 'byung ba mthon pa'o// nu ma gnyis la nor bu'i do shal gsal bar byas// 'di 
116a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar snying gi pad+mar gnas pa 'dir// rgyal ba'i byang chub sems kyi mu tig brgyan// zab mo'i chos sgrogs zab pa lta bur gyur pa yi// sa rags sil sil nang nas snang ba ni// rgyal ba'i bdag nyid 'khor lo 
116a5(rgyud 'grel): ni// snang bas de rnams dpag tu med par 'gyur// rdo rje lcags kyu dkar la dmar// g.yas rkyang ba yi gnas bzhugs pa// shar sgor g.yas dang g.yon gyi ni// lcags kyu sgreng nas gnas pa yin// 
116a6(rgyud 'grel): lho sgor rdo rje nags pa ni// sku mdog ser po rjes dran bya// g.yas rkyang ba yi gnas pa de'i// zhags pas 'gugs shing 'dul ba yin// nub sgor rdo rje lcags sgrog ni// sku mdog dmar por 'jigs 
116a7(rgyud 'grel): byed pa// sa ga'i 'dug sngangs bzhugs pa dang // phyag gnyis rdo rje lcags sgrog bsnams// byang sgor rdo rje dril bu ni// sku mdog ljang gu dang ldan pa// dril bu'i sgra yis bdud rnams 'joms// brub 
116a8(rgyud 'grel): po'i 'dug stangs su bzhugs pa// rdo rje 'bebs bzhes grags te// pad+ma 'i dkyil dbus gnas pa// nyi ma bye bo'i 'od pas lhag/ dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bya ba'i// 'gro ba'i sa bon bla med pa'o// sbyin 
116b1(rgyud 'grel): dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan de bzhin shes rab dang // stobs dang de bzhin thabs dang ni// smon lam ye shes zhes bya ba// 'bras bu'i gnas kyi pha rol byin// rdo rje dril bu yang dag 
116b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan// mdog dkar rdo rje sems dpa' yi// 'khor du de dag gnas pa yin// de nyid rnam par dag ngo bor// mda' dang gzhu yis rnam brgyan pa// mdog dmar rdo rje chags pa ni// thams cad dkyil 
116b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor yongs su bskor// gzhan don ngo bor gnas de nyid// phyag gnyis legs so sbyin pa dang // sku mdog sdang gu 'khor rnams kyis// rdo rje legs par bskor ba'o// rab tu dga' dang dri ma med// 
116b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa de bzhin 'od byed dang // 'od 'phro rkyang dka' de bzhin du// mngon gyur ring song mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin// sku mdog ser mo 'bras bdag nyid// dar dpyangs 'ching 
116b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshul gnas pa// rdo rje rin chen 'khor du gnas// de nyid lam gyi grangs kyis ni// nyi ma'i mdog can nyi ma bsnams// rdo rje nyi ma nyid bzhin po// rjes su byed par gnas pa yin// sdug bsngal 
116b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ni kun 'byung dang // 'gog dang lam yang de bzhin du// chos shes rjes su shes pa dang // kun rdzob shes dang de bzhin du// don dam de bzhin mi skye ba// zad pa shes pa'i ye shes ni// rang don 
116b7(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs dge ba'i// rin chen rgyal mtshan bsnams pa dang // mdog ldang rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis// phun sum tshogs par bsgom par bya// gzhan don phun sum tshogs bdag nyid kyis// de
116b8(rgyud 'grel): bzhin zla ba'i 'od zer mdog/ rdo rje bzhad pa la rten pa// so yi phreng bas rnam par brgyan// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // bden pa rten 'brel thub pa yi// gnas dang gnas ming bdag po dang // 
117a1(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum bden pa rnam pa bzhi// 'dus byas 'dus ma byas dge ba// rdo rje chos kyis bsgom par bya// mdog dpar phyag g.yon pad+ma ni// bsdams nas g.yas pas 'byed par 
117a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad// gcig dang rgyu dang za ba dang // byed pa dang ni dbang sgyur dang // bdag po'i don dang rtag pa dang // nyon mongs pa dang dag pa'i gnas// rnal 'byor can dang ma grol grol// bdag tu 'dzin pa skye ba nyid// 
117a3(rgyud 'grel): de dag spyod pa sku mdog phyagan po ti bsdams pa dang // nyon mongs gcod pa'i ral gri bsdams// rdo rje rnor po zhes brjod do// dad dang brtson 'grus dran bsam ga tan// shes rab de bzhin shA yi sbyar// lha 
117a4(rgyud 'grel): dang shes rab chos dang ni// sangs rgyas spyan dang dbang po yi// rdo rje 'khor lo su mdog ser// lha mo 'khor lo bsdams pas bskor// gnas dang gnas min rnam smin dang // mos pa dang ni sna tshogs khams// 
117a5(rgyud 'grel): dang po kun 'grol ma dag dang // nyon mongs rnam par byang ba dang // sngon gnas rjes dran skye 'chi dang // zag bzad pa nyid kyang ste// rdo rje smra bzangs kyi mdog/ phyag gis lce bsdams 'khor gyis bskor// 
117a6(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' rnam shes mtha' yas dang // de las gzhan pa zil gnon brgyad// rdo rje las ni su mdog ltar// sna tshogs rdo rje dril bu bsnams// 'byung ba rnam pa bzhi dag dang // sngon po ser po dkar 
117a7(rgyud 'grel): dmar dang // nam mkhar de bzhin sems dang ni// zad par rnam par dag ldan pa'i// bsrung ba ser po go cha bsdams// rtsa ba'i mtshan nyid de kho na// byin ci ma log mtshan nyid dang // 'bras bu rgyu'i del 
117a8(rgyud 'grel): na// pra ba dang ni rags pa dang // grags dang rnam par dag yul dang // bsdu dang dbye ba'i mtshan nyid dang // mkhas de kho na rnam bcu ni// rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog gnag/ phyag gnyis mche ba 
117b1(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o// tshe dang sems dang yo byad dang // las dang skye ba mos pa dang // smon lam dang ni rdzu 'phrul dang // ye shes chos la dbang 'di rnams// rdo rje khu tshur sku mdog dkar// phyag 
117b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis khu tshur bsdams pa'o// so so'i gtso bo'i sngags kyis bskyed// rang rang sngags kyis mchod pa dang // rdo rje skyil krung byed kyis ni// 'di dag rim bzhin gnas pa yin// 'di ltar bsgom 
117b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnal 'byor pa// yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ni// 'di skad gsungs pa bzhin du thob// dngos grub gzhan ni smos ci dgos// me mtshams sgeg mo sku mdog dkar// phyag gnyis rdo rje bsnams 
117b4(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// sgeg dang bcas pas dkur brtan nas// skal bzangs thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// bden bral rdo rje phreng ba ma// mdog ser rin chen phreng ba brnams// rlung du glu ma sku mdog dam/ 
117b5(rgyud 'grel): bi wang brdung ba'i mchog yin no// dbang ldan gar ma rdo rje ni// rtse gcig bsnams nas gar mdzad do// bdud pa me tog mar me dri// spos khang me tog phreng ba dang // mar me dr-i yi dung chos 
117b6(rgyud 'grel): bsnams// sku mdog sgeg mo la sogs bzhin// de yi phyi rol dkyil 'khor du// sems can kun don byed bdag nyid// dpag med gzi brjid rnyed dka' ba'i// gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' 
117b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams// skul mdzes shing nyer zhi ba// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// pad+ma zla ba'i dbus su ni// sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs zhugs// mgon po byams pa la sogs pa// rin 
117b8(rgyud 'grel): chen cod pan snang bar bsgom// de la byams pa phyag g.yas kyis// mchod sbyin dpung rgyan mdzes pa dang // gnyis pa phyag gnyis klu shing ni// mdzes pa yang dag bsdams pa yin// 'jam dbyangs 
118a1(rgyud 'grel): / phyag na ral gri ni// rin po che yi mdzes pa bsnams// chos kyi sbyin pa rjes byed pa'i// gzhan gyi shes rab bo ti bsnams// spos kyi glang po gsal byed pa// dri yi dung chos bsnams pa 
118a2(rgyud 'grel): dang // g.yas pa'i phyag gi mchod sbyin dang // spyi bor 'od dpag med rol ldan// ye shes rtog ces bya ba ni// thod kyis mtshan pa'i cad pan bsnams// zla rgyas rnam par mdzes pa yi// bzhi po dri 
118a3(rgyud 'grel): ma med pa'i 'od// gti mug mun pa lta bu ni// 'joms par byed pa shar gyi yin// dpal ldan bzang skyong zhes bya ba// sku mdog gser gyi mdog 'dra ba'i// rin chen 'bar ba lho phyogs su// nor 
118a4(rgyud 'grel): bu rgyal mtshan phyag na bsdams// phyag g.yon de bzhin nam mkha' yi// mdzod ni rgya cher snang ba'o// blo gros rgya mtsho ga ser gyi mdog/ phyag gnyis bskal pa bzang po yi// dpag bsam shing 
118a5(rgyud 'grel): dang bum pa bzang // sems can don mchog 'dzin pa yin// blo gros mi bzad pyag ka yan gyis// bo ti sa mtshan pa'i ral gri bsdams// spobs pa brtsegs pa de bzhin du// byAg nang la gri mtshan pa yin/ 
118a6(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje'i phyogs su bzhugs pa rnams// su mdog ser pa 'ad zer ldan// byang chub phun tshogs mi zad pa'i// 'di dag sems can rnams la bstan// mthu chen thob par la gri dang // rgyal mtshan dag gis/ 
118a7(rgyud 'grel): legs par brgyan// ngan song kun 'dren zhes bya ba// dpal be'u 'dzin cing byams par byed// mya ngan kun 'joms blo gros ni// phyag na g.yu drung 'khyim pa bsnams// zla bas mtshan pa'i dril bu dang // 
118a8(rgyud 'grel): dril bu'i sgra yi rnam pa yis// mtshan ma'i gdugs ni 'dzin pa dang // dman pa dka' ba phun tshogs pa'i// skyed pa'i lus kyi dra ba can// pad+ma ga sar ltar dam ba// nub kyi phyogs su zhugs pa'o// 
118b1(rgyud 'grel): zla 'od gzhon nu gsal ba yin// po tis mtshan pa ral gri bsdams// skal ldan rin chen mdzod chen po// 'od dpag med ni bsdams pa yin// nam mkha'i snying po phyag g.yas kyis// rin po che ni bteg nas
118b2(rgyud 'grel): bsnams// sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba// phyag g.yas ral gri bsnams pa dang // sna tshogs rdo rje g.yon na bsnams// mya ngan thams cad sel ba yin// byang gi phyogs su bzhugs pa rnams// thams cad 
118b3(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog ljang gu yin// yang na thams cad rims bzhin du// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje dang // rin po che dang du skyes dang // sna tshogs rdo rje bsdams pa dang // ji ltar rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan// phyag g.yon 
118b4(rgyud 'grel): dril bu brnams pa yin// 'di rnams rim bzhin rdzogs kyis ni// can mongs ma lus la y-i// oM mdzu ma bad+hAr na sa b+h+yaH// oMman+ta shrI ye swAH/ mdzekad+ha ya~M AH/ oM dz+nyAn ka tu ye swAH/ 
118b5(rgyud 'grel): oM ba tra la ye swA hA/ oM s+thA ka ra ma ti ye sA thA/ oM ak+Sha ye hri/ a k+Sha ya karma a ba ra na bi shur+d+ha ne swA hA/ oM pa te ba na kun+d+he hUM swA hA/ oM s+thA me ma ha s+tha ma ba d+hi swA hA/ oM A kar+ya swA hA/ oM sarba ku sha ta ner+b+ba ta naM 
118b6(rgyud 'grel): d+hi hUM swAH/ oM dz+wa le na ma Thadz+wa le ni hUM sathA/ oM tsan+ta su tsar+b+hi tsan+da bya ba la ki na swA tra/ oM a mi tA b+hU te hU~M swAhA/ oM kha a ka sha g+ha rba ya swAhA/ oM sarba ne pa ra ni bi shrI ne sA hA// rdo rje hUM mdzad dbang ldan du// su mdog 
118b7(rgyud 'grel): nag po zhal bzhi pa// dang po khro zhing sgeg pa dang // g.yas pa drag po 'jigs rung dang // de las gzhan pa dpa' ba dang // steng gi zhal ni rngam pa yin// snying khar khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi// phyag rgya bcis 
118b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag gnyis ni// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings pa// rgyab tu sbyar nas mthe'u chung gnyis// rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings nas// mdzub mo gnyis ni legs par sbyar// g.yas na ral gri lcags kyu mda'// gzhu// 
119a1(rgyud 'grel): / dang sbrul zhags rdo rje g.yon// de yi zhabs kyi skrod pa yis// drigs pa dbang phyug chen po'i dang // u ma'i num g.yas pa yi// zhabs kyis gnon pa bzhugs pa yin// rdo 
119a2(rgyud 'grel): me ltar 'bar ba ni// mi thung dud bri'i mdog can no// g.yas na rdo rje ral gri dang // de bzhin du ni 'khor lo bsnams// g.yon na dril bu zhags pa gzhu// ba dan sna tshogs g.yon pas brgyan// kha b+hUM 
119a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yig g.yeng ka yi// skra yis phyogs kun khyab pa dang // khyab 'jug chung mar bcas pa la// g.yas brkyang ba'i dga' bas bzhugs// 'khrul pa rnam par dag ngobo// de ni spangs pa'i mchog yin no// 
119a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bden bral mtshams su ni// dpal ldan dpa'o khrag 'thung rgyal// dang po'i zhal ni drag po dang // g.yas zhal dga' bo'i rgyal ba dang // steng ma za bar byed pa dang // g.yon pa mchog tu sgeg par/ 
119a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas// 'bar ba'i rdo rje sna tshogs khan+d+he sgeg pa dang // 'jigs byed lpags dmar rlon pa rim par ni// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gis mda' dang gzhu// phyag gnyis kyis ni khrag gis bkang / 
119a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i thod pa bsdams// g.yas rkyang zhabs kyis 'jigs byed chung mar bcas pa mnan// 'gro ba'i byed po keng rus rgyan dang sa rags dang // sangs rgyas mtshan ma nang gnas pa'i// thod pa lnga yi/ 
119a7(rgyud 'grel): cod pan gsal// bgegs tshegs ma lus rengs byed pa'i// sprin nag po yi sku 'chang ba// rnam par dag byed mgon po yis// phreng ba rus pa'i dum bu yis// sbrul nag po'i ngo bos ni// 'jigs 
119a8(rgyud 'grel): pam lus sel ba yin// 'dod chags nye bar zhi ba'i mi bzad sgeg pa'i spyod pa dang // chags dang bral ba spong bas sgyu ma'i phreng ba 'chang ba yin// mang po ji ltar gcig yin gcig tu rtogs nas 
119b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan pa yin// de yang skye ba de nyid dngos kun bdag po nyid kho na// rnal 'byor sgom par byed pa mya ngan 'das mchog yin// 'od zer 'bar ba dpal ldan khrag mthun ye shes phyag rgya yin// rlung gi phyog/ 
119b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi rta mchog ni// de ni zhabs bzhir yang dag ldan// spyan gsum khro bo sgeg pa yis// gtso bo'i zhal gsum g.yas pa ni// drag po g.yon pa tshangs pa ni// rta gdong ste ma ljang gu'o// ba dan sum ldan// 
119b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa ni// steng du slong bar byed pa'i tshul// ral gri mda' 'dzin pa gzhan// thod pa sna tshogs chu skyes dang // mdung thung dang ni dbyig pa dang // bzhi ni g.yon pa'i phyag bzhi la'o// g.yas kyi gtso// / 
119b4(rgyud 'grel): bo'i zhabs kyis ni// dpal mo dbang mo gzhan gyis ni// chags ma dga' ma mnan pa yin// ting 'dzin reg pa thob byed yin// g.yon gyi dbang po myos byed dang // myos dang brgyal byed de bzhin/ 
119b5(rgyud 'grel): du// rjes su 'dzin par byed pa dang // 'di yis rta skad 'tsher ba yis// bdud rnams snying ni 'gas pa dang // spros pas byang chub 'gro bar byed// bzhi po 'di dag 'bar ba yis// dus mtha'i 
119b6(rgyud 'grel): me yis kun khyab dang // spro zhing gyen du 'bar ba'o// gtsug gi nor bus gsal ba'i sku// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAM bi d+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra/ 
119b7(rgyud 'grel): dz+wa la a na lArka hUM/ oM he ru ka badz+ra sa ma ya hi/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu ta pany+tsa ka hU~M phaT/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM phaT/ zhes bya ba rgyal po'i sras kyi dkyil 'khor ni// gang gi sems kyi spro ba 'jug pa/ 
119b8(rgyud 'grel): yin// lha yi dbang po mchod pa byed pa 'di// thos pa'i lam du song bas spos chu'i char 'bebs pas// 'jig rten kun gyi sdig pa'i me dpung zhi bar byed// de nas rdo rje shugs kyis ni// 
120a1(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol dbang ldan la sogs nas// brtsams nas cho ga bzhin bltas nas// mchod pa la sogs rnal 'byor rgyal// sngags ni dang por phyag 'tshal dang // swA tA'i mtha' can gzi brjid che/ 
120a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa'i mtha' can rang rang min// dbus su de ni sbyar bar bya// phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar byas nas// spyi bor thal mo 'jog pa yin// mdog dang phyag la sogs pa dag/ chung ma rang rang bdag po mtshungs 
120a3(rgyud 'grel): rtse gsum thod pa 'dzin pa dang // phyag bzhi pa la spyan gsum pa// cod pan ral gri khyu mchog gdan// lha mo nye bar gnas pa'ang yin// phyag gnyis pad+ma phreng ba dag/ tshangs pa'i spyi bo thal mo sbyar// mdog 
120a4(rgyud 'grel): ser zhal bzhi ngang pa'i gdan// phyag gnyis dbyug pa spyi blugs bsdams// phyag gnyis 'khor lo dang bcas dung // mgo la legs bcing thal mo sbyar// mdog nag mda' gzhu be con bsnams// 
120a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' ldi gdan la benas mtshan// 'di dag 'khar dang bcas pa ni// shan+ya dpa' bo gser glang po// gshin rje'i mahe'i gdan la bzhugs// nag pa dbyug pa mdung thung bsnams// nA ny+tsa 
120a6(rgyud 'grel): dkang bdung da smra []dzin// / zla / dam shAs// rgyags nyis zung bags gapar dang // hU~M dbyes sna sa / 
120a7(rgyud 'grel): mdog ser ra skyes dga' la bzhugs// dbyug pa gun+d+he 'dzin pa'o// bden bral mi ro'i gdan la bzhugs// ral gri dang ni phug 'dzin pa'o// rlung lha ba dan bsnams pa dang // ri dgas gdan la sngo 
120a8(rgyud 'grel): bsangs mdog/ khru mchog la gnas dbang ldan ni// spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba 'ching // rtse gsum thod 'dzin kha dog dkar// 'di kun 'khor la phyogs pa'o// pad+ma nyi ma 'chang ba ni// nyi ma rtag gi 
120b1(rgyud 'grel): gdan la bzhugs// zla ba dang pal gnas pa// dkar po zla ba chu skyes bsdams// mig dmar mdog dmar pad+ma'i gdan// g.yas pa'i lag gis nu gri dang // de las gzhan pa mi mgo za// pad+mal 
120b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas gza' lag ni// mdog ser mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o// bla ma dkar po chu skyes gdan// phreng ba dang ni spyi blugs bsnams// de bzhin pa ba sangs spen pa// mdog nag rus sbal la gnas pa// lag 
120b3(rgyud 'grel): na dbyug pa thogs pa'o// sgra gcan zla ba nyi ma thogs// mjug rings ral gri zhags pa thogs// rgyu skar dkyil 'khor bud med gzugs// lha mo'i rnam par mdzes pa yin// spyi bo thal mo sbyar ba ru/ 
120b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom byas tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// dkar po dang po bzhi pa dang // drug pa bdun pa'ang de bzhin no// dgu pa dang ni bcu pa dang // bcu gsum pa'ang de bzhin na// bco lnga pa dang bco brgyad pa// nyi shu gnyis 
120b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang de bzhin no// nyi shu gcig dang nyi shu dgu/ nyi shu brgyad pa'ang de bzhin no// sngo sangs dag ni gsum pa dang // de bzhin lnga dang brgyad pa dang // bcu gcig pa dang bcu drug pa// de nas yang ni bcu 
120b6(rgyud 'grel): bdun pa// nyi shu nyi shu gsum pa dang // nyi shu bzhi pa'ang de bzhin no// ljang gu dag ni gnyis pa dang // bdun pa dang ni bcu bzhi pa// bcu gnyis bcu dgu nyi shul// nyi shu drug pa'ang ser po ni// gzhon nu 
120b7(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi mdog can la// gdong drag rma bya'i gdan la bzhugs// mdung thung rdo rje dril bu dang // khyim bya dag ni phyag na bsnams// glang sA dkar po lag bzhi pa// sbrul gyis mchod phyir thogs 'chang zhing // la 
120b8(rgyud 'grel): tu la phug tri shul// de bzhin du ni gri khug thogs// byi ba la gnas nag po ni// dga' byed rtsa rnga brdung bar byed// rtse gsum thod pa 'dzin par ni// nag pa mahA ki la ra grags// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor 
121a1(rgyud 'grel): / mtshungs pa yis// b+h+ring gi ri ti de bzhin mchod// tshangs ma dang ni go cham// drag po dbang mo gzhon nu ma// rang gi bdag po ji bzhin no// yi dgasal gnas phag mo ni// mdog 
121a2(rgyud 'grel): nag pa la thod pa 'chang // mdog dmar mchi ba gtsigs pa yi// yi dgas gdan la gnas pa ni// chu gri dang ni thod pa dag/ de ni gtum mo yis ni 'dzin pa yin// mkha' lding rkang pa pus mo'i bar// 
121a3(rgyud 'grel): dkar ser de nas lte ba'i bar// de nas mgrin pa nyi ma'i mdog/ kha ni mig sman nag po'i mdog/ stobs bzang glang po la gnas pa// ral gri gshol 'dzin dkar po yin// rgyal bar byed pa kha dog 
121a4(rgyud 'grel): ldang // khu byug shing rta la gnas pa// me tog phreng dang mda' gzhu dang // kham phor lag na thog pa yin// sbrang rtsir byed pa kha dog dkar// ne tsol gnas kham por dang // mda' gzhu chu srin rgyal mtshan 
121a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnams// dpyid lha skal ldan mdzes pa ni// dre'u la gnas kha dog dkar// mda' dang gzhu dang kham bor dang // ral gri de ni 'dzin pa yin// sbrul gyis bdun bdun ldan pa'i klung // thal mo sbyar ba 
121a6(rgyud 'grel): byas nas 'dug/ mtha' yas rigs ldan mdog dmar po// bram ze'i rigs te me las skyes// rgyal rigs dbang chen las skyes ser// dung skyong dang ni nor rgyas bu// 'jog po dang ne pad+ma che// nag po rje'u 
121a7(rgyud 'grel): rigs rlung las skyes// stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma ni// dmang rigs dkar po chu las skyes// stobs bzangs dang ni zags bzang rigs// rab dgar dang ni rnam snang mdzad// khra ba dang go cha ral gri dang // phub 
121a8(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yul la 'jug pa yin// gser gyi mdog can bu dang bcas// gter ni spro ba'i phyogs byed pa'o// gnod sbyin bdag po na kul// sa bon grong khyer 'dzin pa yi// nor bu bzang po gser gyi mdog 
121b1(rgyud 'grel): gang ba bzang po sngon po yin// nor sbyin kha dog dmar po yin// de bzhin rnam thos sras ser po// rtse gcig thun dang kha dog dmar// ki li mi li de bzhin gnag/ sgo dbang spyod pa'i dbang po ni// ser po rgyud 
121b2(rgyud 'grel): ma rdung ljon pa// chung ma dang bcas dkar po ni// gtsug phud lnga pa de bzhin no// bdag gi don kun grub pa dang // don med thams cad sel ba'o// rtsa bzhin rnyed bla'i thar pa ni// thams cad sangs rgyas 
121b3(rgyud 'grel): bstan las yin// dkyil 'khor 'di yi 'khor la yi// ming tsam yang ni rnyed par dka'// slu ba chu bur snying po med pa yi// 'khor ba chos kyi rin chen ldan// skal ldan dga' zhig nyid 'dir ni// mtho ris 
121b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa de las thob// 'ga' zhig tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang // de las mya ngan 'das mchog yin// de las snying po snying po mchog/ bsgrubs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bde gshegs kun 
121b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis gang gsungs pa'i// zab cing rgya che'i chos rnams 'thob// yon tan de las kyang 'byung ba// 'di ltar de la mchod pa rnams// mchod dang bzhugs gsol dga' ba dang // ting nge 'dzin la mnyam 
121b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas gzhan// mtshungs med mchod pa byed pa dag/ nges ni tir 'dzin thams cad 'grub// 'di ni mchod dang mchod byed pa// lha mchod rnams kyis de mchod yin// dga' chen rgya mtsho rlabs kyis 
121b7(rgyud 'grel): ni// 'jig rten bsil bar byed pa yin// mchod dang bsnyen bkur bcas pa dang // sna tshogs bkod pa'i khyad par ldan// de ni nam mkhar byed pa 'di// de skad cig gis ni ngo mtshar rtogs// gzhan 
121b8(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhan ni grangs med spro// nam mkha' shin du rgya chen po// mchod pa'i sprin ni khyab pa yi// rin chen me tog sogs cher gyis// dpag bsam shing rgyas skyed mos tshal// gnas 'di 'byor ba'i 
122a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid 'di// 'di ltar sngon med sna tshogs gzugs// yongs su bzung nas spro bar bya// dang bas snying ga'i par rgyas pa'o// bde ba'i dpal ni 'byung ba'i gnas// sgeg pa'i ro// 
122a2(rgyud 'grel): yis bcus pa yis// rab tu spros pa rgyas pa yin// de dus yun ring gnas pa yi// drag pa'i byang chub sems de ni// lus las ba spu ldang ba dang // rdo rje mchog ni smra ba yin// spos lha'i me tog rgyas tshogs 
122a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis// gnas kun sprin gyi dra bas khyab// 'khor lo'i sems ni sna tshogs ro myong ba'i// g.yo dang mi g.yo 'khor lo'i bdag nyid ni// rnam pa sna tshogs 'byor pa'i gnas 'di ni// mchog gi mthu yis 
122a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par spyod bzang ngo po// pi wang rdza rnga rnga dngas la sogs mnyam 'jug pa// gsang bar sgrogs pa chos kyi don mchog yin no// nyan mangs dri ngan rnam par spong byed gar 'byung ba'o// phyag rgya rgyun gyi skrag 
122a5(rgyud 'grel): pas lhan skyes rjes su byed// lha mo phyag gis pad+ma rnam par 'jug pa yis// rdzing bu chung gis bskyod pa'i pad+ma mnyam par byed// nod dang lha dang lag bcangs dang ni gnyis gnyis khrung // mthong ba bdud 
122a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsi dam pa bde ba gtso bo yin// gang zhig 'dir ni phyag rgya'i thabs na chen po yi// 'bras bu thams cad ston pa yongs su spro ba yin// 'di ltar cho ga ngo mtshar chen po'i gnas sna tshogs// phun tshegs sgeg pa'i 
122a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa nyams myong 'byung // dkyil 'khor bdag po nas brtsams dkyil 'khor lta// 'khar lo grangs med rnam par 'byung ba yin// 'di ltar mo sar bdud rtsi dpag med de 'di rgyas pa las// lhan gyis yon 
122a8(rgyud 'grel): tan bcu 'gyur gnas pa yin// des na 'di ltar phan tshun lhag par spros pa yas// khyad 'phags kun gyis ma byas chos ro 'byung ba yin// 'di ltar sgrub pa dge bar rab 'bum bdag nyid ni// gang zhig rang 
122b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rtogs pa'i rang bzhin no// des na de nyid bdud rtsi rgyas kun 'jug pa yin// lhan skyes mi g.yo rtogs pa'i mya ngan 'das// mchod pa'i so sor ting 'dzin thabs thob pa// thog ma med pa'i 
122b2(rgyud 'grel): gter rnams sangs rgyas kun gyi bsngags// rig pa dang ni gzhan dag de bzhin nyid stong pa// shes rab byang chub chos dang bdag med ces// 'di 'dra'i phyirarol mchod pa chung gyur kyang // mchod pa'i 
122b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis mchog 'gyur de nyid mthong ba nyid// 'di'i sgrub pa sems can mchog ni rnyed par dka' ba yin// 'di ni bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin las gzhan cis na 'gyur// gang dag thub pa'i sku gzugs ras 
122b4(rgyud 'grel): bris glegs bam sogs// de nyid mngon par rlon zhing zhi bar 'dod pa nyid// de nyid dpal du gnyis las yun ring nyams par 'gyur// dge ba'i las bral stong pa nyid la dgongs pa med// mun nag thibs 
122b5(rgyud 'grel): po zla ba'i 'od dang bral ba las// pad+ma rgyas bral kha bas g.yogs pa'i mtsho bzhin no// rig pa dang bral nor dang dka' thub sred pa dang // thub pa mchod bral de nyid shes pa yis// des ni lha rnams 
122b6(rgyud 'grel): dga' bar byed min de su zhig/ des na yon tan nyid thob min pa de gang zhig/ gang du 'di ma gtogs par 'gro bar gtso bo gang // gang zhig mchod pa'ang de bzhin mthong bar 'gyur// chu bo bab pa rgya
122b7(rgyud 'grel): mtsho'i ngang pa dang // sal me tog rgyas par 'byung ba dang // nyi ma shar bas don dam bsten pa dang // mchod pa byed pa mchog de'i stobs kyis ni// ngan pas gzhan la gnod pa byas pa las// mi/ 
122b8(rgyud 'grel): gtsang ba nyid cis ni byung mi 'gyur// de'i dag pa'i bdag nyid lag pa las// lha rnams me tog dag ni len pa yin// gang zhig sdig pa spangs pa dang // lan gsum la gnas brtan pa ni// 'jig/ 
123a1(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum dag 'di dag gi/ bsod nams chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di'i sgra las de las gzhan// phal pa 'di dag 'jug pa yin// 'di gtso nyid du mngon rlom pa// chos kyi 
123a2(rgyud 'grel): lam las lhung ba yin// dam pa'i chos dang glegs bam dag/ mdun du so sor byas nas ni// sngar bshad pa yi sngags kyis ni// phyag 'tshal mchod pal sogs bya// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye she 
123a3(rgyud 'grel): yul// sngags kyi bsod nams phung po 'di// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal ba// sngon du 'don pa'i rim pa yis// lce zla hUM yig la 'byung ba'i// rdo rje dbus su hrIHyig las// byung ba'i 
123a4(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes dbus ram dzi// dkar po 'od zer 'khrugs pa las// sngags pas snang ba mtha' yas bsgom// sngags bskul nas ni bzlas pa bya// de la sngags ni 'di yin te// oM pad+ma sa ra satwa satwa 
123a5(rgyud 'grel): pra brta ya shud+d+ha ya/ hUM tri raM dzi/ chos rnams kun la chags med par// sems can thams cad gyur cig ces// bsams nas de'i snying pa bsal// 'di yi sngags dang dad ldan pa// oM badz+ra big/ 
123a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ sems can rnams kyi dri ma rnams// gsal lo zhes ni rnams bsams nas// 'di yis sngags pa yid gzhug pas// dri ma thams cad bsngal bar bya// oM sa man+ta pa ri k+Sha gu h+ya tsa ri tsa ra hUM/ 
123a7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dam gyis mgos ltar// 'grol phan tshun 'grogs par shog/ chags pa med par byung ba'i phyir// sngags pas dag pa rnam bsam bya// oM nerma ni sha d+ha hUM/ rnam pa thams cad yongs 
123a8(rgyud 'grel): gcod pa// chos dbyings rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// bsgoms nas gang 'di dkyil 'khor 'di// byed pa sngags pa mkhas pa yin// oM ma hA maN+Da la hUM// rang bzhin stong par bsgoms bdag 
123b1(rgyud 'grel): kun la chags pa med sems kyis// sngags kyi chu yi thig le yis// rang gi spyi bor dbang bkur bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis/ 
123b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa med par bsgom par bya// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// sngags pas mchod pa brtsam par bya// oM a ma~M g+ha pad+ma ba sun+d+ha ri d+ha ra da re maN+Da hU~M// las kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor bdag nyid/ 
123b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas dad pa'i mchod pa brtsam// bgegs mthar byed pa'am bgegs 'joms pa// bgegs rnams zhi bar bya phyir mchod// mchod pa'i lha mo rnam pa brgyad// ji lta bzhin du sbyor rigs pas// 
123b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa la gnas drig zangs dang // g.yas pa la gnas gzhan g.yon no// dang po la dbul ba bya ba ni// arga'i gnod ni ngag byed dang // pad+ma phyag rgya ldan g.yos pas// de la ba dan gsum 
123b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dag/ de nyid shes pas yi ge ni// gsum gyis byin gyis brlab par bya// ana'i snod chu thogs pa yis// me tog la sogs bsangs nas ni// me tog la sogs lha mo yis// sngags ni ji lta bzhin du brjod// de nyid mngon 
123b6(rgyud 'grel): sum byas bdag nyid// bsngags pa bla ma mchod par bya// brtul zhugs nyams pa la gzhan du// 'di na gar du 'gro bar 'gyur// dbang po la sogs rnyed dka' ba// gang zhig byin gyis brlabs la// 
123b7(rgyud 'grel): thob// 'dir thal mo sbyar byas nas// de'i sngags kyis spyan drang ngo // a sarba ta thA ga ta badz+rany+dza li sa ma ye hUM/ zhes bya ba'i thal ma'i sngags so// phyogs rnams kun gyi sangs rgyas rnams// 
123b8(rgyud 'grel): sras bcas 'jig rten rab grags pa// rdo rje rin chen rigs dang ni// pad+ma las kyi rigs de bzhin// snying po phyag rgya rim pa rnams// lha'i tshogs kyi thams cad dag/ de dag bdag la dgang 
124a1(rgyud 'grel): su gsol// chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa rnams// bdag ming che ge zhes bya ba// chos dbyings bdag nyid grong khyer ni// de ring dkyil 'khor mchod par bgyi// yo byad ci 'byung // 
124a2(rgyud 'grel): pa yis mchod// sems can rnams la brtse ba dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// rjes su brtse bas nyer dgongs la// byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad par rigs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bo d+hi satwa pa 
124a3(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+ha swa b+hA ba At+ma nAM shud+d+hi saM pU ra ya hUM/ zhes bya ba 'di ni spyan 'dren pa'i sngags so// mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir// de nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya// de la sngags ni// oM sarba ta thA 
124a4(rgyud 'grel): gtaM pU dza pas+than yaM Ar+g+haM NAM ni d+yai ta ya maM// oM sarba ta thA ga te pra ti gr-ih+Na du ma~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA d+hi tiSh+Tha tra maM/ a a ma g+ha san+tan+d+re trad+d+he/ zhes byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// sngags kyi don ni 'di 
124a5(rgyud 'grel): lta bu// bsgoms la bdag nyid de mchod do// oM arba ta thA ga ta pA dza badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ zhes so// sdig pa mthu me'i bag gi chags// dril bu'i sgra yis bdud tshogs 'joms// sngags
124a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi grub pa 'dzin pa ni// phyag rgya dang por chen po'i tshig/ zhes grub pa'i dpal rdo rje dril bus kyi ngani mchod pa yin// oM d+hi d+ha ma g+ha b+hi pu la s+pha ra// ma d+hA ra ner+g+ha sha ru ti ra na ra na hUM// ye shes lnga'i bdag 
124a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid cig/ gnyis med gnyis su ji ltar 'gyur// 'di ltar rang bzhin spros pa las// sgyu 'phrul rdo rje rtogs pa yi// de nyid blo yi mchod par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+ha badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Te Sha/ tAM d+ha ra ya 
124a8(rgyud 'grel): mi he hi hi hUM// de la gnas pa 'ga' zhig ni// mchod pa de yang lhag par gus// sems can dang ni sangs rgyas rnams// rang bzhin don dam yin pa'i phyir// de yang dman dang lhag pa la// sgra yi/ 
124b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mchod par bya// dril bu'i sgra ni sgrogs pa dang // sngags dang gdug pa bstod pa dag/ 'dun pa rjes su sgrogs pa yis// dad pa'i rgya mtsho sna tshogs pa'i// brlabs kyi mgon po mngon dgongs 
124b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzod// 'khor lo'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyis ni// yang dag 'das pa spyan drang ngo // dkyil 'khor pa kun rang sngags kyi// de nas bum pa gang ba yis// mgul chings phreng bas rnam par brgyan// 
124b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma dang bcas dpal 'bras bu// gsang sngags kyi ni dbul bar bya// oM badz+ra d+ha ka hUM/ gang ba'i snod kyis de bzhin mchod// 'gro ba rgyas pa'i yid dga' ba// oM ba tha pu ra ya a a mo g+ha ba 
124b4(rgyud 'grel): tis man+ta pra ni sA hA/ de nas me tog rgya bcings la// me tog char rgyun 'jug pa yis// spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas la// badz+ra ban+d+ha zhes brjod nas// gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am// gang yang phyogs 
124b5(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na// lha dang mi rnams kyi me tog gi bye brag yid las byung ba dang // chu las skyes pa'am/ thang las skyes pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/ ma lus shing lus pa
124b6(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang / 
124b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang rigs sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas bdug pa'i phyag rgya bcings 
124b8(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// tshul khrims kyi ni bdug pa yis// 'gro ba bdug par gyur cig ces// mkhas pas 'di ltar brjod par bya// gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig
125a1(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi khams thams cad na// lha dang mi rnams kyi bdug pa'i bye brag/ lhan cig skyes pa'am/ yang dag par sbyar ba 'am/ yongs su gyur pa gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta 
125a2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas pa bzhugs pa thams

125a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi snang ba'i bye brag yid las byung ba'am// rin po che'i 'od dam mar me'i snang ba la sogs pa gang dag yod pa 'di lta ste/ ma lus

125a8(rgyud 'grel): dri yi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// dri ma med pa'i bdag nyid la// bltas nas brjod par bya ba ste// gang yang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am// gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams

125b8(rgyud 'grel): gyi khams 'di'am/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi rgod pa dang sreg pa dang / dga' ba dang rtse 'jo bde ba'i bye brag gang dag yod pa de rnams 'di lta ste/

126b3(rgyud 'grel): shing / mig dang yid mngon par dga' ba dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA d+harmA ba bo d+hi k+Shan+ti pa ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ dang por gar skor 
126b4(rgyud 'grel): byas nas ni// de nas gar gyi phyag rgya bcings nas/ sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par brjon pa dang / sangs rgyas nyid du yongs su bzhol zhing 'khor ba yongs 
126b5(rgyud 'grel): su mi spong ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta saM sa rA pa ri t+yaM gA rut+ta ra ma hA bid+ya pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ dang ba ra gar bskor bya ba dang / me tog phyag

126b8(rgyud 'grel): rab pha rol byin 'gro ba'i// bdug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ sems can thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab dang ye shes rnams dang yang dag par rnam par gyur cig/ so so yang 
127a1(rgyud 'grel): dag par rig pa bzhi thob ste/ bzod dang bstan bcos thams cad shes shing sgyu rtsal dang ldan par gsar ba'i cho ga shes pa dang de kho na nyid mthong ste/ nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i 
127a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA nud+ha ra kle shaM/ ts+tshe da sarba d+harmA sa man+ta dz+nyA na ma hA pradz+nyA ba ra mi tA pA dza ma g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ gdugs

127b1(rgyud 'grel): gang dag rib rab steng gnas dang // dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang // shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang // ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang // chu bo kun dang chu yi mdo

127b7(rgyud 'grel): po dang // dbang ldan pa ste 'byung po'i bdag po dang // steng gi'i blamangs pa chen po dang // lharnamam kun dang gang dgas stengs su/ ri'i lha dang gsang ba'i tshogs 'dus pa// sas sa sor gtor ma phul ba 'di// rab tu dgyes pa yis 
128a1(rgyud 'grel): ni bzhes nas kyang // rang dmyigs su legs par bzhugs nas su// rangag bu smra mnga' bags gtan 'dun dag// nang po dmag dang dpung bcas thabs gcig tu// ma hAg 
128a2(rgyud 'grel): dri dang byug pa gtor ma bcas// 'di dag btung zhing legs par gsol nas kyang // bdag gi las 'di'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// oM badz+ra shi kha re ru Da ma Ta/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ oM gr-ih+Na 
128a3(rgyud 'grel): gr-ih+Na nA~M/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya d+d+ha/ A na ya tsa b+ha ga wA bi d+hA rA dza dzA/ oM a kA ra mu khaM sarbad+harmA r+d+ha/ Ad+ya rud+han+na tata swA hA// phyi rol lha yi 'khor lo dang // byang chub sems dpa' 
128a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor mchog/ rim gyis de ru gzhug par bya// de nas snying po'i 'khor lo dang // de yang badrug tor dkyil 'khar la// de ni 'khor lo dbang phyug la// de yang phyag mtshan dang thig ler//

128a6(rgyud 'grel): bo ma lus pa// bkrams shing sems kyi zla ba ni// shar ba bskal pa bzang po yin// rim pa 'di yis 'khor khe rnams// thams cad spro ba'ang shes par bya// thig le'i sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis// 
128a7(rgyud 'grel): yun ma ring bar grub par 'gyu// yang na mdor bsdus sngags kyis ni// ji skad bshad pa'i me tog sogs// gang zhig cung zad dbul bar bgyi// me tog chung na'ang 'dir nyon mongs// dus 
128a8(rgyud 'grel): mtha'i me ni 'joms pa yin// de la mdor bsdu ba'i sngags ni// oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pU dza ma g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// de bzhin du bdug pa la sogs pa la yang ngo // 'khor lo'i dbang 
128b1(rgyud 'grel): phyug 'ba' zhig gam// yang na 'khor los sgyur ba ni// rgyu dang bcas pa 'am snying po 'am// 'khor lo 'am phyi nang thams cad la// dang ba dag par ldan rnams dang // sems dpa' chen pos mchod par 
128b2(rgyud 'grel): bya// mchod pa bshad par byas pa las// mtho ris thar pa'i snying po thob// de dang de las sgro 'dogs yongs 'khrul pa// sdug bsngal 'jigs pa'i nga ba yis// lha yi 'khor lo chen po dag ster ba/ 
128b3(rgyud 'grel): thugs rdo rje rnam pa sna tshogs spros pa yin// da ltar cog mchod 'khor lo ma lus pa// mchod rgyas 'di nyid rtag tu sbyor ba yin// shi bar gyur kyang bla yi dang med par// mchod bral skad cig ma yin sdig 
128b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// 'khor lo 'di dag rnam bsams nas// me tog thal mos btor ba dang // gang de 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams// des ni til gyi thal mo sbyin// skye ba dang ni 'jigs pa rnams// sna tshags 
128b5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyis mnyam pas// sdug bsngal thar med byed par 'gyur// yi ge gsum gyis gshegs su gsol// 'jig rten gsum gyi skye bo yis// mi yi nor bu'i tshogs rnams ni/ 
128b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs med mi yi se ng+ge yis// bdud bzhi glang po 'joms par byed// ma rig sdong po gcod pa yi// thub pa'i yon tan tshogs 'khor lo// phyag 'tshal bstod dang kha zas kyis// dgra 
128b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dun dag ni mchod par bya'o// bdag gi bsod nams 'di yis ni// shes rab ye shes mi bzang med// rtog pa shing gi rtsub dag/ sreg pa'i rdo rje rdung bar shog/ rdo rje'i rigs ni rtogs pa

133b8(rgyud 'grel): phra ba dang ni rags pa dang // grags dang rnam par dag yul dang // sdud dang dbye ba'i mtshan nyid dang // mkhas de kho na rnam bcu ni// rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog nag/ phyag gnyis mche ba bskam 
134a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// tshe dang sems dang yo byad dang // las dang bye ba bos pa dang // smon lam dang ni rdzu 'phrul dang // ye shes dang ni dbang ba dang // rdo rje du tshur su mdog dkar// phyag gnyis 
134a2(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur bsdams pa'o// so sor gtso bo'i sngags kyis bskyed// rang rang sngags kyis mchod pa dang // rdo rje skyil krung byed kyis ni// 'di dag rim bzhin gnas pa yin// 'di ltar bsgoms pa'i rnal
134a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa// yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ni// ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du thob// dngos grub gzhan ni smos ci dgos// 'di rnams kyi ni grwa bzhi ru// mkhas pas sgeg mo'i la sogs bsgom//

144b8(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms pas zhes bya ba ste dngos po der 'gyur ba'i phyir te sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir/ dngos pa gang sems kyi de kho na nyid sgom pa gang yin pas so// nges par zhes bya ba ni gdon mi za bar sangs 
145a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas te de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// sems kyi che ba'i bdag nyid gzhan dag kyang bstan par bya ba'i phyir// rang shes gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ rang gi ye
145a2(rgyud 'grel): shes te rang sems nyid ni dpal gyi yon tan dang ldan pas na sangs rgyas rnams kyang rab tu 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar mdzad do// rang gi sems ji lta bu zhe na/ gsang ba zhes bya ba ste/ 'jig rten las
145a3(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// dam pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad las mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas ye shes bla med de ye shes bya ba gsungs te/ gang gi// / 
145a4(rgyud 'grel): phyir rang gi sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa'i ye shes yin pas so// dris pa gnyis su snang ba nyid kyis 'khrul cing // kun nas nyon mongs pa'i so so skye bo'i sems te/ ji ltar sangs 
145a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi ye shes yin zhe na/ gnyis med gnyis kyi tshul can zhes bya ba gsungs te/ de ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yin te// gnyis su snang ba stong pa nyid kyi rang gi ngo bor gyur par yang dag par rtogs pa'i 
145a6(rgyud 'grel): phyir ro// de lta bu yin du zin kyang gnyis kyi tshul can te zhes bya ba ste/ rdzun yin du zin kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i tshul du so sor snang ba'i phyir/ de ni mi bden pa yin glo bur gyi 'khrul pa can gyi de ni rang 
145a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyis gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yin pas// rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yin no// de lta bu'i ye shes nyid la ni sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'dus par mdzad te/ chos kyi sku la sogs pas 
145a8(rgyud 'grel): gtso bor gyur pa'o zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so// de bas na rang gi sems nyid la phyag 'tshal ba yin te/ de ltar phyag 'tshal pa ni rtag par rab tu 'dud ces bya ba ste/ 'di ni khyad par du 'phags pa nyid du 
145b1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa yin te/ 'dis ni shin tu myur du byang chub ma thob cing bskal pa grangs med pa gsum 'am/ mang po rab tu 'dud do zhes bya ba'i don to// yang dag par phyag 'tshal ba rnams ni myur ba nyid du byang chub rtog
145b2(rgyud 'grel): pas yang phyag 'tshal bar mi byed do zhes dgongs so// de nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas gang yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ chos thams cad dmigs pa la rang gi sems ni gnyis su snang bar ni bdag 
145b3(rgyud 'grel): med pa ste rgyu nyid kyi sbyor ba'o// de las yang dag par byung ba ni yang dag par shes pas sangs rgyas kyi ngo bor byung ba ste/ 'bras bu 'di kho na nyid kyi sbyor ba la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don do// rgyu dang 
145b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid dbyer med pa'i ye shes ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te/ smra bsam las 'das pa'o// de las byung ba ni 'di dag ma lus par rdzogs par gyur pa yin pas na/ gnyis med// 
145b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes las byung ba zhes bya ste/ de'i 'og tu sdug dang mi sdug rnam spangs pa zhes bya ba ste/ sdug pa ni thob par bya ba'i chos rnams so// mi sdug pa ni spang bar bya ba'i chos rnams te de ma lus pa
145b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par spangs pa ni thob pa dang spangs pa mthar thug pa'i bdag nyid 'thob pa'o// de ltar gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang yin pa de ni ci la yang phyag ni mi 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ste/ bya ba byas pa'i sgrub pa 
145b7(rgyud 'grel): la sbyor ba yin pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par phyag 'tshal ba de nyid gsal bar mdzad cing de nyid la 'jig rten rnams nges par sbyar ba'i phyir/ ma skyes pa ni ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs 
145b8(rgyud 'grel): te/ rang gi shes pa te/ rang gi sems gnyis su snang ba dang bral ba'i tshul gyis sngar ma skyes pa'i de'i tshul du bskyed la/ skyes par gyur pa'i pha rol te/ rjes la sangs rgyas skur ni zhes bya ba sangs rgyas
146a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rnam par rtag tu zhes bya ba rtag pa nyid kyis bsgom par bya ste/ phyag 'tshal ba de la rang nyid de nyid la rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis zhugs par bya'o// zhes bya ba'i don to// 
146a2(rgyud 'grel): de la lus kyi rab tu zhugs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku las tha dad pa'i rang gi lus mi dmigs pa'o// tshig gis rab tu zhugs pa ni sangs rgyas ni bdag go zhes smra'o// 'di gnyis las gzhan du yid mi 
146a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yeng ba ni/ sems kyi rab tu 'jug pa'o// lus la sogs pa'i rab tu 'jug pa 'di nyid ni de'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi phyag 'tshal ba'i mchog yin te/ myur ba nyid byang chub sgrub par byed pa 
146a4(rgyud 'grel): yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so// 'dir yang sangs rgyas kyi sgras byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams kyang bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdus pa nyid ni sangs rgyas dang byang/ 
146a5(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i tshul gyis rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la bsgom par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro// rnal 'byor 'di la 'di'i skal ba dang ldan pa ma yin no zhe ni/ rnal 'byor pa dang zhes bya ba 
146a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa gsungs te/ 'dir rnal 'byor ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so// de nyid ni sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu yod pa yin pas na rnal 'byor pa ste/ sems can thams cad do// gal 
146a7(rgyud 'grel): te thams cad rnal 'byor pa yin na/ 'dir skal pa med pa ni 'ga' yang med pas/ 'khor bar ga la 'khor bar 'gyur zhe na/ de'i phyir nyon mongs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ ni zhes 
146a8(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i sgra ni dkar ba'i don te/ nyon mongs pa dang bag chags kyis su na phyung bas 'gro ba de dang der 'khor bar gyur pa'o// lus can zhes bya ba ni lus thob pa rnams so// rgyu gang gis nyon
146b1(rgyud 'grel): mongs pa dang bag chags kyi lus 'thob ce na/ de'i phyir sdug dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ sdug pa ni gnas dang longs spong la sogs pa'o// mi sdug pa ni de dag gi rnam par 'byed pa'i 
146b2(rgyud 'grel): khyad par la yongs su rtogs pa'o// de las ni bag chags te/ de nas yang sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i rnam par 'byed pa'o// de nas ni gnyis thob par dang spangs par srid par skye la/ des ni lus 'thob/ 
146b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yin no// dris pa lha'i lus dang ldan pa rnams dga' ba'i tshal la sogs par 'khor ba na/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni ci zhig yod ji ltar na 'khor ba yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba la sogs pa
146b4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs te/ 'di na nyon mongs pa dang las byung ba'i ba'i zag pa dang bcas pa'i lus dang longs spyod dang gnas rnams ni/ gang gis spyod pa dang gang la spyod pa dang / gang du spyod pa ste/ de ni lus dang lhan 
146b5(rgyud 'grel): cig 'byung ba na/ lus 'byung ba'o// gang sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs de nyid ni sdug bsngal lo// de skad du gang zhig zag bcas nyer len pa'i// phur po de dag thabs bcas kyang // 
146b6(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'jig rten dang // lta gnas srid pa'ang de dag yin// zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro// de ltar yin na go/ 'jig rten rnams sdug bsngal yin na ji ltar thar bar 'gyur zhe na/ sem 
146b7(rgyud 'grel): dode zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ sdug bsngal de gnon cing shes pa'i 'gro ba ni sems kyis so sor rtogs shing yongs su shes pas brten pa ni rtogs pa yin te/ gdams pa'i rtsa ba yin no// 
146b8(rgyud 'grel): de bas na gdams pa po ni 'khor ba las sgrol bar byed pa yin no// de su zhig yin zhe na// rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ thams cad du thog pa med cing shin tu rnam par dag 
147a1(rgyud 'grel): la rtag pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi tshul can yin pas na// khyab pa rnam par snang mdzad pas na rnam par snang mdzad do// rnam pa thams cad du chos kyi longs spyod bskyed par mdzad pas/ 
147a2(rgyud 'grel): nargyal ba'o// rnam pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas na mgon po ste ngo bo nyid dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa sku dang rim bzhin du sbyar ro// de ltar dang po'i tshig ni bstan pa yin la 'og ma/ 
147a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum ni bshad pa yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ste/ de rnams kyi ro cig pa ni bsdus pa zhes bya ste/ de ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi don yin no// sangs rgyas 
147a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te/ de nyid sangs rgyas rnams la sogs shig tu byas nas bshad pa yin te/ 'dis na sangs rgyas thams cad rtags 'gyur ba zhes bya ste/ 'di ni rgyal ba'i 
147a5(rgyud 'grel): don yin no// sangs rgyas 'khor ba sgrol ba po zhes bya ba ni mgon po'i don yin no// dris pa bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi don gyi mthar byon pa yin nam/ 'on du gzhan dag kyang sgrol bar mdzad 
147a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yin nam/ 'on te ltos par mi mdzad pa yin zhe na/ de'i phyir sems can kun la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ sems can kun la phan pa de nyid ni don yin te/ 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// 
147a7(rgyud 'grel): de la thugs rje 'byung ba gang yin pa de nyid ni nyams yin te/ rab kyi mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de dang yang dag par ldan pa ni rtag tu bcas pa ste/ de bsan btang snyoms med pa yin no zhes bya 
147a8(rgyud 'grel): bar dgongs so// gdams pa bstan pa'i phyir rgyu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ shin tu myur ba dang shin tu bde bar byang chub sgrub par byed pa'i slong ba ni rgyu'i de kho na nyid do// de'i mnyam 
147b1(rgyud 'grel): par sbyor ni snyoms par 'jug pa'o// de las gong du zhes bya ba ni bstan pa de'i gong du zhes bya ba'i don do// 'bras bu'i de nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'o// de ston pa ni de'i sbyor ba ston par mdzad 
147b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// ci bcom ldan 'das de gzhan dag kyang ston par mdzad dmazhe na/ 'bad de zhes bye ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ 'bras bu'i de nyid yang dag par zhugs zhes bya ni rgyu dang 'bras bu mi byed pa'i 
147b3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni nu'i de kho na nyid mi 'dod te/ bya ba byas pa nyid rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir slar 'dod par mi byed do// de bas na mthun/ 
147b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su gnyis pa la sogs par ni 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor nyid bya'i/ rgyu'i rnal 'byor ni ma yin no// rgyu'i rnal 'byor ni so sor rab tu bsgom pa yin la sngar grub pa'i rim gyis 'bras bu'i do// 
147b5(rgyud 'grel): kho na nyid la yang dag par zhugs par gyur na/ de nyid gal te yang 'dod par gyur na ci 'gyur zhe na/ gang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ gnas skabs gang du 'dod pa skyes par gyur pa de nyid 
147b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i bag chags yin zhing dngos grub kyi bgegs su gyur pa yin te/ slar srid pa'i rgyu yin no zhes bya ba'i don to// de bas na 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid la yang dag par zhugs pas dngos 
147b7(rgyud 'grel): grub kyis pa thugs bstan ts+tsha/ sa / 'di na ga / sa da snrug na 
147b8(rgyud 'grel): rang sangs rgyas dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo la spyod pa'i sgom pa ci'i phyir ma gsungs zhe na/ yid la 'dod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ yid la 'dod pa ni sems can rnams kyi 'dod 
148a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ des bsgom pa sna tshogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi yongs su btags shig gsungs pa yin no// gang las she na theg pa de'i nang nas gdams pa cig pa nyid bstan pa ni ga 
148a2(rgyud 'grel): zhig zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ yang zhes bya ba ni khyad par gyi don to// bshad ma thag pa'i sgom pa gcig gis rnal 'byor gyi de kho na nyid thams cad dang 'brel par gnas pa gcig pu de 
148a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni rnal 'byor 'byung ba'o// des na gdams pa gcig pa yin no// // da ni gtso ba ston te/ de yang rnal 'byor nyid las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'thob par 'byung ba 'di yin pas na rdul 
148a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor 'byung ba ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i bsgom pa gang yin pa de las ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad 'thob pa yod pa ma yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo la spyos 
148a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgom pa las ni de 'byung ba yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang rnal 'byor 'di dang 'dra ba ma yin te ci'i phyir zhe na/ bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba'i spyon pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin po/ 
148a6(rgyud 'grel): bcu po de rnams las 'byung ba yin te gdams bstan pa'o// gdams pa bstan pa bshad pa ni/ sangs rgyas rjes dran zhes bya la sogs pa yin te/ rjes su dran pa gnyis kyi tsho gas gnyis yongs su/ 
148a7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa las rkang gnyis de lha dang mi de rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa'o// thA gar li ka zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang mtshan ma'o// rab tu bzhag ces bya ba ni/ 
148a8(rgyud 'grel): / kyi thugs pan sa te/ la sa sa/ yang sa 
148b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba bsdus nas/ byon pa'i rgyal ba thams cad rnam par bsgom par bya zhing / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bstan par bya ba'i phyir rang gi snying khar bzhugs par bya'o// de nas snying khar zla ba la gnas
